item.text: @##// rgyagar skad du/ shrItsa tur pI tham hAyo ga ni gu gyasarba tan rA dza/ bod
skad du/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gdan bzhi pa zhes bya
ba= dpal rdo rje sams dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid
de bzhin rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang// drang srong rnams kyi ye shes dbang// rnal
'byor ma yi dra mchog bde// gnas gtsang man bzhugs nas su// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di skad
gsungs// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus nas phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang ba sbyor ba'i khyad par dang// bdag nyid de nyid ji
ltar lha// chudang man ji ltar lags// ji ltar rab mdzesanam mkha' dang// ye shes ji ltar 'atshal bgyi ba//
yongashes dbang la ma nyan par 'tshal/ 'khor ba las bsgral mtshan nyid dag/ nyon cag dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang//
dang por dbang gi mtshan 'dre dang// gnyis par yi ge gcig dang ni// gsum pa sa bon brgyad pa dang// bzhi par rtsa
yi lha nyid do// bdag nyid lus kyi ye shes me// blo ldan rnal 'byor pas shes bya// lteb ma yi thab khung du// de yi
ma la sbyin sreg bya// steng dang 'og dang dbus su ni// rnam shes rtsa bsdam par bya// thog mar bdag nyid lto ba ru/
'a@#// ma yi yi lha ni rnam par bsgom// lte ba'i ma ne 'bar ba la// khyug kha dog sgom pa ni// lte ba'i
nadakarapo dro// g.yon pa'i mnad bzhisar// lhan srin po'i ming can te// lhagam 'dun dem por bya// de dbus kha dog sngo bsang
so// ma yadu bar ng rab tu grags// ma yi dbus su pad+ma shing// nyima'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// deyi dbusasu ye shes lha//
'khor ba kun las grol bar mdzad// phyag gnyis sbyor ba'i gdan lan// rdo rje dril bus rnam par brgyan// g.yas kyi 'gan rdo dzad ng//
rgyan rnams mthon ka'i rtse mo can// bzhadud khro bsad+hisgrogs shing// 'du yashes dbang phyug lha// yi dbus su rab tugrugs//
shar du lha mo sgrol ma dang// byang du de bzhin gos dkarago/ nub tu lha mo mA ma kI// sangs rgyas M suman lho cu'o// gzugs mthe bo'i
tshad tsam du// bdag nyid lha yi lha nyid do// lce la mun sbyar bar bya// nam mkha'i rna ba sna dag la'o// mig la snga 'da rnam par shes// de bzhin tshangs par 'bar ba'i// mgrin par
rmongs pa'i sa nyid dang// g.yo ba snying la gnas pa nyid// thams cad nyon mongs brang dang na/ phyug gnyis lte pa'i rtsa bar ro// yan lag brgyud du bkod nas ni// 'danyid lha ni shes
par bya// rnam shes rtswa nas drangs pa yi// de bzhin dun bdud rtsi dag/ stang gi mche ba gnyis pa'i/ kun tu tshu bzhin zhu ltar babs// ji bzhinamun 'i ma 'ching// lce desnyingadu
bstan pa yi// 'am thig le 'bar ba la// 'khor la phra rab rdul bzhinano// stong gnam ma kha banam mkhazhu/ srog pa'i bdag nyid du ni thig/ g.yon pa'i dbugs ni bud med nyid//
g.yas pa de bzhin skyes bu'o// 'og drang stangan 'di yi rtsa// 'og na sngon du rab grag kha// dbugs dang dri zhim nyam drangs nas/ rgyas pa yin lnga'i stang du// rnam shes gnyis kyi
rtsanas drang/ bdud rtsi de la rnam par thim/ phashes dbang phyug de stong du// de la bdud rtsis bkru bar bya// da lta kun tu bzhin brngubasanas// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom
par bya// lag mthil zla ba te ma bsgom// ye shes yiger dbusaMso// ri dgas mgo bo'i phyag rgyayis// khams lnga'i bdag nyid bsregs pa'o/ sngon du sa bon hU~M byas nas// gnyis par
de bzhin gsum pa na/ gsum par bzod pas bzung bu khro// de bzhin rlung ni bzhupa dang/ lnga par ngang pa'i sa bon gyis// mkhas pas khams lnga'i spyanasrag bya//
bdag gi de nyidam lan/ bdag 'di sbyor bas bsreg pa nyid// ji ltar ya shes ma den// srog pa'i bdag 'di rab tu grags/ sbyin sreg byas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba dang po rdzo gas
stong pa'i bdag nyid dge ba yis// skyes pa 'dran pa ma 'jig pa// 'khor ba ru yi gnas pa/ khacom ldan 'das la mnyam par 'tshal// stongapa'i
long 'di rang bzhin gyis// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang/ glingagazhan de bzhin ra ba dang/ sa mnam ma kha kun tu bsam/ rgya mtsho[%]ya dbyibs dang na/ yadu 'ong ba
'byung bar ldan// stong pa'i mtshan nyid sngon 'gro bas// mu ya bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'du lha mo sgyu phra ma 'di// da bzhin byang du ges dkar mo/ mA ma kAn nub phyog
su ldeba'i lha mosangs rgyas spyan// chu ni sgrol mara kun tu them// ma na gog dkar mo la thim/ mA ma kIn nubanas sa// rlung ni sangs rgyus spyan la thim/ chu shing me tog pad+ma
'ad// sgong skyes ye shes kyin mingan// de'i ye shes la dbangamo// sgong skyas 'og tu byed pa can// gzugs med srid pa'i dbyibs can/ khazhes rgyal po nyid du thim// de ltar
cad bdag nyid stong pa 'dra// de nyid de nyid stong pa nyid// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshamad par// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// ji ltar stong nyid de bsgoms la/ lus kyi dri ma rab tu
bkru// phyis ni chu yi gzugs su bsgom/ dmar po 'dab ma brgyad dang ni// gos ste bar bcas pa yi// dbus su pad+mas rnam par brgyan// 'dab brgyad la ni lha mo yi//
sa bon brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// shar du sa kazhes bya dang/ byung du bzod par sa bon bzhin/ nub tu rlung gi sa bon gsungs/ lhoru shug dbang phyug go/ dbang ldan du ni dbang
po'i dbyangs// ma phyogs sgra dang rnam shes so// bden bral dbyangs yig brgyad pa dang/ rlung du dbyangs yig lnga pa'o// dbus su lang shes rgyal ba'agi slong skyes ye shes dbang phyug
ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis dkras pa// bdud rtsis bon 'bar ba 'o// kha dog bdun pa'i m 'doni/ go' bang mchog gso bsgom par bya// dbugs mi g.yo ba lasems dpa' yas/
dngos po dngos po bsgom byas nas// phyi na tshe ya lha nyid gdan// mig las sa yis bon dang// nam mkha' sna dang rnab la ko lce la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'ad// snying khar zhes bya ba'i
ming// yan lag drug 'dzanas bon gyis// rnal 'byor lus n rnam par srung/ yongashes lus 'di shes byas pas// ci la phyi'i na skye bo'i ming// gzugs med pa shes gzugs can dang/
kha dog med cing mtshan kun dngos// gnas med gnas kyi dbyings can dang/ mi rigs de bzhin rigs pa nyid// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba sta gnyis pa rdzogs/
bdag khrid lnga yi bye brag nyid// bcom ldan 'das las mnyan par 'tshal// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang// gnyis dang gnyis mang la brten nas// bskal
pa bzangapo brgya ya sngon// dug pa'i gnas la kun tu gnas// nga rang lha mosangs rgyas spyan// mA la kan lho phyogs gnas// lha mo sgrol ma nub kyi gling// de bzhin byung ngu gos dkar
mo shar du lha mo sAn ma 'di// lha mo rnam pa lnga yi gnas// de ltar snying khar ri rab dang// de bzhin mgo bo mA ma kI// sgrol ma lha yi gnas dang ni// g.yon pa de bzhin gos
dkar mo// sAmapa mo 'ang bdag gi gnas// lha mo lnga yis byin gyis brlabs// pad+ma'i dbus su rdo rjadang// rdzordzi'i dbus su pad+ma can// rdo rje bdung rtse kun them pas/ lus po
kun nas bkris pa'o// yan lag brgyud kyi rtsa khrid du// bdud rtsi'i chun rnam par thim// lha yi gnas nianam mkha' nyid// rdo rje'i sa bon du rang shes// bdag nyid lus la bsgoms pa ni/
N+Di'i rtsa nas rab tu grags// de yi yul gyi khrag dang// lus dang lhan cig bcas par gnas// khrag dang mun kun spyor bas// blo ldan yan lag brgyad nas 'dzag/ ji ltar bangag ga
sa bon lnga// de ltar bad mi yang bsgom// ji ltar bdag nyid lus 'an// nam mkha' rdzogs 'dri'i byed de/ rkang pas rkang pa dkri bya zhing/ mnu yis mchu btsa byas la// gnyis
ka'i lag pa phyag spyan// rtse mo gsum pa'i ro rdzabartag/ rang bzhin gyis sos dang// snying kha'i rnam shes bsgoms pa yis// gang shes rgyal po'ilus can 'di/ skyes bus khros
pas yU byas nas// da ltar rdo rje bad 'ad// rnal 'byor bsdus pasu bskyod par bya// gnyis ka dag 'azhing tshim pa yis// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// khrag dang khu
ba las 'byungapa mr-i/ sa bon myu gus 'gro ba dang/ lha rnamaso lusun yang dag 'byung// 'dod la dga' te dag yin te// longs spyodaphyir yang gnas mi bya// sems can
ngan phyir 'dod pa'i phyir// yongs su rdzogs pa'i yang 'ong sku// gnyis med sbyor ba la gnas pas// gtor ma sngon du sbyin par bya// sbyor ba'i li 'a zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so//
nyonacigargyal po rje rje 'chang// de nyid bcu yi bye brag nyid// yi ge bcu ru sngon sbyar la/ lnga yi bdag trid du rtogs bya// lnga pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyi// lnga
yi lus ni yongs su srung/ yi ge bcun ji ltar lags// dza ltar bdag nyid la 'di sbyar// dziltasbyang nang sgom pa dang// ji ltar s pen myu gu ste// jiltar thar ba la gnas nyid
ngomatshar lha la mnyan bar 'tshal// gsang ba gsang ba zhes bya ba// rgyal po ji bzhin de nyid don/ khrog mang stong pa de kho na// stong par munibasam par/
bya kha dog bdun gyi pad+ma ni// gsar drang bcas yid 'ong ba// stong phrag brgya yi khyonatsam gyis/ pad+ma'i gzugasan/nga por bcas// bda myurarab madzas par/ rin
chan bdun gyis mngon par smras// dril bu drab 'i 'phreng ba dang// dar dngan bzal mngon par 'byung// seng ge 'i gdan ni mngon par gsal// dustang rima'i dkyil 'khoraro// pad+ma'i
ngo rdzo' ngo bo 'ad/ 'od zer 'am bye ba yi// sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon gyis// rdo rje'i rtsa mo rnam par bsam// dbus su rnam pa snang mdzad dgyes// shar du de bzhin ma bskyod
la rina chen s bon lhonyAdIdu// de bzhin nub lu'od dpag mar/ byang phyogs sun don yod grub/ sa bon lnga ni rnam par bsgom// bad byang chub yan lag brgyad// dri bzhon
sa la rab tu brtag/ dbusaMsu snying po sgong la/ rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid thim// pad+ma brgyud pa'i rtse mo na// mnga' bdagade bzhin rnams ng mdzad// shar du lha mo sgrol ma 'di//
byang du lha mo sangs rgyas spyan// nub tubasam pa gos dkar mo// de bzhin lhor AmashI/ 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang bor// 'jigs pa med par bsgom par bya// rdzo rje las ni lha yi
lus// bzhugs pa ru ni rnam par bsam/ spyan gsum phyagazhi drug pa 'o// kha dog sngon po'abatums/ rje rdzayin tsed panan// dar gyis bsus shing rnam par 'khyang// rgod cing khro dang//
ga pa dang/ gnas drapa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// stong du mal gri 'chang ba dang/ gnyis pa la ni de bzhin gzhu// gsum par rdo rje gdes pa gsor// g.yon pa'i stong du kha TaM dang//
gnyis pas lha mo'i mum 'tsher// gsum pas dril bu'i sgra sgrog cing// rab tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// rgyan kun phun sum tshogs pa dang/
ma togo 'phreng bas rab tu brgyan// g.yon du lha mo sgrolamanI/ phyag gcig gsana'akhyud pa dang/ gcig gi phyagan thod pan// bdud rtsi'i chudang yang dag ldan// mA ma kA yang de
bzhin du// gcig gi phyag gis mngon par 'khyud// gcig ga phyag ga thod pan// khrog dang sha yas gang pa'o/ spyan ma rgyab tun nas bsam/ 'phrang bas phyag brgyan pa dang//
ga tor ma sbyang ba'i phyag gnyis ga mdun du rtsod la rnam par blta// de ltar bdag nyid lnga la lus// lus la kun nas yang dag gnas// shar du lha mo ma tog ma// lho ru spos dang yang dag
ldan// nub tumar ma'i lag pa ma/ byang du dri lha mo'o// dbang ldan nga ni sgag mo 'di// de bzhin ma phyogs 'phra ba ma// bden bral phyogs su dbyangs ma dang// rlung du gar ma brgyad/
pa'o// zhim bye ba brgya stong gi/ drod zer rnam pa mang po'i mdog/ sas rgyas spyan ltar 'phro ba ni// sems can sgrol la mchog tu brtson// bdag nyid lha dang lha gzhan/
ka bdag nyid lhan mchog yin no// bdag nyid gzugs su ma nus pas/ gzugs bar n la sogs bsgom par bya// phyis nadi yi mdun nyid du// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ de nyid/
bar r bsam pa dang/ de nyid gzhal yas khang pa bsam// sngon du gsungs pa'i gdan lan/ der ni nyi mas man par gi yogs// sna tshogs yin chen mchod pa dang// sna tshogs dar/
ni mngon par sbyangs/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas// par 'i tshul du kha phye la// o ka ma la ang b+ha ba bsAhA// pada' sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rang gi dbugs lus byung nas/
de rje mdun du rnam pa la bsgom// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs nas ni// sdigs mdzub g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung dkri// lcags kyu yi ni rnam pa'o/ o badz+dzapraaM ku sha dza/ oM badzra A kar
tsha ya dza/ rdorje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ sdigs mdzub gnyis n dkri byas pa// zhags pa yin rnam pa'o// oM badzrapA sha hU~M/ zhogs pa'i
sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ji ltar bdag nyid gzugs b+bArAn bzhin// de ltar mdun du'ang rab bsam//lha mo brgyadan kun rdzogs pa// khro ba'i rgyal po bzhi par ro// shar du gshin rje mthar
byed dngos// lcer de bzhin bgegs ma zar byed// nub tu pa rwa mthar byed pa// byang du khro bo slong ba 'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas// rgyab ngang sgrub dusbyar bar bya// o 'dzad+ma' thaM//
rjelnga lcagasasgog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas// mtha'u chung gnyis ni sbyar bar bya// oM badzrah+man+nAho// rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa

lcags sgrog phyag rgyalas// sor mo dbus ma brkyang byas la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM btsonas mA d+hi/ bi shwa yi gru ye gru ya dza b+hi TasuhA/ oM hU~MhU~MhU~M/ sdododotongodape/ bibr-itraM shrI sAhA/
bcom ldan 'angs rnal 'byor nam mkha'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ o tAre tut+ta res dak+khedasAhA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i sngags so// o gi li bil pa la sAhA/gos dkar mo 'a sngagasaso// o da ra sarba tan

hU~M phatwA/ mA ma kA'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngagasaso// sdigs mdzub gnyis dang gung mon/dbus dang dbus susbyar bar bya// mthe bong ngos su sbyar ba na// lha mo
bzhi yi phyag rgya'o// mnang yi ge bzhi pan/ ma tog ma lasogs pa dang// sgeg mo ya ni sngags nyid yin// g.yas brkyang rkang pa yang dag gnas// sdigs mdzub snying khar sbyin byas

nas// dpung pa mdumanas brkyang byas la/ se gol hrug rnam pa dang// lhan cigakhun sbyang byas pa// 'di'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// oM A yuT+TapA la pra te rak+Shaduk+Sha bats+tsha ya huphaN/ shar phyog
kyi sgolan ba'i 'o// o A ka rA ya sa tAd+ha tukresAhA/ byang du rgyas pa'i'o// oM mo ha ya mo haya/ sargyas tAnaM shAsAhA/ nub tu dbang gi// ongasha k+Shasawadu
gru ta ya hri phaT/ lho ru mngon bar spyod pa'i gro/ oM su gan hUM haM// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dri'i phyag rgya'o// oM sus bde pul+la wasI/ sngagis mdzub dang mthe bong sbyar ban mi rtog ge

sngags dang phyag rgya'o// o rU pa lo la ku le sAwA/ sor mo dbus ma bsgrung ba'i bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ o tAk+Sha dIpi pra tu griSh+NasAhA/ khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong bsgrung ba'i mar me'i sngags
dang phyag rgya'o// o ku ru ku rub dza yasAhA/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas dbus su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// ji ltar sngon du sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// tsug
glu yi rnam pa yis// sangs rgyas kun nas mnyes par bya// lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur byas/ rked pa'i phyogs su bzung byas la// pa wang tshul gyis sbyang ba dang// gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa
kha dang// solasnyan tshul gyis dkrol ba dang// brdar pa'i tshul gyis rdeb pa dang// gur gyis tshul gyis skyod pa dang// rlung g.yab tshul gyis g.yab pa dang// rgyal mtshan tshul gyis sgrung/
dang// bla ra'i tshul gyis bri ba dang// ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar ba dang// gdugs kyi tshul gyis dgab pa dang// cang te'u'i tshul gyis 'gying ba dang// 'khar rnga'i tshul gyis rdung ba dang// bzhad/
pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang// khro bo'i stang stabs yan lag bskyod// de ltar de nyid rnal 'byor pas// rgya yi mchod pa'i khyad par nyid// U/ bdag med rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis//
'byin pa'i sa bon bzung byas pa// spyi yi rnal 'byor ston pa'o// dbang po mchog gi mchod pa che// thapachen po gnas chen po// gsang zhing de nyid gsang ba yi// gsang ba'i bdag po dga' chen po//

rnamasna mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// lus kyi rtsa ni lnga nyid las// lha dang lha ni mngon par skul// bde ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba// sbyor ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// glu dang bstod pas nyer mchod/
nas// dzaltapalas la mngon bde bar// rang gi sngags kyi yi ge yis// 'phrang ba lan bzlos par bya// ji ltar nus pas mchodabyas la// slar yang gshegs su gsol pa'o// dbugs/
kyis bdag nyid lus bkang ste/ lhan cig sbam par brasam par bya/ dzaltar rnal 'byor nam mkha' nyid// de ltar rnam par snang mdzad bdag/ ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad lha// de bzhin rgyab kyi
rtsa nyid do// ji ltar sngon gyi rtsa nyid las// de bzhan ye shesaskya ba 'di// mun sgrol ma zhes su bshad// ma la gos dkar yang dag ldan// rlung la lha mo sangs rgyas 'di// de bzhin rab madzes/
mAm ki// dkarapo chu yi rtsa dang ni// dud pa yang mi yi gnas// dung gi rtsa 'di rlung gi'o// de bzhin du ni pad dang// ye shes 'byin pa ya na rtsi// lnga yi bdag nying khyad par ni// gdan bzhi nyan
par mi nus pa// gzhu 'ung ban bstanub yin// gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so/// jo rje'i tshun ji ltar lags// bdud/

rtsi'i chun dzi ltar skye/ gangag dbye ba ji ltar myang// gang gis ji ltaparatshal bar bgyi/ 'ad ya rab tshudagos pa'i ng// ngomatshar lha la mnyan par 'tshal// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje 'chang// gnyis dang
gnyis mar spos pa yi gsang zhing gsang ba rab sbas pa'i/ 'gro ba'i 'bras bu de de khrid/ khaskal pa bye bstong phrag tu// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul ba/ sangs rgyas lamazhi mthong ba'o//
ye shes snang ba de bdun 'ad// ji ltar ma yis mnyam par srog pa'i spyod pa dang// zhim ji ltar manyam par blta bar ston pa dang// ji ltar rlung na mnyam pa nyid du len pa ltar// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i

rgya mtsho bsres pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ pad+ma'i dbang phyug sku ni gser gyimadogo/ dri chu'i ngo bo ni tu snang mdzad dang// ro ni rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje phyag/ lha gsu ma dag gi chog shes bar bya// hazhes pa yis/
tshal/ kha dog 'phrog/ dozhes pa yis dri mad cing// dpa' bo grwa yis bcom pa yis// de dag rim bzhin shes par bya// pa'i gdon ni rtag tu mnyam pa nyid du bsgom// mthe bong rdordzasrin lag gnyis su
kun ldan pas// sngags gsum yi ge gsum gyis chog bsrung bar bya// gangazhes ro 'dzi chung ba blo ldan rnal 'byor ma'o// dodzamu yi khyad par ni// nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// 'dzag pa yin/

lus kyi chu// bdag nyid lnga las byin gyis brlabs// dro ba'i rang bzhin ma ru mthong// zhi ba chu ru rab tu brtag/ rlung dang rlung na du kha'o// san gzugs su spung ba'o/ gang zhig de nyid kyis myang san//
dri ma can lus dri mad 'gyur// rin chen bzang dga' rnal 'byor pa// sbyangs pa'i sdorje'ajigs byed kyig/ gtsang dang mi gtsang de bzhin rdzas// dang po'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do// nyon mongs de
bzhin mun pa de// rnam shes lhan cagasnangaba'o// gangashes rje rdzabcom nas ni// rnal 'byorapa na de la snang// bdung rtse bstan 'dod lus can gyis// gnyis mang kha sbyar sbyar bar bya// rnal
'byor chen po'i sgrub pa po// sngon du A li kA la bsam// A li zhes bya bung bar gsungs// kA'adi bzhin gshegs pa nyid// sbyor ba'i gshes sgra yisanA// gnyis kas 'khyung par bsam
par bya// phrultar sde tshan gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te// dzeN+Dir pa tsam zhig gis// 'od dpag mang mdakri bar bya// lha mo gsum pa nyid kyi ni// dbyug pa tsam zhagi rdo rje 'dzin//
dbus su dam tshig zhags pa yis// kun da mgo la mchog tu brtson// de ltar sngags zlos rnal 'byor ba// pad+matshorje can gyis bskyod// rang bzhin gyis na saMsgra dang// bdud rtsi chu dang 'dres pa yi//
de nyid 'di yis myang byas pa/ rnal 'byor chos la rab tu shes// bden pa'i chos n mtshig tu bden// rnal 'byor chos ni rab tu bstod// da nyid dman pa'i rnam rtog yid// sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub

nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs// zhesdang chen po dag che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho mad de za ba// dam tshig sams dpa' 'o rags pa 'dis// gti mug/

bde ba che thabs las// nam yang sems can ngon ma 'dor// sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod// mi
'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang// rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang// 'du shes pa rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang nam ma/ba'as// rlung ru rnams kyi rim pa bzhin//

rnams kyi yongs dag pa// lus ngag gsang ba dbang po sems// rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
'ang ni dbang gi sgrub sbyangs te// mchog tum 'gyur sgrub pa 'i thabs// rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag ldan// zla ba mdor bsar pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi
lu'ur le'u lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so////'dan khacha' ra ldi ta so ma nA tho dang/ bod kyi le tsa ba 'bre dag song
shes grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ dpa' nA ro pa'i 'grel ba shad dang ma thun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A de bud+d+ha ud d+he ta'akA la tsakra nA ma tanArA dza/ bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po' sangs rgyas las byung ba
rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// dpal dus kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste

ba yan lag mchog la bzha gnas zhus ba ni// rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khoraka 'phrang ldan pa'i a 'dus las mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du 'o// stong pa ye shes kyang sa thig le
mchog mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang su rang bzhin rnams la skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nying dang// lus la sna tshogs chad
dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi les sbyong dang// dkyil 'khor dang zhingabangs skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'ang ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang
pa khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di na rab mchog lha rnams dang// mi dang srin po lcaman kru dang chags bral thuba mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pamun pas so/
mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tsheg gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dgan/ dolus dbus su sta dkyil 'khor ngag dang dbang ni bshad par byayas mi yo

bdag po bzang po nyon// dus kyi stong ba rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang rab rgya mtsho dang// rgyu skar dang na zlaskaram gza yi tshogs dang drang srong rtsa dang 'byung po klu
rnams dang// dung 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs dang 'ogo rum rnams dang ni ngamyal ba yang// stong pa'i dbusasu yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshe dang ma sgo pa'i dbus su skyongs
bzhin// lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung drang ma dang chudang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang// lha ni mthong ba spyad man dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dgalas//
sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing ma bdag po sur yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs man sems kyi kun tu rtog pa rag las grol//
g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'grol ba'i bdung rtse'i mdang g.yas su dmar po'i mdog/ sgra gcan dusam zla ba 'amar bo can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang// mjug
ris dman pa char dang glog dang chu dang rtse mo can dra'abar ba rnams ni zung bdun po// 'jig rten la na gnas pa nyid de mun pa med pa zung gcig dag na mun pa'i mtha' la 'o// rgyang
jus ra bo yang na skar ma lha gzhus pa de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so// srog ces bya ba gcig bu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur paspyi de rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi
rdo rje'i stang dus bod rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tshu gnas // kun tu yang shus dang stong pa zhib gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam
par grol a sogs sumacu'i dbyangs gang shaya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'achadang nyan byed kyang/ ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug ma yi tshad kyis
spyodang rakhyed// sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha min gdengs can 'byung po'agyi gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa/ a sogs kasogs ldan pa ngag las de ltar khams
sa gsum dugan nges par skyong 'gyuram yi bdag/ dbyangs ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan lha la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyis skya ba'i gnas// mgran skabasang gi ma ni mkhar rlung bsreg
! bya las skyes mchu dang so na rludangs drag no/ a sogs rnams migatsug tor 'khor le snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa lta// sna tshogs gan gdam pa'i bong can dang
gsar 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o// rlung gi many+dza'anas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengasacan grong khyera' na dpag tshad 'bum phug gnyis// lhun po' glod
ni 'bum phrag gcig sta gza' ya tshogs kyi gnas nias stong phrag dag ni 'gulnga// mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i ge'aphang g.yo mang dag la de bzhin nyid du zhi shu lnga// de yi phyi
sa/ rol stong pa gcig pu sreng pa gsum bral yon tan macang de nyid kyis dman pa'o// rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'igazhi la gling dang mi de rgya mtsho rnams// bzhi
phud 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dgan 'bum phrag gnyis// dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor loskar bcas 'an dngamtshan mor
'khor ba ste// madrug lan 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rngan khams kyi kun nas khor yug tun thad ka'i tshad kyi sum
'gyur du yang 'gyur bsta// sa ya khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so// mi yi dbang po phyi rol srad pa gsum gyi gnas la dpagatshad 'bum

phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa// de nas yi snying gi gnasasu lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khrugang ngo// phra rab brgyad rnams ngag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis sgra ya rtsa mo phra

mos// 'di rnams kyis ni sku tshe shig dang nus paltes 'gro nas kyi sor tasor mo nya man// zung gi khru 'o khru bzhes gzhu sta 'dir ma stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yas rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang/
grags bzhi rnams dag gis dpag tshadade yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha'i ngag la tshad yin no// dang por chos bzang bskal pa zungan khrung ngang ldan pa dgaste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang//
dpa la gyi bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang sta nyin dbang rgyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go/ gzugs mad dag naasogs bzhi pa ha 'khrig bral ba
rnamus te a 'al sogs pa bcu drug gzugs// bu sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byeng gcig pa kas 'o// srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir
ma srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo// srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur de a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so// rin chen snang nas
gsag ma'amu na demal bar nges par brjod de bya ba'i mu nag nyes pa'o/ dra'adam gyi chu ngang ma bgrad du ba dag dang ma dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'beng 'dun pa dang// lan tshwa chang dang chudang 'o ma
dang mar dang sAng rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun par bo na// 'od sngon man da ra bar ni paNanor bu'i 'od dang poN bsil ri rdo rje'o// gling na zla ba 'od dkar dag ngang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci
dang khrung khrung dang// drag po yang na les spyodas ste bdun pa 'dzam bu ma rnams gnas pa dgra na las kyis// shar du rlung ni nyan tu zlum por 'gyur te sa yi bdag po lho ru ma ni gru
gsum mo// byang ngumu ni phyad kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchogs ni chu yi gter gyi zur// ri rab lhun bo stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su sta//
sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ra dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams ngag tu 'gyur// lcan po ya ra stang ga rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phragan//
lnga bcu bcu drug ngag ge gcig ni rab mchog yi gzhi la kher yug dag gi yang dag ste// ra ni lnga po rnamo ngag nga dngas gzhi ngag ga gnas la phyogs kun tu n khor yug go/ de yi phyi rol
thang dang ri bo rig dang chu gter rnams te pogs kun tu n ma dang rlung// tshugater drug po thams cad ngag kyang zla ba zla ba gcig gas dran pa'i stong phrag re'i ste// gling rnams drang ni 'irgyud
mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i steng phrag nye shartsaldan// 'dzam bu'i gling gi yas pa dag dang lan tsha'i chu yi gter na 'bum phrag phud kyi tshang yin ste// srid pa gsum ngo 'dzin pa yin/
mtha' la drag gi ma dang rlung gi tshang dag de bzhin ro// tshangs pa 'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor le rgyal ba mchog bcas la yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun po lan tshig mnga'i tshogs
dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnos pa ku rnams dgar rags lnga'o// dpal ldan lhun po' phyogs rnams kun dus yi dkyil 'khor la sor gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun
nga ngag dang 'dus pa can dang re lang gnas ni ma dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar// shar du brgya byin mar ni ma lha gshen rdzabaden bral nub phyogs sun gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor

ka/ @#// sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnong spyod drag po steng gi tshe dang 'og tu yang// tshas dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogasan srung zhing skyong
bste// de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog ga skyid mdzad gzhom ngu mang pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun po'argyab kyi phyogs rnams sunas gzhungag la rtswa man rnams kyis rgyal bar
dka' ba 'khor// gang du chesani rnam par nyams shing rtsod pa 'jug pa de dang deran rab tu bgrod par byed// kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du btsem su rang gi chos la dgod par byas nas/
mdun du rnam par rgyu// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan ngag dang rtsod dus gnaman dus kyi sbyor ba dgags 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can/
rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de/ rgyal po ri rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu sta gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag ga la yi/
tshang ni stong phragan+ti rtsa gtsag ro brgyadag dang bcas pa ste/ 3re ra dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur bra'i mi rnams dag la brgyu gang yan pa'o// pra dbugs rlu dang chu tshod nyin
zhag rlu ngang dus bzhi dag ni steng phrag nyishu rtsa gcig dang// drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang ma ngang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni/ nus dang gtso po'i nyin zhag
gcig gi tshad de sa gami dag la ngas b.lenus nga 'tshad du 'jug/ dur du dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo ran bgreng nyin zhag gcig la rem b.ru gnyis so// phyogs ngang zla ba mtha' dag
ngang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni ma dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis/ rgyal po lo na mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor murong dag dang muya srang rnams te/ 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lusu
sas lnga dang ma dang 'byung ngo lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtsobo' zhag re 'a sta srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su nge ban ni// le 'ad nas ni drag brgya'i le yas
gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes bya bar 'gyur// de nas ku yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par ma ga'i yul du kla klo'aches dag rab tu 'jug/ de yi dus su 'dzin ma lan
nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar ma rnams dag gis rag par bya// mtha' drag sa gzhi 'a ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur// ma mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la

rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsras ka glelir ni rab tugrub//kaklong ba ba'i len lagapa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang ha man+tabasgyur//zhag pa la sogs zla ba bsres pa'og tu dus kyis
bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye// red pasnyapa du bsres pa dag ni ma yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la
gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur// rtsa pa dag la drug gis rmasared je yang du len du 'gyur dbus ma la ma sbyang bar bya// steng 'og dag las lag dang sum cu'i
nor na bsres pa gsal bar byas drug cu'i chadag gis// rApo pa stong du rab nga sras thub pa mchog rnams ngag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag na graDa' ru 'gyur// gnas nyid lho zla bsres nga
dag las dus dang mas thob la 'byung ba bsras pa mtha' dag na// de yisteng ga phung bor sbyin te rang ngo lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyud dang gnyis kyis phya ba tshogs// gnas gsum dngus
U ma dag nadabang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob bar// gnyis bsras dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor tastang gi phung por gnyis kyis ni//
bsgyur nas byin la skar mas bgosalhag ma bangag nyi ma'i skar ma lasogs longasaspyod dag tu 'gyur// gza' la gza'an rab spyan ma bdaganyung 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs
ngagal yang gnyis// skar mar gnyis dang chu tshod drang po bar du rab gsal ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin// 'di dag zla ba'ongs par 'gyur slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tusbyin

par gsungs/ tshis rnams sbyin dang der ngang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni gza' dang chu tshong rkang pa rnams su ste// tshogs kyi cha la nu gter zla bas mnyam dang ma mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin nger rkang
pa'i den// stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mag dang nyam dag la phyogs// bcu garug ma 'a sa zhes byas bcu dang chug ter rkang par nyi shu gcig gis ngan pa 'o//

lnga dang bug par nyashu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de la tsama'i rab tu dbye bas gsal byas nyimar rkang pa dag ni sbyin dang der bar 'gyur// 'byung dang 'byung
ba mda' dang rig byed ma lag ri bong can ma snga ma'i mdang gzhan la yang/ tshogs kyi cha la chugader zla bas mnyam dang ma mnyam thob la rgyu ba rnams na sbyin dang ngor// rgyu zhing yod pas

lug ma bskyar la las ni dus dang nyams cha thob dag kyang de bzhinano// de nyeng lan nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyi ma'i rkang pa'i chu tshod sbyin dang dor bar 'gyur/[‚Äù ]/gang zheg reg byong rnams kyis/
tshes bsgyur gsal bar nor te nga yi sumachangag gis bsres pa'o// dus kyi rgyu skar rkang pa gsum bcas bu len dag ste nyi ma'i longs spyod dbus nas sbyang bar bya// bya ba lhag ma mig
ngamar ji bozhin ro dus ri bong can rnams dal ba'i las la rkang pa ste// losaspyod kyisan chu tshong bsgyur nas zla dang yon tan zla bas cha thobo longs spyod dang bcas pa// bgrod pa 'gro ba'i
dbang gis nyi ma la ni spyin ngang dor pa gzhan du ngag pa yong ma yin// rim la ni dus ro sprul dang bcu dang 'phrog byed 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug/ me dang nam mkha' ngag
bya@#/// kyang bgrod pa 'amathur te byang dang lce ru nor dang du len dag tu 'gyur// zla ba 'ang ba'i dpe ba dag las phyogs kyi dbye bas zla ba drug na nyen mor byed pa samyong
nyim la phyin tshes grangs ngag kyang 'og tu re yis bsgyur la gza' yis lesaspyod bsras po ngag/ ngaman por gyur pa ri bong mtshan mar 'gyur te ma yi bdag po nyi zla bsres pa sbyor ba 'o//
byed pa dag na tshes la mig gis bsgyur ba zla bral gong zhag bdun gyi ma yi lhag ma 'o// dag pa'i lel klu bsres mkha' dang nam mkha'i mugater gyis bsgyur klu bsras rnams kyis
sbyas pa dag/ riT+Tha ma yis rab tu pha nam mkha' res bsgyur ri la sogs pas bgos pa chu tshod de// gnyis dang sum cu'i gal dang nu tshod nges pa 'dir ltar zla ba dag la le yaM
'pho ba'o// lug sogs rnams kyisAn byed dag la gza' dong chu tshod rim par yongs bkod bcu gnyis 'di dag ste// zla ba re 'byung rig byed dag dang yon tan mnga' sta re pheng
can dang ri zla gsum pa la'o// rig byed ma 'byung zla ba mag drang lag pa dus dang rig byed mgar drug pa dag la 'o// drug dang zla ba meda' dang zla bar dus ma dang drug zla ra deng 'jig

rtan dang// drug dang rig byed stong pa dag ste stong pamig mda' ltama'i go 'phang nya yi khyim la'o/ zla drug 'phal dang 'grib par 'gyur te nyin ngang mtshan mo dag kyang nyam rab turgyu bas so// chu
gnyer srog dang chu srung ma ni nyen zhagaso so'adus su 'phel 'grib bgrod pa la yan lag gi/ lce phyogs sun mtshan mo dag kyang 'phel bar 'gyur te kha ba'i ri yi byang du nyin ma 'o// zla ba dag
la mig dang nyi ma bsras pa mag gis rnam bsgyur zla ba'i tshig la gcig bsros te// mkha' dus chu yos rab phye thub pa lag pas bsgyur ba'os kyang mkha' sogs cha yis skar la 'o//
lhag ma drug rus bsgyur pa gang yir dre las tshutshang slar yang de bsgyur ba las rusrang ste// thob pas dman nga 'a 'khor lo gdong du 'gyur dmun can mjug ma dag kyang smyugar phud bsras
pa'o// zla ba sumanus bskyar ba nyer zhagaso so dag ngang b.rus po las ni ra mkha' ras thob pa// gnas gsum dbus su rnam par bsres pa las kyang chu gter ros sheb man pa mar/
gsal nyin zhag go/ 'dus gcig gis ngesras pa dag kyang gsal ba'i nyin zhig tshogs te ka dus kyis bgos pa yi// lhag ma skar mas bsgyur thebasar yang nas sa khawa re sa/
bsgyur las mi la sogs pas gos pa chu tshod de// mig ngamar la na phyid bcas dgu sbyang gal te bu 'dzin lhagan 'khor lo bsres la rnam par sbyang// phung pas lhag par 'gyur ma 'khor
le phyingan der bar bya sta dor ba'i lhagamaramagis 'gyur// skaram drug cus bsgyur te mutshod dag dang rab tu ldan par gyur pa 'byungame zla bas bge gang thob dal ba'i las ngag la yang nor dang/
bu len dga' rim pa min dang rim pas so// de nyid bco brgyad ran rab tu gsal bar re rkang 'khor lo phyed la khyung dang 'og tu// longs spyod kyis na chu tshong bsgyur
las mda' dang yon tan zla bas 'kher le phyed las cha sheng pa// snga ma byed la gzung byar 'dod de rkyang pa'i dbang gis de bzhin phyi ma phyang la dor byar 'gyur// zos pa tshogs gcig
byas nas gza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis sbyin dang der ba dag kyang mutshong la'o// de nas nyimaras skyes rnam par sbyangs bya ba nyi skyes dag kyang myur ba'i las la'o// zla skyes dkar pa/
la yang nyi ma dag ste myur ba' las la nges par rim pas nor du 'gyur// sprangs pa'i lug mas 'dir na rkang pa dag sta gza' rgyu rkang pa rnams kyis lhag ma'i nu tshong bsgyur// drug
chu'i chayis thob pa goza' rgyu rkang pa dag las gzung bya dang ni dbrog bya de bzhin nyid// zlos pa dgan tshigs gcig byas nas goza' yi bgrod pa'i dbang gis spyan dang der ba mtha' dag
sto a skyes la ni rkang pa rgyalaM ba sogs pa rab gsal ma nu'i gnas la mtha' dag gzhag par bya// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyi ni rim par yongs su brtsi ba reg par bya 'o maM
yi dbang// zla myus dkar po lasan nyan mor byed pas rnam ngag zla rgyus dkar po dag tu yang dag 'gyur// stong dang nam mkha' zla bas bsgyur ba'i mtha'adag nyin zhag tshogs la ma ngang

nye ma ra yis ngaman// ri nas rug pa re dang klu yis bag ste slar yang lhag ma skar ma la sogs dbye bas bsgyur// rab brjod ma yis rgyu skar dag dang slar yang chu tshod rnams na zla skyes lengasaspyod
ngag tu 'gyur// zla skyes der te nyi ma'i dbus nasam bdag bzang po ma bdag skaram phyed kyang yang dag spang// lhag ma'i bya banor dang bu len dul dang myur ba'i las kyang mig ngamar ji lta btsani

'phrosami yi bdag po mkhur tshos gnyis po de bzhin 'dra// nu ma'aseng ni mchan khung du zhugs gza' yi tshogs rnams mtha' dag ma stag ngag dang bcas par mthong//
mgrin pa lus dang bcas ba res shing 'khor ba ang malus la 'tshabo'i mtshan nyid ngag tu 'dod// skyo ba dang ni btsa' ba'i dus dang byis pa gzhon nu dag gi gzugs ni byed pa
gang yin pa// de nyid 'jig rten dag tu slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo can te nyim man// zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo' tshal bcos//
ldan de yis zos// slar yang nyin mo'i dus su mtha' yas rnams kyang gtong bar byed de bskyod pa'i rgyun rim pas// skal sogs pa drug po rnams ni las su 'gyur te dbang po
drug po drag kyang byed pa'o// ledang zla ba phyogs dang nyin dang mtshan mo tshes dang zla ba nyi ma dag kyang khyad pa bo// de dgaphyud pa'i byed po gzhan du 'dar 'gyur spyod pa'i spyi po nibad
pa po ma yin// mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can tu yul dang rnam bral yon tan mod la rang bzhin med pa'o// dra ding khra dag dang ni ro dang reg pa zhes dang 'dzan ma dang no chudang mi
dung rlung// nges par gzugs can brgyad po rnams nu ma blu'i dag yul gyi rdzogs pa dgas gcig n gtsobor 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag 'du na sa bdag dang sdudapar 'gyur
tadus kyi mthu las so// sadang stong pa dang na chos kyi dbyings dang yid kyang ma ya bdag po gzugs med du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid 'ching ste rang bzhin la gnas yon tan rnam rtog rnams/
kyis dar gyi srin bu ji bzhin nyid// bdag nyid bdag gis nges par slar yang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid dag las ni gtong bar byed// de phyir rgyal po rang las rang bzhin yon tan la gnas
sdug bsngal dang na bdu babyed pas// rang bzhin rnam par bral bsu zhig byed po cazhigakhyed nga mi shes 'jig rten rmongs par byed// sa dang chu dang ba dang rlung dang nam
mkha' dang ni yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin drug gi sams/ rags dang phra mo gzhan yang rnam gsum yon tan la gnas yi gathig le la sogs dbye ba yis// rags pa rags pa dbang
po rnams la rang bzhin gyis kyang gnas te phra mo'i sems la phra mo yang// ye shes la yang yashes skus rang bzhin rnam 'gyur med pa'i 'tshob 'byung ba byung ba min// asogs stong pa ldani rang/

bzhin rnam par 'gyur man dpal ldan tshe dang thig le nA da dang// dus dngasams dang blo rang bzhin dag kyang de bzhin gzhan pa'i dbyangs ni rlung la sogs ba 'o// rags pa snga pa'i yi ga rnams ni gsum/
gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu ste bcu drug gzhan n rnam 'gyur ro// de dag dbusasu rdo rjecan na rang bzhin minacing rnam 'gyur min te khyab byed rang bzhin med// 'khor bar bad dang sdug bsngal/
rang bzhin yon tan la gnas lasalasagyes bden za bsta// ma rnams kyi na las 'di dag kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur du rags dang phra mo zhi ba'o// bdag ni byed pa po yang khyad par 'os te/
gzhan ba phyugs bdag kyang yong byed pa zhes pa las/[‚Äù ]/byed po bdag gam gzhan pa min te rang bzhin rnam par bral bar ngashes pa de ni las ma yin// de phyir byed po 'ga' yang srog chags
rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal dgan mo sbyin mi 'phrog ste// 'khor ba dag tu rnam pa gsum po gang byas ston gyi lasan 'bras bu rab tu sbyin par 'gyur// skyed dang sdud pa'i bud pa po
'di star zhing de ni 'phrog pa rmongs pa rnams kyi blo gros te// lus la dpa gamed drag ba 'phrog par byed pa'i bug pa rang ga dbang po dag gis mthong ma yin// 'dod pa'i nus dang bya ba ngagan
gsum bra ya shas nus pa 'gro ba rang gi yid las// dngos po gsal ba dngan 'jug pa dag dang romanyamargyuran dan la 'bar dmigs par byed// slar yang gtong ba dag na bzhi pa srid
gsum gyis btud gas med kyis kyang nges par rami pas so// de duganang nas dordzacan ni mi yi bdag po cung zad mi za gtong ba min pa nyid// bdagan byed po sdug bsngal bde ba rab tu
spyin por ma li bdag po deran 'gyur ba min// 'ga' yang btsas dang grol bar 'gyur min mi yi bdag po sams kyi nus pa rnam par sbyangs nas so/ nam mkha'i bum pa'i dbus nas chu
nilen par byed pa na yang 'gro ba man pa ji lta bu// mkha' khyab mkha' yi ro can niyul dang rnam bral lus kyi dbus dag tu yang de bzhin no// de ltar las na yod par smra ba por
'gyur bcom ljonaston pa gcig tung na byed po min// kun mkhyen dang bo'asangasargyus sringagasum gyis btung dus kyi 'khor lon tu 'khor lo can m yani// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag
po dag kyang gang gi zhabs kyi chu skyes drud du lcag par skyabs 'gro ba// dus kyi 'khor le rgyal ba mchog bskyod yon tan med cing rnam rtog med pa la phyag 'tshal/
lo zhi ba'i bsam pa lan lta nyid du 'gyur ma yi bdag po mun pa la ni dmyal ba 'di// rdul dag la yang dud 'gro 'di de rab mchog sa yi stangadu mi nyid dag na 'dres pa la/ 'byung po nyingan/

rnam pa gsumus rdul dang mun pa dang nasnying stobs phan tshun 'dres pa la'o// 'chi ba'i dus su yid kyi bsam pa gang zhig dran par gyur pa denaskya bo yang dag ste// lha nyid brgyad kyi dbye ba dgagases
lha yi mchog gi gnas su mi nyid gcig ni ji lta ba// dud 'gro dag kyang chu gter rnam pa nges par dmyal ba'i 'gro bar dmyal ba nyid ni de bzhin gcig/ gnas 'ang rnams su re yi 'gro bar sku
bo'akher te 'dus kyi zhags pas nges par bcangs dgadag/ sta pa 'bum phrag du mas thar pa mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang ngun 'gro zhing grol ba min// phung po khams dang dbang po dang nam
gsum sud pa 'jigs pa la sa kyi dbang po lnga dag dang/ detsam dang ni las kyi skyon dang yon tan dang bcas yod dang blo dang ngar 'dzin la sogs te// 'di dag gis bcings 'tsho za dag ni re
yi 'gre bar 'khor te phra mo'i dngos po dag gis slar// dngos po btang na ma zad mchog gi gnas su rab tu 'gro ste gang dusung yang skye ldan man// yan lag dang bcas reg byad dran pa'i
gzhung dang bcas dang rtog ge grub pa'i mthur ldan 'jig rten du// snyan dngags mkhan po rgyas pa ma lasogs pa rnams kyis byas pa'i bstan bcos gzhan yang rig pa mne/ rig pa ]
zhes panang rig 'gyur makyangs 'jig rten 'dir ni thub pa rnams kyis rab gsungs nyid// gang du 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ma yi bdag po slar yang gang du thim pa 'o//
rnal 'byor dbang po rnal 'byor ma thob rab tu g.yo ba'i yid kyis gal te shi bar gyur pan// dpa la ldan ma yi 'jig rten duni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan pa skye bar 'gyur//
sngon gyi goms pa de yis slar yang yashas rnal 'byor yangs pa dag ni kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur// ya shas thob nas mi zad mchog gi gnas su rab 'gro gang du sur yangs ba ldan pa min//
ye shes skya ste rgyal ba rnams kyu lta ma nyin mo'i dus su mtshan mo phyed dang mtshan mo'i mthar/ lta man rnams ni sgrub mtshan mo'i dus su nyim phyed dang nyin mo dag gi mjug tu 'i// yang dag
shes rnams nyams dag la tshigs legs sbyar tham la drag tu rab tu 'gyur bas// zha dang drag po las te srid pa gsum gyi gnas su skyes bu nyid dang thamal dag kyang ngo// nyi ma gung
dang mtshan mo phyed nas niyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su de dag gan za pa'i dus// bza' ba zan dang ba lang shas btung ba rnam mang bcud star dag dang sgo pa'i khu ba 'o// gosAn dmar dang dkar po
ngag dang nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa bzhin du mtho ris sa 'og gnas// chos na'atshamad 'tshabayangs bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis rdo'i lca min gdar ya nga ngo// 'byung bo rnams/
kyilas nu'adres mar rab tu 'gyur du tshig kyang 'phros pa sha za dag ga'o// chos ni 'tshamad 'tshaldan nges par bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog gcod la sogs skyon dag la// mchod sbyin la/
! sogs rten du rab tu 'jug 'gyur mi yi bdag po res 'ga' dgan 'dzeg pa 'am// bza' ba btung ba dag kyang 'dres pa nyi zla'i bgrod pa dag las 'a ma ni 'dres ma gzhan du 'o// 'od zer lam
re nyi mdzesnang ba dkar po nyin mo bgred pa byang dang lho a byad dag kyang// zla ba'i snang ba mtshan ma dag dang dkar min bgrod pa dradun ltos du bdag gi ma// 'od zer lnga rnams mtho ris su
dkar men dag kyang de bzhin lha min klu yi 'jig rten du// kun tu 'dres pas bdag ma yi 'jig rtan du nA yi dgas dud 'gro mo rnams dag gira'agyur// gang zhig gang gi dbus su rab zhugs
brtul zhugs sa pa la dga' las kyi zhags pas nges bcas pa// de ya dbus su rang rang bsam pas mi bdag de yi rigs su de yi 'dzan pa dag gis 'gyur// rjesrid sems kyi rang bzhin/
dgen rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gas tshor ba bde ngang sdug bsngal ba// desrid 'jigs rung 'khor ba 'dir 'khyam ma yi bdag po mtho ris mi yul dag dang 'og tu yang// kagogs sde rnams
ngabyas dang bcas pa dag kyang sngon tan gyis bsgyur gang yang phyogs gsum dag gi dbyas// nges par sum cu'i gsal byadang dag rnams pa rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas rlub/
sa dgaza' lta'i rkang pa nye ma ri bong can gyi nang pa dag dang sbrag can mjug rings rkang pa dang/ sumacu rtsa gnyis le dang phyogs kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur zla ba nya ma ma mis phu pa 'o/
lo gsum bya ni phyogs rnams dag dang ra bo can gyi yon tun dus kyi na ya phyogs gnyis dgu/ lo brgyalas nadam nagyur lhag ma'i phyogasan nye zla dag gi mnyam dngam mnyam bgrod pa la//
'jig rten mig dang ma mig grangs te nyin mtshan dus rnams gtso bdag gis dman pa mtha' dag ste// gsal byed la sogs snga pa dbyas rnams dgan nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis/
'chi bas zos// byed bcas 'khor lo'i chu tshod de pi can gyi rkang pa dang bral ba/zar yi chu tshod rnams dman pa// de dag rnams kyang shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dgag geg nyin mtshan dus
kyis 'che bas zes// de ltar snga pa dbyas pa cus dbyangs kyi tshogs dang bcas pa gsal byed rnams nyid dag dang rkang pan// dman dang bar ma dus 'chi zla ba nyima' 'chidang na gesal
byed lhag pa'i lano// sum cuganyis dang nye zhag gcig kyang re bong can bcas ma'i bgrod la rtsa ni gcod pa 'di// slar yang sum du mtshan mo gsum gyi rdo rje dang bcas/
@#// phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs 'der// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag der nas dung can mar na srog gi rlung drag nyin gcig rab 'jug sa// sa dang chu dang srog za rlung dang
zanam mkha'i khams ni rnam par chad pa srid nyid du 'o// dang por mtha' dag rgyal ba'i lus na dngos grub rgyur sngags pa drag gi yang dag bsrung bar bya// lus mdanani dngos grub mad
rtsi pa 'di la mchog gi bde ba thob par 'gyur ba'ang mad// de phyir lus kyi den gyi rgyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya// lus ni grub na gzhan pa'i dngos grub/
srid pa gsum gyi gnas su mngag gzhug nyid du rab tu 'gyur// stong pa la ni du la sogs lam bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis gzugs boran mtshams su bsgom par bya// de nas
rtsal 'khor lo rnams su srog drang thur sel rlungan brtan pa dag kyang byed pas// phyi nas zla ba nges par 'gog pa ga' bzhin byed de byang chub sems ni rnal 'byor pa yis so// de nas
gzhig cung zad 'dod pa dag ni nyin zhag 'ga' yisu skye ba' la thob par 'gyur/ nyi ma zla ba 'gog pa mnyam dang ma mnyam 'grod pa la ste dbu ma ma la rab tu zhugs// srog dang thur
sal gnyis po dag kyang nyin zhag dang po song na dus min 'chi ba slu ba// lag pa dang bcasu rkang pa'i sor mo' tshags dang sen mo'i mthar na srog gis kun tu gdabyas nas/
'khor le drug lasangs rgyas lha mo 'jigs med lag pa'i pad+ma rnal 'byor pas na bsgom par bya// thurasal bskum na 'dod par 'gyur te lus mchog ngag la rlung gnad na ma lus/
dag pa gro/ srog rtsol dag ni bad kan la 'gyurar yang de dag gtong ba mkhris pa dag giskyon 'a'o// stong dang 'og na yang drag 'gog pa bde ba byed par 'gyur te 'dus pa

dug dang rims la'o// lte ba'i snying du srog gi rlung ni ma tha' dragand 'phrog ste ba'i rtsa bar gzhan pa dag kyang ngo// bskum sta thur sal rlung ni rnam pa gsum gyi lam du bgrod pa dag dang srog nyid

stong nas kyang// ji srid yang dag 'phrad da min stobs dang ldan zhing lus kun la na khyab par rab 'gyur pa// dmu chu skran dngagazhang 'brum nad rnams dag kyang lta bar sron pa zla ba'i sbyor bas 'dzems
ba ste// dbugs 'ud dang ni glo dang rnam pa gsum kyi dug dang mig gi nad la sogs pa dag kyang ngo// mchan khung g.yas dang g.yas min las mirUm rag kyang stobs ldan mnan ta srog
ni bkag pa las// g.yasanas g.yon pa'i rtsar ni 'phral la rab tu 'babasta g.yon pa'i mchan khung las kyang g.yas su 'o// zla ba phyed kyis kyang na 'dir 'chilas 'phrog/
rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa yogs// rdo rje skyil krung du gnasarkang pa bzung ba lag pa'i pad+mo dag ni rgyab kyi zug rngu 'joms// stong du rkang pa dag dang 'og tu mgo bo lus la bang kun
nAda rnams mtha' dag 'phrog par byed// srog 'gog pa las nyin zhag 'ga' zhig gas na rab 'khrug gciba'amed dag nges par 'joms par byed// tho ras ming yod/
dag gis chu dang bral ba'i khar niso yi 'phreng ba dag la rab 'da' ba// mig rnams ngag gi mgasan du 'gyur slar yang nang na 'brog pa chu yas gter ba dag kyang re/[‚Äù ]/gan kyal nyal nas lte ba
lag pa 'apas bzung ba draganam zhu ba yi zug rngu'adzems// 'bras rnams 'byung ba las na sa par mar dang bcas pa'i tshayis bdugs na 'phral ba 'joms par byed// de nas askadri ma
byugs pas kyang nge 'ga' zhig tshan so sAn zug rngu darus gyur na// stag ldan gyi nas ben du bsgrubs la sogs pa dag gis 'dir bzung srin bu la sogs 'joms// le phud kyis na sregs
pa rnams kyi mchog gi lus la dkar pa'i mdza'abrog de las gzhan lta ci// shes rab 'dus la rab sems lhung ba drag kyang rtag tu srog gi rlung gis 'gog pa dag la gta// bdun cu'i le ya
rgya ba skra dkar bcas pa dag kyang lo gnyis rab tu rdzogasananges par 'phrog/ zhim 'ga' yis las dang sems ni rab tu 'grogs pa dag la re sang phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// srog rtsol
rab tu byas snying kha de bzhin mgo bdag ni ji srid ma yis gdung 'gyur ba// de las stong dag tu ni bzang po'i pad+mar rgyal bar 'gyur de ma bsnams pa 'am stobs dag gis// gtsug tor yug
cangaphung po drag dang khams rnams rnam par sas nas 'ching nyid du 'gro 'gyur te/ phyag rgya 'grogs par rab nyams skyes bu rnams kyi skya ba 'di nyid lan bde 'brasastar ba med// phyag
rgya sgom pa'in du gsungs te nyin mtshan dus su chags pa zad pa'i don ni mon pa nyid// gsung gi rdo rjemachod pa'i don dngos par sngags pa rnams la rgyas byed gsungs pa nyid ma yin/
khazus thams cad bde ba'i don te nyin zhagaso 'dus su azhu'i rgyur yang ma gsungs so// dpal ldan spyod pa dngos grub rgyur te mtshan mo dur khrod 'khyam pa dag kyang rtsed mo'i don ma yin//
mi bskyod pa na cung zad drobs khanadazhi bar byed de so yi zug rngunyid kyi yang// mtho ras mi bskyod brlabs pa dag mi mgo yi nad 'phrog de bzhin nyid du mun babs pa sa so// rnapa dag
dang mig tu gzhin dri dang grungs lo rab blugs gnyis ka dag gi nang 'phrog gi/ 'byung pos gzir la tsha ba gsum bcas mi bskyod brngubasan bde ba ster te thos pa nyid la yang// bshang pa
gcin dang khu ba khragan ma ya sha dang bcas pa zos pas tshon la bka'agyur/bsam gtan bcas par ma tog bsgrubs na sku dkar dang bcas chu bangang na lus skyes rnams kyang 'phrog/ sgron ma lta
po sbyang bu'i sags pa dag dang bsres pa zos pas mtha' dag nang gi phrog pa ste// bud med ma tog khu ba dag dang bsres pa legacig zos na rga ba nges par sel bar byed// rlung 'joms
lan tshwa skyur ba dag tu rab tu 'gyur te mngar dang/ sa bdagan mkhris pa'i dgra// bad kan 'joms pa kha ba kun dang de bzhin tsha ba dag kyang san rnams sam mikhu ba 'am//
bad kan 'drems pa ra 'e a tsha ba gsum bcas dag tAm nge'a'i ma mkhris pa'i ngag// rlung 'dzems dag kyang rdza mo'i 'om rnam gsum nad 'brog pa a lom dang 'di bzhin mar/ dzati
tsha bskol ba'i tshun dri bas kha nad zhi bar byed sa la zug rngu nyid kyang ngo// til mar dngos po 'a chu bskol tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa dag gis rnagayonand dag 'joms// mar dang 'o ma bskol
bar gyur pa klu dang dmar po dag gis rtag tu yi nang dag 'joms// karkoDA dang laM ga 'a dang An+ti bong bu'i chung bcas byugs pa sa 'bras kyi 'phreng ba 'brog/ lag pa dag ni rab
'byung rkang pa'i pad mnyan pa ngag dang srog gi rlung na 'gog bya ste// jisridi lus ni al rab tu lhung bar ma gyur pa dang tsha ba dang ni grol bar yang// yang dang yang du ting nge 'dzin 'a'achi
ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa 'tshar chacan ni nges 'dzoms te// sAng kha'i pad+ma zla ba'i gzugs can drin dar bong can mtshungs sna tshogs yum ni bsgoms pas so// slan chung bag
nas 'thungs bas tsha bas rnam par bsnyan pa'i ma rnams kyi ra tshor ma 'joms par byed// tshaba'i mthar n thod pa brdar ba ma bskyod bsus pa yis kyang 'jigs par byed pa 'brog pa
sta sngags kyang chu me rlung rnams dag gisngon du lo yag dang nibadzrasnga ma drag gamab/ de nyid kyis bsrung bar bya stamago mgrin snying kha lte ba gsang de la sogs rnams su'o// mnyam pa d+hAt+ti/
da myudang nagazhan yang de bzhin tin tir yi 'dab ma'i phyi ma dag/ nyi zla reg pa'i mun ngs par dri ma bral ba dag la rkang pa'i lhag mar bskol bar bya// de yi khu ba ka ra dang bsres gzhan
pa'i nyin zhag d gnas zhag gsum 'khrungs pa 'di yisan// so ka nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis bsregs pas 'chaskor 'phrog ste khams bdun song ba dag kyang ngo// gser la nyi ma khab len
lcags dang pa lngalas skyes lcags nimA kI ka yis gdab par bya// sa bon phyed kyis kyang ni dri ma dag dang bral ba'i dngul chu bsgongs pa sbrang ni drug tu bya// ba yi dwar ba drag po 'a rtsi mo can

gyis bas danas 'di'i na dengs ma gzung bar bya ba nyid// dang la ldan gong bu 'am len stod du slar yang bskol ba dag kyang dza srid phyad kyi tshad du'o// rab tu blangs te dag nga 'i ka ra srang brgyad
yang na dgun di la bsra ba nyid du bya// ngan thams cad dus su bza' bar byas kha zas rnams spungs bgrod pa ji srid nyid du 'o// zla ba drug gis lha ya lus taskra dkar gnyer ma dang 'phral
'di yis 'chi med nyid du 'gyur// de phyir de nyid nyi ma so so'i dus su bza' bar bya sta'on kyang gong bus rnam par dman// sngar brjod sa bon rgyal po mnyam pa dag ste gzhan yang
dngul chu la ni brug sa pa byed tsam mo// lan tshwa skyur bo dag gis mnyesanas rnam pa mang ba'o sman gyi dziwid gcig nyid du 'gyur ba// mkhris ba skyur pos muwa
sogs dang da ra dadang la dag kyang dngul chu mtshungs par mnya// de ya'i dngul gyi 'dab ma byugs pa gsar nyid du 'gyur Anam dag kyang byed dang ldan pas so// rnon banam maM kha la las
a skyas a la lan tshwaya khaklu ra dang nas rdza rim pa yis// 'thal bdag kyang nyim nyis 'gyur ron 'am byed pas nyima'i lhag ma dag ni bsreg par bya// slar yang lan mas dag pa dang nad
bzhan bal sa byung ba lasogs kyis bran 'jam par 'gyur// dngul lasum cha byin zhing bkang ste bsnun pa dag kyang ngag pa yi ni me tog nyid du 'gyur// a la g.yu 'phrangab dang g.yo
ba rgyun 'bras bu can dang bya rog rwa rgyas dang// karkol dngashing nyamu draut+pal 'bras bu ri dgas smyos dmar de r+ya pU ta dang// klu dang bsil bar Na'adab ma pa la tshudang 'khri shing
ka nam mkha' 'khyog po 'di dagun// rdzas lnga dag gis dra mdzod ri dgas ri bong can sogs bdug pa me tog chung la sogs pa sa so// mig zla mo dang rgya mtsho mda' drung yon tan chu gtar
ro dang lag pa zla ba mda' dang mig/ zla ma rgya mtsho zla ba dus dang dus mda' mig dang chu gtor mda'amag zla ba 'jig rten rnams// a la la sogs cha shas grangs rnams rim pas yongs su
bkod pa nga yig la lnga dag la rdzas na le tshesbyarab grong khyer la gnas dag pa'i chashas nyin zhag ces byas tre 'gyur ro// dzA til sogs med la 'khri shing 'ad ba ma ke la sha a grong
du rim pas dgod bya ba// rgyasmyogs sar rdza 'o ma pu ra sa pa dag ste bdug pa 'i bya ba rnams la bdug par bya// gapur ka ra ma tog ro dang ldan pa dag pasen mo dag ni me yi khrangashas kyis// de dag

spyang rtse dang bral dri yi chu yis gyur ba dag kyang spros kyi rang bur rab tu bya// lte ba dang po song hamu tA ra bong can dang nam mkha'i grong du khrus sbyor la dgod bya// gran the stag dang bu re rgyu dang rta

dwagazhan yang de bzhin dung ltar ng shun pa dag gi cha// rU cu murma brgya yisumtshan dang dmam d+hur na de bzhin snga' phyis dag la yang// sngar brjod ma bzlog pa la chu skyes bzhin du lus dang gran zi

gri gug nges par pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas lha min zur du lcags kyu dag tu 'gyur// rlud du rdo rje zhugs par 'gyur te sa yi bdag po drag po'i 'dab ma dag la rtse gsum mo// shar gyi sgor ni rel gyi

rnam pa mang po dus kyi 'khor lo dag ni ji srid par/ yig sham rnams kyi bu yu drin dang gdon gyis bcom pa'i ming rnams zhi rgyas don du 'di dag mdzod// bum pa brgyud na rin chen dang bcas
'dab ma bats+tsha'i kha dang so ma btang ba'i kham phoran// bdun gyi chu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas bkrus te slar yang nyungs karasogs kyis nges par brab// dri dang bdug phra mar ma rnam
mdza'abras bu re dang ma tog dkar po dag dang gos rnams kyis// rnam par bkra ba'i mchod pa byas te slar yang de nas zhi ba'i bsreg bya dgan sbyin sreg bya// 'o maso ba til lasogs
dang 'o ma'i rkang 'thung lnga rnams dag gi sam shing mda' brgyadang// mchod yon dag dang sngan drang zhul bsal dang na de bzhin nyid du rjed dang mchod pa 'di dag ni// rab mchogs pa stong du
ma mo rnams kyis gzir pa rnam rtog zhi ba'i don du bya bas// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams ma la bdag po dus kun tu ni mchod pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag med las kyi rnam smin srid pa
gsum dang dus kyi 'grob yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel las// yang dag byung dang reg byed bden pa gnyis kyis bsgyur ba'i dgun ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams te// phung po lnga dang

tu med pa'i sred pa dag gis brtag pa'i srog gis thar ba re// gang du thur pa'i tshad ni steng du nges par brjod pa ngan rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan pa 'od/ rig byed 'ad ni rang byung chen te srid nga/

pa dgags khan cis mi bsreg/ de phyir nges bar ston pa po yed rig pa'i ul dang ma 'ongs don dang 'dus pa ngag la yang// reg byed nam mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni gnas kyi dbye/

rigs ni kun tu gro man pa'i reg byed 'di dag klog drang 'dra ba min// de phyir shes ldan mkhas par gyur pa'i ma rnams dag la rig byed ngag na tshang mar ma gyur ro// gal te
thams cad byed po dbang phyug yod na de yang 'grob las longs spyod po gzhan ma yin// gal te dbang phyug las kyi byed po ma ni de yang kun nas thams cad byed por mi 'gyu'o//

nas so// sa dang chu nang gi rdul phran 'dir ni gal temakhal byed po'i dang por yod pa min// rdzaadag med pal na yul dang rnam par bral ba'i thamasatsad byed po sna tshogs ma byed de//

dag gi stod du rages kyi derang gis kun s so// kha khyer phyi rol du yang chu skyes 'dab ma rnams mdzod a bdagazhi rgyas la sku gzhan la min// yang n lasan thams cad la yang rdo rjer
bam 'gyur tes la phur pa dag gdebye ba brgyad// myagro d+ha dang a shwang bla ka rus lcags sang ldeng las skyes rtswa tAba'i ba an skyes// de bzhin shel gyi bum pa da na dngul mchog rang bzhin
dpal ldan thodapa dag dang lugs kyi deng// zas zhes bya dang gsar gyi bum pa rab gsal sa par shing las skyes dang sa yi rang bzhinano// zlum po brgyadaganyas sor du brjod de gnyis kyis
bsgyur ba'abcu yas dpas dang sor gnyis dag gi mchu// drug ge mgrin pa sor brgyang kha sta ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zhi rgyas dag la'o gzhan la man/ snga dronas na thun brgyad po rnams
nyi zhagaso so'i dus su'adang rgyag pa sogs la 'gyur// de bzhin de yi thun phyud dag la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su las brgyud dag na rab tu bya// nyim gung dang mtshan phyed dgan nyin dang
mtshan mo'i dus su zhib dag la spang bar bya// dus sbyor gdug pa'i gza' rnams gnas pa dragana'achiba' 'jigs byed de bzhin nyid du rab tu grags/ 'o ma dang bcas yam shing mda'
rgya zhi dang rgyas pa dag la gsadapa la na mo rus so// dbye ba la ni bya rog mjug ma seng lding las skyes keng shu ka na dgug dang dbang la 'o// bil baspo byed dgan khru phyad mda' brgya'i gras
rnams rengs pa dngan rmongs pa dag las// 'om mar dang khrag dang zhag dang rdul dang rdo rje'i chu dang mchil ma chang rnams bsreg bya ste// dur pa 'bru dang ga dang dug dang bcas ba dag dang de
bzhin skye tshes tog dmar bo dang// gal babanAs pa 'a 'thung ba dang na gser bzang me tog rnams nyid zhi pa la sogs rnams la bo//gshin rje bden bral zur dang
chur bcas rlung dang gnod sbyad drag po dbang po dag dang ma ru ni// slob dpon dag gagadan du 'gyur ta ma a bdug po zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag la 'o// tshon ni las gnyis dgal
'gyur de gtso bo' pang la yang dkar nag lam gur bo 'o// phyi rol dunasas rgyas dbu bas lha dang gshin rje chudang byang rnams dag tu tshon gyis// klab khung dag gam dkyil 'khor lan
rigs kyi dbang gis phyogs rnams su yang tshon nugadab par 'gyur// dgod pa la sogs bsangagater la sogs rang gi snying kha'i rdo ljadag las lha rnams spro ba 'o// shel lasogs
ba'i mchod yon snod la pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma mthAbong dgan bcu gnyis kyang// yu ba'i rtse mor snyam pa'i Ad de khyor ba drag kyang srog blugs spyin sreg bya ba dga' 'o// zhi dang drag po
chags dang bcas par 'gyur tre rigs kyi dbang gis lhan rings pa dag gi sku// de bzhin las gnyis dwags rab phyogasal zhing nges par dkyil 'khor la yang lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur ro// rnam
pa lnga ni rgyal ba'i dbang po gang phyir rnam gsum srid pa la gnas phung bo khamasaM sogs kyi// dbye yis tade las kyang ni lha rnams dkyil 'khor dag la rdul tshon rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur//
di thig skud khru na brgyud par 'gyur te sum sgril slob dpon gyen lag pa mthabang nas gcig gis// spoms su 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum gyi laman gnas pa thig skud gcig sku gzhan pa ma yin no//
zhi ba la sogs dag la rim pa yongs su bkod pa skyil krung rdo rje lha mnatsog pu dang// skyal krung phyed par dbye ba gnyis dang bungashang 'am nang par gnas pa dag kyang losakyi dbye bas gdan// shel
dang mu tig dang ni mi dang bong bu'i so 'am rus pa dag dang po de dang ni// pad+mazhes bya dbang mig lung tang bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis sngags bzlas pa la 'brong bar 'gyur/ khrizhig
ma tog dkar bo dang ni tshabu dang bcas nag po dag dang dmar dang ser pos mchod// bsil drang bshang ba sha ya smisan sbrang rtsi khrag ldan dag dang drag po'i spos dang bska ba 'o// 'khrul 'khor na
gro lha 'dab dur khrod re yi ras dang gro ga'i 'dab dang aka' 'dab ma la// shi rAkharta sa la btags pa dag dang dur khrodasar gnas rol ba khrag dang dug dang na// kha che tsan dan dmar dang 'bras
bu gsum gyi khu ba yu ba ba blas bri bar 'gyur ba ste// du ba bsel rus mjugash+lo gseradrang sang ldengalas skyas bal ba skyes drang aka'i su gu'o// kham phor dpal ldan thod bar mangar
gsum khrag dang sa tshal gong bu so phag dag gi dbus suni// rlon dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gtsang ba dag dang ro khas gzhi mi yis gdung dngos dag la/ 'khrul 'khor gzhag par bya bar
'gyur te dge dang mi dga'i dbang gis sngags pa yis narag bar bya// zla ba glang chen ya dgas rdza mo ra digs rta dang phyugs dang rus sbal lus la rim bas so// dpal ldan
derdza rnams kyis phyogs kun tu gnas mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs nas bar bsreg bya so// phyi nas 'kher le rtsabs bcudag la phyogs drang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni bsgom par bya/

tsha 'khor lo'i debus su gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang dus kyi zhal ldan khro po'i dribang po de shugs// de nas bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan gang zhig cung zad 'dod pa sgrub pa po yi sa bsgrub par bya//
ro rdzogasum gyis sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas ra ba gsum ni ring du mthong ba'i mtha' ru sku// tho rangs nas ni grib ma'i mtha' rus gzhi'i gnas las nam mkha' dag la derdzabartsags pa'o/
pa'i/ dbus su chu skyas nyi ma'i khru ga la ba gdan dang bcas pa dag dang dus gyi khru 'gyur ro// de yi steng du bdag nyid skras pa dag dang rnam par bral ba rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// sa gi
phyogs rnams su 'dir dang po rdo gsum gyis zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin byas// phyanas rdo rje bzhi yis phyogs drang phyogs bral du gnas bdud kyi tshogs ni nges bar bsreg par bya//
sa lha mo spyan drangs tshudang bcas pa'i ma tog dag gis 'di la mchod yon rab tu sbyin// de la gsol ba btabs phye nas sa ya gnas la dag pa dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa mdzod// rgyal
ngas lha yi bdag po dang bcas bdud nA de com ba dag la lha mo khyodan dpang du 'gyur// de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya zhing lca mchog gas btud bzhes shag bzhes shig bdag gi mchod yon/
ltar rgyal bas byang chub slad du bdud kyi ldan stobs ldan dag kyang rab tu bcom gyur pa// dubazhin bdag gis kyang na slob ma rnams la dbang bskur slad du bduda rnams hrams pa dag tu bya//
gang dag phyogs rnams kun na sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa rnamabral btsun mo dang bcas pa// de dag rnams kyi mchog grwa snyadzarjes dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur spyad du
bdag la bskyang du gsol// de dag kun la gsol ba btab nas srong lhung rang bzhin sra ba'i phur bu dag gis sa la gdab// phyogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha ldan ba rnams ni phyogs kyi chu
ru bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// zug rngusol ba dang bcas rAn 'che ba'i 'jigs byed s ye gang por sa par zhugs gyur na// gnas de drag tu yon tan dbang gis rnam par nyams par 'gyur
tade yi phyir na spyang bar bya// sa la rin chen dung dang mching bu dag ni rnam rgyal bde byed dkyil 'khor dag gangon du ste// khang bzang don dang khyim gyi don dang rab gsal nges pa 'dir
namachodasbyin la sogs slad du 'o// rdzogs pa dag la sani sbyang dang gzung ba dag kyang de bzhin bu rnams dag na yang dag blta// bcu gnyis pa la thog gdab 'dod ba ma nu'i nyin zhag
dag la dpal ldan rdul tshon dgye ba nyid// dbang la sogs pa nyal mchog gi bla mas spen te bdud na bcom pa'i nyin zhag dag la yang// de la mtshan mo rgyal ba'i rig
la rab tu gnas par 'gyur tamtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min// dug pa'i dus sbyor gza' la sogs pas mi yi bdag po mtshan mo gzhan la rab tu gnas par 'gyur// srog dang pa
'tshe sangs nub par gyur na de nges par bag ma rab tu gnas par mi 'gyur ro// slob dpon dag gis sa gzhi'i gnas su 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag gdamatha' dag shes nas ni// bya
ba gang gang byed pa de de mtha' dag de ltar 'bras bu dag ni rab tu byon par 'gyur// slob ma'i mgo bo snying kha de bzhin gtsug tor lta ba mgrin pa dpal ldan gsang ba'i pa dang ni//
rgyal ba la sogs gnyis ka'i rigs su gyur pa sku gsung thugs kyis bya ba dag gis bsrung byas shing// de bzhin sku gzugs sogs dang glegs bam rnams ni rapa gsal nges pa'i
tshig dbal ldan dbyangs rnams dgags te// sems can rnams ni thar pa'i slad du tshag bdag kyang gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor dag na bzhengs par bgyid// dag pa'i gnas na legs par

rnams dag gis dbus su sIng po'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur// snying bo lasan gyi rol mtha' dag rnams kyis bkod pa drag kyang dkyil 'khor chogabo' yi mtshams/ ra ba rta 'gas la
ma/ sogs rtsa mo can de g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor bu rolos la blta bar bya// gtso bo'i 'khor lenus+yas lha la sogs pa'i gdan lagasum 'gyur dag kyang tshangs ba'i gnas su ni// nyis
par mig dgags 'gyur te slar yang ri bong can gyi ka ba rdo rje'i 'phrang bar 'gyur// bzhi yis sangs rgyas la sogs par r rab 'gyur ra bid can gyi nga ril rdo rje 'phrang bar yang// lha mo sangs
rgyas dag gi bar du bum pa 'am ni thod pa 'gadan du re mig gsum gyis 'gyur// gnas de nas 'dare drasude re khu'i bar du nyin mor byed pa dag gis tshon gyis 'gyur te// phyogs zur
rnams su tshugator ri mig dug gis dra lasogs pa rnams kyi zla 7bar nyid// phyad dang bcas pa'i gcig gs re khA gsum ste dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sgo dang khyud dang// de bzhin
lags dang 'gram pa dag ste gsum gyis kyang na ba khyer chen bo dag dang ka ba phud// de nas byed dang gnyis dang dus kyinor bu'i rang bzhin snam bu dang na de[‚Äì]shal sa ru 'gyur// sgo yi rtsa
kha'i dang ponas ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i b.ru yis rta babs ka bar bcas par 'gyur// brag phyed stang du dor nas doshal phyed pa dgag mthagalA lu lAr yang khab tu 'gyur// ra mig drugag rta
babs 'og tu ner gyi bar dang ldan la 'byor ma rnams snam bu'o/ de nas rogis bsgyur ba 'dus kyis dpa la ldan tshon gyi sa sa re lu snga ma bar du ko/ phyogs zur rnams su nyem bad nyas/
'gyur ma nu'i 'dab ldan 'ama'i ramag dag gis bya// snying po'i smon nyis 'gyur rnatsho pa gsum gyi yon tan dbang gas 'di na phyi rol phyogs dag kyang// ra ba sogs dung de bzhin nyidadu
kyil 'khor gsum bkod rnams ni brgyad pa gsum gyas rab tu bya// de dag rnams kyi thog mtha' che la nyazla'adekyil 'khor dang na phyi la lde rje'i 'phrang ba yang// de phyod re mig dag gis
bya 'khole gang yin dkyil 'khor mthar yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// ka ba'i 'og tugadengs can rnams kyi dekyil 'khor du yang rab tu 'gyur te lha rnams shing rtan// nyi ma dag gis
ya debus dang mkha' dang sa gzhi dag la shar gyitshad nub la yang// de la sogs rin chen lnga dang gser dmar ka ta bya du mu tig la sogs dang// dbye ba lnga yi 'gru'am rnam mang
nor bu dang ni de bzhin nyid du btags pa 'tshon dag gis// phyogs kyi chal tshon gyi gdan la bdag po sa sa rgyas dbye bas rdul tshon gdab khar 'gyur// sor dang dkar dang dmar ba
sogs kyis sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang nim chung dag la rim pas so// shar du dpal ldan nag po'i sa ru 'gyur zhing lho ru nyim mtshungs pa dag ste nub tu yang// gser
mdog byang ngu gzhan tur bang radzazhi ba ltar dkar rdo rjecan gyi zhal gyi bya bas so// dkar dang dmar dang nag po rim par yongs su bkod pa'i snam bu dang na do shal dag gi// padacha
nyi kha dog gas pa dri med ri bong can mtshungs ngamar dang nag pa'i re re go ma// dbus su pad 'dab brgyad ljang khu dug se bung ba dang mtshungs ka ba rdo rje 'phrang bapa gyur// dbang ldan
man me rlung dag tu zla ba nyem lus dang nag be ser po rim pa yis// dung dang gaN+Di nor bu dag dang ldan pa zhes bya de bzhin bum pa dkar po mtshams brgyud du// khru ba chu sgros dmar po'i snying du
rab tu 'gyur tu nyin byed pad+ma dkar bo'i snying du yang// chu skyes dmar po'i lta ba lo na lha mo rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa dgag gdan du 'gyur// chu sa dkar po'i lta ba dag la lha rnams kyi
yang nyin mor byed par 'gyur te phyogs su 'o// phyi rel du ni gtso ba'i pad+ma'i dbang gis rdo rje 'thung bar 'gyur te kha khyer kha dog dkar// ka ba ser po bAku lAgil ba'i mdog tu rab 'gyur rta
babs kha dog sna tshogs so// dkar po'i mdog ste rnal 'byor ma rnams dag ga nor gyi bda'i snam bu dag kyang phyogs kun tu 'o// phyogs kyi char ni pad dmar por 'gyur te rgyal ba'i dbang
ma gis par dkar po zur du yang// zla ba nyi mas rnam dman de bzhin nyid du 'asrimad rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ma nu'i rdudab ldan no// mkha' sogs re khA lnga po gang yin de dag rang bzhin yon
na dbang gsi sum cha bar du gnas// ka ba'i 'og gasgo ya mtshams su gdengs can rnams kyi rlung sogs dkyil 'khoradag tu rab tu 'gyur// dbang ldan dang na lde man zur dus yi dkyil
'khor gnas zla 'dag go ma yi dbang// phyi rol sgo ya snyingag char na ri dgas dang bcas chos kyi 'khor lo spregyi mdog tu 'gyur// g.yas su bum pa dmar bor 'gyur te nor sbyin dang bcas
chub rje bo ma dang byang chub shing// dril bu me long ba danar bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar rkya babs drag las 'phyang bur gyur pa dang// do shal byed pa kha dog dkar por 'gyur te rags kyi dbang gi
shing rta sgo yi dbus su 'o// 'khor lo dkar drang dmar bo rang gi rgyal ba'i rigasakyi dbang gis rlung lasgo la phyi rol du// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba dag gis ma yi bdag po phyi rol rdo rje'abrang ba
ba dag tu'ang 'gyur// sgrom bas nad dag byed cing khro dang re 'a nabs rdzasamanyems pa rab tu gsal bar byed// chad bsa'atshab dang na'akhyog bos mi yi bdag po dang bcas grong rdal de bzhin
nyid duskyod// mtshan ma nyin zla ba chad na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i dngos grub med// rnam par 'dres pas rigs brgyud 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyis rdulatshon/
dkyil 'khor dag la rig par bya// gang zhig rgyud kyi nang du rgyal bas gsal bar ma gsungs mtshan ma de ni mdzes pa'i don gyi rkyang/ dkyil 'khor dag la dragod par mkhyade
nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o rgyalabaspyod mdzad rigs lan// de phyir rgyud las gsus pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sgo ya mtshams nas dkyil 'khor la'o// dengashal byang ba'i mthar nas la
dkyil 'a khor gzhi la bad khul sogs mdzes pa rab tu bya// nagapa lasogs rkang pa 'bul bar 'gyur ba dag na rdul tshon dpas tanas gcig dag nas kyang// ra ba rnams nusum 'gyur nyin
mor byed pa ri bong can dang chu skyos re khA nyis 'gyur ro// snying po dag las phyi rol dpangasan nyes 'gyur du 'gyur ma yi bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di la sa// do shal phyed pa'i mthar nas gcigs zhu
srog za rlung dang rdo rje'aphrang ba rnams la 'o// dbus nas sgo la dang po mtshams mnar gyi blo gros mar 'gyur 'jig rtan khamasakyi dkyil 'kher la// sgo nas tsaka mthar sum 'gyur gangs
can ra mgo dag gis lan tshwa'i rin chen gnas su 'gyur// de nas rgyal ba'i dbang po'i re mig gis kyang ma ya dkyil 'khor de nas de bzhin rlung du 'gyur// de yi phyi rol du na de dag rnam par dgapas
sa chu srog za rung rnams blta bar bya/ gtsug tor zhal dang mgrin pa sum 'gyur gdengs can re mig dag gis dkyil 'khor 'khon sbyang bar bya// de nas lhun po mtha' dag sum 'gyur gdengs
can re mig dag gis sa ni ji srid nyid du ste// ramig drug drug dag gis rim pas gsal bar klu yi srid pa dang na sa 'og bdun bo nyid// de ltar sa la sogs pa thams cad spur yang de bzhin rang gi

lus dag lani sbyang bar bya// gnyis dang chu gtor gcig rang chugater gtsug ni dus ro rtsa mo can gnyis dus phyod dus phyod dang// dus dang dusan rab phyi drag dang dus dang ro dag kyang ste skyon gyi ma

rnams rim pa las// snying bor lte ba rtsibs sam pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag dang de nas ka ba rde rje'i 'phrang ba dang// bar dojala'aphrong bar 'gyur ltas dag dang ni de nas po dgo khyud la sogs dang// ka ba
rab kha khyer dug dang slar yang de nas sam bu dnganang shalas dag dang// ma los yi snam bur 'gyur re mi mi bdag po rta babs rab tu gsungs pa'i cha rnams kyis// phyi rol du niso sogs
thams cad nyes 'gyur du 'gyur phyol du yang de yi nyis 'gyur ro// phyi rol dun pad+ma 'khor lo rnams dang shing rta'i dkyil 'khor rnams na nyen byed dag gis so// o yig ye shes las skyes
rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba ni ma dag gi gdan sta du// asogs ka sogs stong par bcas pa ngag dang srid gsum skyed par byed ba'i yum gzhag par bya// stong pa a laga rnam par bcad pa
dbyangs dang bral ba mchogal sku gsung thugs kyi sde ni// yang dag 'byung ba sngags kyi skye gnas mchog gi bad byed ye shes rdo rjedag ni bzhi pa'o// rgyal ba'i bdag bo'i pad sna tshogs mdog
zla ba 'am ma yi stang du hUM yig ste// phyogs 'dab rnams la a sogs stong pa phyogs bral 'dab ma la yang hasogs stong pa rnam pa bzhi// dbang ldan baden bral zur dang rtsa
mo can dang rlung du sku dngagasung dang thugs dang chags pa ste// hAyig la sogs bum pa rnams kyi 'du ru 'gyur taraM/hazhes pa dag gi mtha' 'diriro// shar gyi chu skyas steng du a yigartsa khro can

du pad+ma la gnas i yag ring po nyid// gshen rje lha min du na ri yog dgastanor sbyin 'brog byed du gnas thung ring u yogadrag/ chu dang rlung gi zur dag tu yang pad+ma la gnas thung ngurang ngo drag ga la
yig ste// nag po dmar bo dag dang dkar bo gser mchog dang mtshus khul gyi dpo ba dag gis dgod par bya// shar gyi sgo ya lho dang ma yi padal gnas thung dang ring ba dag ni de bzhin nyid//
de bzhin ar yig zung na gshin rje lha mnangag tu gnas tanub tu la yig zung dag go/ o lo gnod sbyin drag po ru phyogs la chug shin rje gnod sbyin dang bcas sgo byang du na// oM aTasogs ris
ba yisan slar yang ya ra wal lha sogs sgo yi bad la'o// shar dang byang gisgor na ri bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dgagi gdan du 'gyur ba ste// lho dang nub tu pad+mar nyi ma dgan gnyes pa dag gi
gdan du nges par rab tu 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis pad+mar zla ba nyam dag kyang gdan du 'gyur// g.yas dang rgyab tu sumar 'gyur ta lha yi bdag po ner snyan du yang zla
ba'i gdan du 'gyur// thig le'i rnam pa dag gis rnam phye nges bar pad+ma la gnas kasogasal ya yi ga yang// rtsa ba sdong bu 'dab ma dang na gsal le ba dag la rim pas yongs su bkod blta//
sa sogs nam mkha'i mtha' ka kha ga g+ha nga zhes thung ngu ring po rang gis la'o// thig le zla ba rnam par bcad pa nyin byed du 'gyur gdan yang lta ba drug gi steng du'o// sde drug thung dang rang
rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khra khyor dag la ka ba'i ngos sun// dre la sogs rnams rim pas rang rigs sa la gnas te shar gyi tshanas rang gi phyogs rnams su'o// phyi rol dun
thig le sogs kyis phu bsam 'gyur sems kha khyer dag la de bzhin nyid// 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rigs phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog dbye bsaso// thung dang ring
ba'iha yig dag na lha dang nor sbyin nub dang lho ru tsartse kasogs kyi// khyab 'jug ma sogs dag ga kA yig a sogs kyis phyi ma dang 'brog byed rlung dang lha min du// phul sogs dang k+khalaso ga
pa grangs brgyad pad+ma'i 'dab mal gnas mdun rgyab rang phyogs su// ya sogs thung dang rang ba drug rnams lha yA pad 'dab ma yi bar dag la rim pa yis// de bzhin gshin rjelha min pa pa'i 'dab
mar thudangurange po rab tu dbye bas ra sogs te// gnod sbyin drag por lha la sogs dang chu gtor dang bcas rlung gi pad 'dab rnams la la la sogs// shar gyi sgo yi lce dag tu yang
pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas dbyangs kyis phye ba tsa yi snga// thung lha u0f00na gyi starang po rnams kyang ma ye zuban gnas ba rlung ga in par 'gyur// de bzhin gshin rjer/
ma dang re yi gdong pa dgagaTi sde byung dang rang po'i reb dbu yis// g.yon dang dbang ldan du mang pa sngar 'gyur te chu gter dngan ring po'i dbye bas tshogs kya'o// brgya byin dang ni tshangs ba
