rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur// khro ba ldan stobs rnams dgastarab tu gsal zhing nges par debang bo rnams ni lnga nyid ngo// yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam na mi yi bdag po lha man dag las
skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye pasasrid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te// de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa ya stangag gnas su rnal 'byor
yis rig par bya// de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad ma yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang n de bzhin 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba 'am gtsar bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas/
bram ze 'am// thod pa can dang sgra 'bab dngan gos dkar dag d bzhi ng skyong rigs can dngan thub pa dang// smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan makhas pa dpan grwa pa nyid 'gyur
rnal 'byor pa zhidangos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gtar tade nyid theb pa'om ye dbang// mthe bong dgan mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin du de gung mo dang sa ming mang dang/
de yi mashar na nges bar mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gtir du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// phyagargya'i don du mang ga deb bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so// btsang

ba brjod na rdo rje bacing bar 'gyur tu nges par khu tshur bcing pa la yang de bzhin// khu tshur b.ru ya stang du rdo rjegadan la gnas pargyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phug rgyur 'gyur// spyil krung la na lag pa g.yon
par 'gyur tagayas pa du samo'i phyogs nas sa lasor gyur pa// sa la reg pam bskyod phyag rgya'oslar yang lag pa g.yas ba mchog sbyin phugan rin chen gyi// g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan
kyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dug gir 'gyur// g.yon pa spyil grungastang du gnyan pa lag pa'i mthilan 'jig medang phyagon ral gri yi// g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas mar 'a ste nges par slar

yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcangs pa la// gsal bar snying khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgyagazhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyani// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur pa

dang na gung mo la sogs brkyang ba 'o// lag pa g.yon la shin tu gang ba'i dramang ra bong 'dzin ba gsas la rdo rje nyi gsu// pa zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byang rdo rje khro bo las rgyas rtsa mo lnga pa'i
bsgoms nas yan lag la reg btsan pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o// 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor le'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgyasIg pa'i drim 'phrog pa 'o/
gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i dngos pos skyes chu rgyus mngawaskyas drod gsher skyes sogs dang// bza' ba btung ba ban 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang nazhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg
bar bya// gang gang bya blta bar spyor bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya// sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor den dang rkang pa bgreng pa la yang rnal 'byor pa las bsnan par bya/
lag pa dag gis rje rjes bcas pa yos na nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcangs pas gtso bo srid pa gsum les rnam
par rgyal ba yi// mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams pa rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'i// lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can
rnams kyi phyag rgyur 'gyur// mthe bong dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dgan brkyang ba dang// mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming mad 'og tu bskum pa rang
gi lag mthil son gyur pa// phyag rgya'adi ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba 'o// rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du mthe bong la sogs
mtha' dag rnams// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcas ba rdo rjer 'gyur te dzo rdzakhu tshur drag gus dril bur bcas// khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag
kyang ra' tha rnan por 'gyur// mdzub mo laso gas rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag sto khu tshur phud pa yin rtswa gsum la// dpal ldan gro gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe'u chung zla babad
pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur// rna ba'i stang du khu tshur bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i stong du 'gyur tamada' yi mchog la 'o// khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shan tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro ma bdag
de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o// rtsa bar mdzub mo me mdadu 'gyuramapa' dang mtshungs pa'i stong du gung mo yang ni mdung las// thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la kho lag mthil shan tumanyom la mthe

bong brgya la dgras la// stong du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur tulha man bdag po gling chen lcags po dag la 'o// mche ba la'i lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba

phyad pa'o/ kha Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil stang du son par 'gyur// kha TaM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba 'o// sor

mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa bad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la// gzhul lag pa gan kyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba 'o// gung mo dag na mdzub mo 'khyog

po kun tu brtan par 'gyur tanges bar rdo rje zhugs ba la// rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdakade dag rnam par phyed pa la// chun rgyu ba lan mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og
du khu tshur ro// ma leng lan shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs par 'gyur// mthebong la na mdzub mo lasogs stang du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcag
sgrog la/ mgo bo lanamathe bong lasogs bzhi po gdeng dang mtshungs shing 'og tshumaze'u chung bskum pa ga/ cod pan la na lag pa dag gis dung ga phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur//
lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams na gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la// lag pa'i rgyab sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul pa'i rgyan lase// lag pa gnyis

ka'i sor mo gsum n phan tshun sbyar cing thog ma kho bsum pa dgazhaska rags la'o// khu tshur btsas nas mthe bong dag ngang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdubal/ da bzhin du'i dbu rgyan
zung dang gdu bu la mang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar kha dag tu 'gyur// mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur tamadzub mo gsang ba ba rnams kyi// drib rnams dang gdengs can rnams
kyi gung mo mang mod dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o// 'byung po rnams kyi dang la ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil na srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur// grub pa rnams kyi khu tshur ba cis
[5 ]@#// pa mchog gi rigs kyi mtshams na lha rnams dag gi 'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i mthel du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgyasngar mo can rnams kyi// khu tshur bcings las

badzub mo gnyis po phud 'khyog nges par mgo bar son pa rwa can rnams kyi 'o// mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe'u chung phran tshun bcas shing ga sheg pa sbyar ba sgoskyas rnams kyi ste// sor mo lnga po
mo 'khyog pa gdengasacasanamAkyi rigs kyi phyag rgyakhyad par 'phags bar 'gyur// nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma lan mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa 'og tu sbyar byas pa// 'bar ba drag la
( ar+ya bongaspyar ta mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba chazhan pa'o// mdzub mo bsanamalegs par 'ongosas ma dag kyang nges par brjed par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang// gnyid kyis
tsa shin tulog par 'ongos drang skal bzang dag ba mkhre bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur// sor ma'i sa gal rdeb pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchogaces sapal brjod par 'gyur bas//
mthe bong dang na mang mad dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyong ni tshim par byed pa 'o// sir go thams cad rtsa mo brkyang bas skal bzang legs pa ra 'os pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la
yang g.yom gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed// skyes gnas dug la reg pas gtso bo mtshu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sa na ma 'dabs
tsa0 pas kyang// sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung lo drung na mthe bong brgyung bas dam tshig rjod par byed pa yin// mchu dang smin ma lag dag la zhung sage la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs ba
rjod par byed/ mchab 'i dbus su mthe'u chung dang snying kha kha ru mdzubamo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed// mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang na lag pa rkang po sa la rdoban nga yas bza' par
bya[j]lcog la regan zos pa dang na lce dang so la bsnun pa drag gis ma zos pa nyid de// lag ba'i rgyab kyis song zhig nges par rab tu rjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cigage/ byin pa
bar la 'odran skal bzang khyod na de ring kho na ngalaso nges par rjod par byed// rkang pa rab tu skyong pas gnyid dwang dus mo zung dag skyong bas bdag la shin tu dga' ba rgyus// yan lag kun la rag
bar khyad cung 'a ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa 'o/ phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor le 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed// mah+phe bong ming mad rtsi mo dag gis rnam

mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya// rkang pa lani'aphrug bar phyed na de bzhin dun pa 'ol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang// mdzub me phan tshun brtsis na rde rje'i grogs po khyod ni

da rang 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa 'o// smin rang gi so yis gcod nam yo phyugs khyod 'dir ni lhung bar bya brjod bar byed// sa ni phan tshun 'dor bar byed na khyod kyi gna'adi dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya/
lce mamugayo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya 'o jag par rjed par byed// mchu la e na 'debs par byed na byed kyi rgyu ma lta bar gnas 'di bdag gi bza' bar bya//

ba sgrug pa sbyor ba yis ni/ga bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o// gar gyi sbyor ba yis mgar du 'gyur ta rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo 'o// glu yisbyor ba yis ra gru sta mchog

ga yon tan rnam mang dri tsha sbyor ba dag gis dri// 'phrang ba'i sbyor ba yis ni 'brang bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spros kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos// mar me'i rnam pas mar ma nges bar mun kha bcom pa

dang na snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsi'i 'gyur// zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang gnas lnga yi dbya bas rnam par phye bas// gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa
rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur masang du de ya rang bzhin dag kyang thug rgya rnams// phanyamon 'phrang la blta bas khyod ni gang zhi gnas 'ongs skal
ba khazang la rjod par byed// mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogasasu nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lanan smras pa dra'agyur// stong du blta bas khyod ni ngag 'am sa ya stong du gnas pas khyod ni
'dug la ngal so zhag/ yon bor la ngas khyod song chags pa lta bas pho nya mo shin tu dga'i ba rjod par byed// zhi ba'i lta bas bad
gsal bar byed// smra la lta bas bdag ni ma rus por brjod skal bzang lani rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis// mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma res la lta bas yon tan ra da tu
gsal bar byed// mchu la lta bu s skal ba bzang soru ma zung la lcan bdagan phyag rgya bzang mor brjod// snying khar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag pa zung la lan bdagan rab tu gtum mo'i/
brjod// phrag par lta bas bdag zhus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la ltan sran mo 'o// rgyub tu ltan lag 'gro ma sta lte ba lta bas mi yi dbang bdaganaM ngam tshig can// gsung bar lta bas

bdag na dag pa brla la lta bas ba dga'i shin tu dga'i la gdul bar dka'// pus mor lta bras bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo// rkang pa'i mthe bong sa par lta

nabadag na srid par rdo rje'i sku sta dpal mo gcig pu dang// sor mo kun gyi rtsa mor lta bas sprad pa gsum gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum/ po lta mi rnams lta stangs nying nas a stong gi gnas
su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// drug malus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang palus dag gin yan lag mchog kyang spyan pa ste// las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang

bcas yid dag kyang// khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkangaganyis pa dang phyugs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi de nyid chu yis gzhan// mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpolan reb tu phul na bde ba'i
ba/ @#// gnas su 'gro// sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis// bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying

rjes dkyil 'khor dun sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi// bdud rtsa'i mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri mang ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa// dri ma rnam khar bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su
gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya// rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs lan sbyin par bya// de bzhin dub la sogs lam dang mthu'u
dag yon tan gtor ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pas// bstan pa'i drin du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi seng ge dbang sen skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol// gzhan rnams lan rgyal ba mchog gasnying po
yum gyi mchod pa rnams ngasanasbyin pa nyid mabya// dbangag mitha ni dpal ldan bum ba rnams kyi 'jamazhing lus la bde star stod kor gos zung dag/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag 'asbyin
bya gan yang de bzhin stod kor dngan gis zung dag/ sgron gnas pa rnams larab spyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la khadag nyidanus pas de bzhin gzhan// mthar n sbyin sreg byas nas rang gisnying
kha'i dar yang shasasems dparab tu gzhug bya ste// 'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas sumatha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klu la spyan drang bya dr-ibu la dang dri smos ma tog 'bras bur bcas
drang sras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la/ gnas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs na ji ltar 'ded bar mchod byas te// slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin 'ba mchog tshig
kyi rigasazhirang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol// dgra dang sang ga glang chen dbang po me dang lce 'bya'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang// lkugater 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i
'jigs byed nang dang dbang po'i lta bar 'tshob dang// dngul dang bud mang pral dang a bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa// gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs mnyen
zhagaso sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dpal dang po 'as ngas rgyas chen po las byung ba'i dpal chen po dus kyi 'khor le las// mngon bar dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa 'o//
rgyal ba skyong mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang na gsang pa'i dbang dag dang// shes rab yashes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'jam/
pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob// slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par bdag zhu'o// zla ba badrang po'i tshig gsan nas na rgyal ba'i
bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs// zla ba'i sku dang zung ga zhabs te ma la mgronapa tshugataro dpal ldan zhalan sna tshogs mdog/ phrag pa drug dang nyima'i dpung brgyal ba'i phyag
ba[' ]@#// gi pad+ma stong ba drug dang ma yi tshogs// zhabasadag gis zla ba nyim srog za'i dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin ba// rol pas mnan pa 'asridamadasrid

mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu da ni bsgrub par bya// spyod mos tshal lam ri bo dang na rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas na stong pa ngang// grub pa'i gnasad dur khrod dang ni mtshodang bzang po'i//
gnas dngang bzhin nying du smras pas/ de gang du soms narab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der na bsgrub par bya rem a bdag nga kyi// nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la 'bar 'dug nas
sngar brjod bsrung ba byas nas ni// dang por snying khar zla ba'i dbusasung nyang 'od zer sna tshogs rnams na phyogs bcur bsgom par bya// kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha'
dag la spros pa'i rgyal po rnams la ni// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags ba dragan bshags byas te// sgrub pa'i yulus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis nagasum
laskyabs su 'gro bar bya// rdzogasasangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dapa' rnams dang 'thags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas M pa// de dag mtha' dag la ni sngagi ba rnam bral byang chub
spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi rang// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bangag gyur cigaces
'dir nasmon lam sems can gyi spang du bdag bgyid do// stong ba dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman// de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing
gzhan phan snying rjadag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste/ mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de ltan yang ma yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjen// dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor lan byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya// chu yas mni rnam par nyam pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya//phyi nas 'dzin la dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwabazhin du chu yi
dbus su rab tu zhugs// rlungan chu bo de dag bsams nas nam mkha' la na snying ba man par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// sems ni mi dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis//
la gzhug bar bya// stong pa rlung ma chudang sa dang lha ya'i bo chu skyes zla ba zhwa ma ma rnams/khang pa brtsigs pa kun nas dra med 'od zer 'phro ba 'aman rdo rje las skyes gur drag go/ de yi dbus
su rdo rje yi sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'kher rnam bar 'bro ba ste// o yig ye shes las rgyas rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni zhu ma dag gi gdan// phyi rol du na gsung gi dkyil
'khor nor gyi bad 'di'i zla ba kims rnam par dman// phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi charan nyin mor byed pa'i pangasgo ya dbus su shing rta rnams// nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nir bu gsar gyi rang
bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang// snying por brgyad gnyis ka'ajo lnga'i rang bzhin shin tu legaspyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi// zla ba'i ma la yang ag
ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long lasogs lta rnams kyis// 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyod par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'bro dus kyi 'khor le bsgom par bya/ rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus/
dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad nyi ma'i drapung pa dus kyi zhal// mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan ta rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mchab phyad ni gtsugs pa 'o// dpal ldan o yagyi las skyes rgyal
ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba ni kham yi stong du ni// drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs na g.yas brkyang stabs// g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs

kyi 'og tu bdud sdadakarapo g.yon par angani drag po 'o// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yus chen mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba zhi ba dang mtshungs zla ba dag gamadog/ phrag pasngon po dang na dmar dang ri bong
'dzin pa ltar dkar g.yas pa daregayon du yang// g.yas dang g.yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag na gnag dang ema'i lus dang zla ba'amadog rnams te// de bzhin nges par mtshonam dang ni/
bcas pa'i [‚Äù]phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so// phyag gi pad+ma ra bong la tshags gsum sor mo lnga po rnams na kha dog lnga rnams 'phro// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i/
0rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang// rdo rje ral kyi drag dang rtsa gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang nam e mda'// de nas dzo rje lcags kyu nges par

sgra dang bcas pa'i ma ru dang tho ba 'khor la nyad/ mdung dang dbyug pa dgras rnams n dzi rjecan gyi nyami phyag ga pad+ma g.yus la 'o// la bu phub dang kha TA gan rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis

gang ba'i thod pa dang// gzhu dang zhags pa cin chen pad+ma tshun rgyu ba drag dang ma long dang ni lcags sgrog dang// tshangs pa'i mgo bo pa des brgyanapa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag
na le// bdud dang drag po lha mo dgan zhabs kyi mabrel la 'dzin cing gdong 'deman pa drag tu byed// gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad+mas 'khyung ba dag nasna tshogs yum yin te/
g.yasanagri gug lcags kyu nges par sbya dang bcas pa'i Dam ru dang bgrang 'phreng rim pas so// g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma'i mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid// g.yon

brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btapa ba 'o// 'dab brgyad lan lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rag byed zhal dang nyama' spyan// de dag rnams/

las bzhin sbral gyi rdza yab 'dzin tazur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so// dbang ldan bden bral dang na rtsi mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dngagany+dzidang// de bzhin yid bzhin nor bura'
tes bar de bzhin du na dpag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur// dag mo ye na deng bo'i phug gi mthilan sos kyi snod dang gnyis ba dgon bsil ba'i snod// dmar po sbyar ba/
gsum pa na sta mus khyad dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin// g.yon na dril bu pad lha ya shing gi ma rtog ngangan me tog 'phreng ba rim pasaso// dmar mo'i g.yasan mar ma de zhal dag

dang cod pan dang bcas gdubu rnams te phyag g.yonan// gos drang ska rags dang ning+gim med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub ste// sor mo'i gzhas kyi phyags dung dang gleng du nor bu dang

bcas Dam du rim pas to// g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rngadang salasal rab tu sgrogs pa'i 'khar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo// 'o ma chu dang snyan dang chang dang bdud rtsi 'o dang 'bras bu zan gyi stong 'dakar/
mo yi// phyogs kyi pad+mar chugatar sangs rgyus rnams n dris par spyan dgu ma yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag/ zur du slol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du na bum pa
brgyud/ lca ngang lhamo gnag dang dmar dung sar ba dang ni ra bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste// nag po dkar po zla ba'i stang ngu angan phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po ma'i snying// mkha'
snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje s la sogs/[‚Äù ]shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi na g.yas dang g.yas man por dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid/

[pe]dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje sa par sgra ye rdo rjemadang tshes kyi dbyingasan rim pas so// rmugs byed res byed khes byed dag sa shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong dkar du 'o// shes rab thang par

cha pas nai ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma lnga sta lha rnams kyi yang lha mo gro/ gnyis po dgan rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud// mtshan ma gang zhig gang gis g.yas

kyi dang po'i phyag ma[√†]lan sa de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman// shes rab shrabs kyis 'khor lo mchog ga 'ad bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni de rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs M//nagapo rnams kyagayas kyi phyagan ral gragra

gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtsa gsum ste// g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang byed pa dag dang kha TaM gan dkar po 'di du 'gyur// mda' dung de rje lcags kyu sgrudang bcas pa'i snga ma ru'i g.yas

kyi phyag na rngam pa yus gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri mad 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yonan de bzhin nyid// sar po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang ni 'jags byed de rje
rim pas te// g.yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang na nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo dril bur 'gyur// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.ya sa nad la ldan tho ba mdung dang rtsa
gsum ste// g.yonan par dkar po 'dab ma brgyadang ldan pa dag dang ma long dang ni bgrang 'phrang ngo// ljang khu rnams kyi g.yas su ro rje gragug dang ni dgostar rim pas rab tu 'gyur bas//
ka @#// g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mazu'i dag yon tan gtar dang tshangs pa'i gdeng pa de nyid de// lha ma sngon ma rnams dag gi rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin ngun rig
bar bya// gnag dang dmaradang dkar da mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyis la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po de nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pa d+madag la
'tshe res 'ga'an// dpal ldan 'khor le sAng po'i dbus su mi yi badrag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur// rang gisams kyi nus pa shesanas bcom ldan 'dra yang rnal 'byor pa rnams/
ngag gis bsgom par bya// dbangag don du dkyil 'khor dgan rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu ngaman par 'gyur// phyi rol dus brgyad pa brgyad kyis pad 'dab brgyad po rnamA
la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni// tsartsikasogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba zhem dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma// shar gyi pangar tsats+tsakas mor na mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos

'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma// gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu stachur bcas rlung du rje rje lag dang chu gtor gong ma 'o// drag mo dbal mo byang drang dbang ldan du sta mtshon tshe dang bcas thubs kyi
sku la 'khyud pa 'o// brgyadab brgyad kyi rnal 'byoram gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas gamo'i kha dog zhal rnams so// shar la sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtsa gsum 'khor le pi
tsan dang// dbyug pa ral gri dang mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi par zung la 'o// rdo rje mda' dang pad+madang na dri mang glog mtshus tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtsa gsum dang//

tshogs rin chen gyis brtses sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad nyad dang bgrang 'phreng// g.yon na thod pa dang mi la rgyu ga dang pad mdung dang lcags sgrog dag dang phub dang na// nges par rin po chang/

zhags pa skrun rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo rje dral bu gzhu dag dang// spyi blugs snod dang kha TaM ga dang sbrul dang de nas mu las rgyas dang rin po ma nyid de// pad+danor 'dab lan brgyud pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma
yi phyag gi mtshon chad bzhin no// 'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mchob ma 'bar gdongem rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma// drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsartsika yi pang ner 'dab la na
phyogs rnams su// g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byengam// brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab bar la na khyab 'jug ma ya phyogs kyi
char keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdung ma dus kyi lce dang gtsags ma dang// nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor 'jab pad+mal sa phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'od/
pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri dgas bangag pos 'gro ma rin chen 'phreng ba mag bzang ma// la ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi ma byas 'gro ma'i mumyas 'dab la rgyal po kyi// de rje bod dang
rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan sa ra pas dung bkra ba'i rim dang// raM b+ha zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+manor 'dab rdo rje lagam lhag pa'i lA can la'o// sa ba phradang

pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can m blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug la// gA a dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang par rig byed gdongan lhag pa'i lha can la// go rAsid+madang ni rtog ma shin tu mchog tu myur
ma to ta la dang mtshon byed ma// mar sa ra nag mo brgyang n de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o// dpal ldan dkar me zla ba' dri mo re ba 'dzin pa'i gdongam ngang pa'i/

mdog dang 'dzin ma dang// pad+ma'i dbang po skar mig dri mang ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan par dag la mtshan mar bcas// de yi phyi drel rima'i pad+ma lan lha man g.yo dang ga shin rje ma ngangagangang drug dang/

gnod sbyin brgya byan chugatong gdong ngang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go/ ral grwa gra dug ljon shing dbang po lha ya rishing gam tog dbyug pa ral gri shag te dang//
dbyug pa shag tradag dang mdung dang nor bu dang na be con de rdza nyid dang ma yi mnga'// khab dang bgrang 'phrang dgan phyag bag mabral du 'gyur tacu gsum pa dang mnga' dang zhags pa dang// ran ma
dgra lha ro dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yus kyi phyag tu 'gyur// g.yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'inor bu dang na ut+pal dang lugs sgrog dang// zhags pa chu
ba sgus spyi blugs dgan nges par g.yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro ma ye bdag/na chen ma leng dang na de bzhin ne'u le dang bsdus chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni// pad+ma dang na spyi blugs
sprul dang gzhu dang de bzhin ku a zhags pa ngag dang rin chen dang// zhags ba rin po mngang bar skye ba lnga pa'i dungan lhaman dgra bo dag gir 'gyur// pad 'dab ma dag la nag po sogs kyi nor lag
chos rnams lte ba la na rdzogs pa gnyis// mchog ga zla ba'i ma rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu le yi sbyor bas 'gapar bya// sgoran lha mo shang la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang
lcags kyu dang bcas mnga' ya phyag/ dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phug/ dbal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na ngag

sa phyagan rtse gsum g.yas na ste// g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhugs pa dang na gzhu ya phyag/ dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma ra bong 'dzin pa mi leng phyag
kyang de bzhinano// dpal ldan dril bu shod pa'i phag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyad dngakha hU~M ga ya phyag/ 'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag ga ped rnams rim pas rig par bya//

ka pa'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'aphug dang padanor budagagiphyag/ rlung la sogs pa dekyil 'khor la ni pad kanoT sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams//khya'i dod lag bdo'am baspyang gadong ma
nges par g.yo la'i dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su// stag gdeng ma ni byang du gnas dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni gled pa'i phug/ bya rog gdeng dang bya rgod
gdong dang mkhra' 'gro bdag po'i gdeng dang 'ug gdong man zur du 'o/ de rje mig dang shin tu sreg pas 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i sku gnas g.yo ba'amatha'// yi dgas dmar dang

tsha mkha'a'agro'i dbang po ma nyamabya glang po drang pa grang dang gdong lnga pa// rim pas tsAmuts+tshA la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su 'o// klu chen lhasogs rnams

zla gyid bzhinanor bdagartse mo can dang mu gter rlung dang tshogs kyin// glang po'idabang po dang lug ngang musrin zhes dang ra dgas ngang nabya ba rim pas so// lha ruN+Da dang khrung khrung mag sngon bshang lam gdeng
rog gangeng la sogs pa'i zur du sa// bse dang dem dang seng ge g.yagan khyi gdeng ma la sogs pa ye sa phyogs su rab tu 'gyur// dorngamig gi rkang pa brgyad pasu'agashang dal granas mkha'
la sngon mo'i shing rtayi// mkha' bgrod khro ba dang bcas kha ngeg lnga pa lus rgyas mag gsum lcan pa anal zhes pa// 'od zer can ngang tsunu lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la

phag dang na// rta dang glang bo sang ga bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du 'o// shar du dradang 'brang ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa sosam mar masgog mo dang//bzhadam 'og mthol
mnanibasprinas gzhalas mkha' la glu ma 'dod sku 'o// snying bor brkyang na kha khyer la sa mkha'adang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar// gzungs ma rnams masnam bu la sa gdangs
can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod mi rnams kha khyer la// dbya ba drang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te sa yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas drang rings 'ded ma// lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dgab yis te srid
gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang spyong 'dod ma// rol mo 'dong ma dang ni rgyan 'drong ar 'gyur ma ya bdag posbas 'dred ma dang de bzhin nyid// de 'dod ma dang gos na 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig
pa 'dod ma dag ni drug nga ro/ lus la 'khrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'der ngang lus kyi dri ma 'dong ma dang//gar 'dam dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsdus

par 'dod ma dang// tsamun+tu sogs brgyud kyi bya ba rnams kyi de bzhin sa la legs skyes rnams kyi 'dong la yang// kun tu gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por sa ba dang na skams drang skyod
'dod m// reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'dabs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur// yan lag thams cad baspyod par 'dred ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci thag
par 'dod ma dang// sems can rnams la sku 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga lhag ma za ba dang// g.yul 'dengom dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khri bar 'dod ma rnams ni lcachen
rigs la 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dred ma rnams spar yang de ni phyi rel dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad lugs
can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir// zhes pa da ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha'adag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs// phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang na sngo dang
sdud pa dag la dngos po'i spyi ba yang dag gnas// de la rtag pa mkha' ma rdo rje rnam gsum sring ba la gnas la rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin// 'byung po' tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te/
oM badrag blo mag 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du lo/ rtag dang mi rtag mthongs de lan mang blun po'i blo can sems n dag pa'i ngon slad du// sgrub thabs dag brjod par bya snya snying bor gyur pa 'ga'/
yang 'dir bsgrub par bya ba mang// gang zhug bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rjecan gyi sgrub thabs matha' dag gang// ngaphyi'i rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam bar bral ba dgan dkrol//
rwakhor dbang po rab tu bya// ngapal ldan rdo rjecan n thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur ma bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje 'o/ lha rnams 'khor le A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyim byung
du'o// rtsa ba sdong bu dgan a yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yag go/ dbus su dpal ldan lta ba dpan zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dgo ma yag go/ hoyagi/
thog ma tha ma'i snying bo bde mnyam 'bras bu bstar la sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// der shes rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rje rje can yungar bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltasan/ lha mo rnams kyi
glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod nasems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po// bdag cagasrungs shig lha ma'i bla ma rdo rjo ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod// derje can ngs glu ngag gsan/
nas srid pa gsum po mtha' drag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni// gzigs nas baspyod pa mdzad de drim med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas// de rdzakhri rgyan dang ldan zhing/
rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyisana'akhyud par gyur pa yang// shes rab thabs kyis rgyal poslar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus par pa tu spro ba dag kyang nge [0f7c]ra lngar sngon po 'a nga
ba'i skas rab tu bshad pa'i yul dang mche ba phyang na gtsags pa drang// sa drag slog byed nyi ma'i sman dang gnyis lug rgyal ba'i phyag sa rug byar zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ ra ba 2
las rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas// rgyal ba'i dgran 'joms par byed pa rjerdzo shugs te ye shes 'khor le'aud du bsal/ rgyu dra mang 'ang
zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag na lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing// thug rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcingasa mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te//
tha tha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'dir ni slar yang 'gro ba ste// gzhug dang bcing dang ma nyes pa dang na re mnyam byed pa dag
nirmugs byed la sogasa rnams kyis byed// rdzogs ba'i rnal 'byor dug la sems nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i bar r ma e gang du 'gyur// shar du dpal ldamanag mo 'bag mchog

'tsha gi pad 'dab lar lha ra mar me 'bar ma ste// byang du dung la ldan dkar mo la bar mar 'gyur tu rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu sar me 'bar ma'o// mar ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs suts+tshag rgyu mngang

dang ldan phyogs sumakha' snangam// rlung du dpal ldan mar ma ma se nor bu ngang/ shing dang chos kyi gaN+Di dag dang dung/ me dang rlung drang lha min dang na 'phrog byang phyogs su de bzhin bar gyi zur gyi
mal 'o//shar du 'du byed dngan sa badrag nges par pad+ma la gnas lce ru tshor ba mudag ge/ byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur tanub tu yung ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do// pha yi phyogs su
rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha chen bdag por lo dang 'du shes gnyis pa 'o// dbang ldan du'i chu rung tshor ba dge sa rlung ngu 'dzin ma 'du byed phung bor ldan pa lo// lha mo sangs rgyas bar

rnams su ni la tshabargyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi re re yi bum pa rnams// slar yang 'phar ma phye ma la ni shar du su dang dris lde ru mag dang gzugs ngag go/ byang du lca dang rer 'gyur te chung ni de
bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur// sa 'og tu ra rnab sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lce la sgo yi g.yon du 'o/ nam mkha' lan nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyangs su 'phyur te
shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du 'o// dang por thabasun drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyin lhag pa'i lhar 'gyur// zhes shes rab la sogs drugam rab tu gsal bar bdag po
rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la 'o// shar gyi sgoran rabra gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o// g.yas su rmugs khyad dung nang rgyal la s+yAg red+ma sbyin du yang leng
khyad dang nirmugs byed ma// chu ru res byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur sgo spyi dbus na gnas pakhripad la// dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes ngang khro gnyecan
ma brtson 'grus many+dza' yas lcags sgrog ma// 'dod pa tsunAyashing rta la gnas lha dang nir spyan gzhan dang lha yi la dbus su sa// gnod mdzes drag na ma na 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkhal la/
gtsug tor deng na shin tu sngon mo nyid// shar gyi sgo yisang dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis pa ngag gi shing rta yang// gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor lan nor gyi phyogs
su 'byung ba las skyosa rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur// shar du tsA mun dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong// gshin rjer phagamo drag por 'gyur de lha min bag
[r/ ]@#// por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po 'o// nub tungabangamo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdong ma ngagan khyab 'jug nyid// gnod nangu na dragamo ga shin
rjeng 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyang dang gdong drug pa// phyi rol gyi ni dbang po' sgra ya g.yas su lA man dag dang da ya phyag sra mor 'gyur// mer na rlung dang rab gtum ma sta ma dang

chu lcamo yang lho yasgo yagayas su'o// lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdengo drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur de nub tudabang po rlung lha mo// rlung du tshangs pa drang ni glog mar 'gyur tanor spyir du yang rgya mtsho

zladang ni phag mo ko/ dbang ldan dun tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma de nor sbyin gshen rje'i sgo yagayon gyi cha// drag po dus te khyab 'jug ngangananor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du//
nga ngag rnams kyi phyag rgyur rab grags ra spras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur// phyi rel ngun lha dang ga shani rje mor spyananub kyi kha khyer drug la klu rnams mtha' dag ste//
bang+ga dang nAstobs kyi rgyudag g.yo ba'adzakyil 'khor la gnas nior rgyas bu dang dungaskyongan// mo la gnas pa dag chu a stong du rigs ldan matha' yas klubani rab tu grogs par 'gyur// de
bzhag sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig po dang ni pad+machan par 'gyur// de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod so la gnas pa khyo gdong ma la sogs
ba ste// de rnams thabs n pad la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur// shar gyi 'khor ler rtse mo 'bags pa'i dur khrod du g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas//

khyu gdengs// ga shin rje dag tu nges par ron sreg par phag gi gdongam byang du rus pa dang bcas par// stag gdeng ma sa chur rnag ga drir nad bzhin nyid du co spyang dug gi gadrong mar 'gyur// ma dang
lha man bdag por lhag ma dang na mo bzang g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas// rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdeng mdabang ldan du yang byas pa shi bralar/ la khar 'a/
gnas lug gdong ma sa sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla chu dag kyang bsgom par bya// g.yon brkyang bar yum gyir 'gyur tamanyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma ga gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi// bcudang nor gyi
tshogs gag ni g.yon brkyangs ga lhaman mo rnamA kyi yang zlum pa 'o// g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang skabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste// sa ga la ni sa ga nyid
ces bya bral gyur zhing nges par zun po la yang zlum po 'o// dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rje rje gdan gyis gnas pa sta/ rang rigs phyogs gnas lham
rnams ni rang rang pad+mazla ba'astangangu pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas// gdengs can rogs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi bzhon par gnas pa'i lha rnams dze rje gdan gyis gnas/ lha rnams 'dab ma ba lha
mo rnams r rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid// g.yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi lan nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba ngag/ phyed
dang bcas pa khru gnyis pas ma yi bdag po nga g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur// g.yonapa' spor bu yisan g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zunganamanyam pa dag kyang manyam pa'i stabs//
yon tan dbang gis pusamo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ka dang na zlum por 'gyur// cung zad pus mkhyadan 'khyogapa yol par 'gyur tulhagam dag ni rab tu grags ba nyid// slar yang

rnal 'byor pa yis b+ha ra ta las shes par bya sta jo rje gar gyi sung ngu 'o// rtsod pan dag la phan tshun rje rje yin rdo rjer 'gyur sangs rgyas lnga rnams r 'ga'an// gzugs kyi steng du ma bskyod pa sku gsal
bar pada'adzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur// rin chen dbang po 'i muny+tsas 'dzan dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan lan rab mchoganar bu'i phyag/ drug gcid pan ral pa zhes byar u0f8bgyur
tu yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khe le pa yang gzhan// sa las 'khor lo rab tu skya bar 'gyur tenu las pad dunganam las nor bu'o// rlung las ral gri ngang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur
ta 'gyur mang lasani gri gug go/ gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par ma leng dang bcas 'brang ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang// drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang srog za rlung/
da nam mkha'azhi ba dag las so// thub dang mdung dang mda' dang ngagra sta dang na Da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga sa de bzhin du// dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin the ba dang nu/
rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur// gzhu dang ut+pal dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ra khaTaM ga dang dril bu dang// drab zhin lcags sgrog la sogs mun ba byed pa stag lpags ngang ni glang po phag/

pas// 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sadang chu dang srog za rlung dang nam mkhalnga las skyes ngo// de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyung nga lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'o// gang
'ag li la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyas nas mu srog za rlung dang nam mkha' las rgyas pa// thung ngu ring po'i rab ngab rnams kyis rim pas yongs bkang nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang// semo'i/
gdan la gnas pa de dag mtha' dag 'khor lo la sogase mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags// gang zhig lenar mtshan mar drug par gyur pa der na yon tan darang gas gtos ngu rad par 'gyur//
nAd dang la ldan rdo rje sams dpar 'gyur tu ma yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a yig go/ i yag thung ngu ral graldan par 'gyur toslar yang ra yig dgan phyegan rin chen no// u yig thung du snang
bamatha' as su 'gyur slar yang 'di la yig rnam par snang mdzad de// bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so// dpal ldan um ra

gyur/ mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yumun byed ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pas/ mi bskyod stong ba'ikhams dang phyag gi par ral glo dang na spyan ma lus dang bsam pa
mtsho'i rin chen dbang po mA akA dang gsal bar nga du 'dzin gos dka'amolus dang bsam bas// de bzhin 'khor 'acan dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tanadabangagis thupadongarung ba'i dubyas kyis go
oM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tanadabangag la yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje 'o/ la yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po a yig dag kyang de bzhan yang dag sa yi snying bur 'gyur// o yig
'jig rten mgon po a la yang de bzhin 'dir ma rnam parusal bar 'gyur te lus 'al 'o// tsalA yigatshos kyi dbyings su 'gyur tanges par de bzhin ap+payig las skyes sgra la rdo rje// a yig
rig bya rje rje ma sa lus kyi debu bas Ar yig las skyes po'i ru rdzum// oM yig gzugs kyi der 'gyur nges par de bzhin a la yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma// dpal ldan bzangubo chos kyi dbying+ge

dang phyag rdo rdzong ni sgra mi rje rje ma dag zung// nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po lo'i rjem dog zug/ sa yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rjem dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag
[zl]zung du 'gyur// de ltar rigs mi drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan da bang gis yang dag par na rig bar bya// hayig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'jig ni ngag///
shen du sngon mo'o// dayig thung ngu gsodomadzas su 'gyur nges par de bzhin rang po las skyes drag po'i mig ma 'o// oM lATharim pas rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed mas gnyis
po ngag kyang zung// raM wA mugs byed nga rgyal ma ste wa dang ra zhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur re// laM yATharangs byang shin tuban 'grus mar 'gyur ya 'a ra la dbyug pa sngon po ma
g.yo ba// 'ded pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi rang po ste// A wa rA lA de bzhin glang po rta ngang sang gi ngang na bgag shing rtangag la 'gyur/ dbyug
sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrogam// 'dod pa tshun zung du 'gyur tam bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i nganang 'o// a yugo

dug dang oM dang rnam par bcad pa ha dang hadrang ba ralAlas skyes nus ma brgyad// bum pa rnams la de bzhinatsayigi rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbangs kyis phye bar 'gyur// o rgyu de Ats+tshadung dang dri

med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gaN+Di'o// da yogi tsAmulha ste ha dang hazhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo 'o// dwadang kA kA kaM kAdabang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro
ma tshas ma dwapal mo gzhon nus// pIhAts+tshArgyab tupad mchog gi 'dab ma las thung ngu'i debangs rnams mdun du 'o// Di lta klu klu de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal
zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyas rnams de bzhin no// shar dung g.yas dang gsas min chu dang ma dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung ga por sprul// 'dab ma drug lo lo sogs dbyangs drug gis phyi
zung nga 'ang po rnams na rim par yongs bkod pa/ hi li la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gangs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la// rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs
mut+tA la sogs pa'i thubs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so// taMn brgyabyin chu gter gdong sa po bzhes pa rgya mtsho dang dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang// Tinam dang gzhen nu dag pa/

dang khrer zhes bya ba srin po'adabang po dag dang rlung// kaM nga khyab 'jug dus te 'brog byang cus dang nor sbyin drag kyang saM dang 'dir nik+ka3 gortsa sogs sna pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha sa
bar 'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyis 'gyur// nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi tshos rnams dus kyis nges pa'i dbang gis song pa drug dang ma yi grangs// de nyid la zhon ngayug rlung ma chudang sa rnams
dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi// sde bdun brtsigs pa la gnasakA ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du na lha mo mo rnams kyi// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam bas rigs kyi
[pa/]dab las 'di ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyagar rdo rjer 'gyur// don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying/
bodramang nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snyipo yang ngagage/ phyagan 'kher 'a rnam par sel ba 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon// dpal ldan lam dang ches
kyi dbus da sgra yardo rje ma dang rdo dbyings kyi dbang phyugam// dpal ldan sgrolam reg bya rdo rjes su rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar re yi rje rje ma// mA ma kA dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur

te rigs kyidabang gis spyan ma dra yi rdo rje ma// khro bo'i dbungapo rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid da/ gtsug tor ma bskyod pa nying 'dir na slar yang shin tu
stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags// chugs byeng dang na phyag na rin chon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byeng dang ni 'od dpag med// rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du
'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rjedug dang gnod mdzes so// mkha' sAng dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gsas ya snying po 'dong pa 'o// rnam par sal drang shin tu brtson
'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba// yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phug rgyur 'gyur ta ragis kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings na de bzhin nying// stong
par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung mdangs la sogs pa mtha'aus brtson 'grus dang// rlugs byed ma dang khas ma rangs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal
zhing nges par rab tugrags// drag spun zla ya ri rdzamo 'gyur rags kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang rig bya rdo rje la// 'od zer can dang dra yi re tshur rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang
tsun+tar rab grags pa// rigs kyi dab bas nges bar ro yi rjes dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya// 'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shatustobs dang
bgogs dragur rab tukrugs// gos byed shes rab mthar byed ngag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khongs byed dang zhi ba'i dgra// rlung ma chus rtswa mu dz+hadang phagadabang phyug ma dang de bzhin
dbang mo bzhi ba ste// dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrogs byed lha min mar ni gnas pa yang// tshas pa dang ni rnam par sAnga mdzad ng 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgyu
mtshudag dang 'od dpag med// ma dang dpal ldan phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rung dang don yod grub pa draganang bzhin nyid// mi bskyod pa drang lha min ngag bar 'agyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni
bad byed rab tu thogs// rnam par sal ba gangang brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// sa ya snyang po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snyingang ma'i/
bdag por rab tu grags pa yin// dpal ldan phyag rdo rjengs gsum 'gyur tajug pa kun tu bzang bo nor gyi bdag po 'a// rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drugan rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis pa rnams
rang rang phyag rgyas// phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyim lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pago/ de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la mnor lag tshas dmachu yi zla ba la sogs gang nga rnams//
zla ba drugan a drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang// klu brgyud gang de bum pa rnams po khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'dab lanus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal ldan du bu bya reg
gdeng mar 'gyur parigs kyi dbang gis bya rgo gdong masmig rgyu ma// mkha' snyang ma 'ug ba gdong ma dpal ldan mar ma mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdung mar rab tu grugs// nag ma 'bar ma
khyi gdongam sa dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma// dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis sor mo 'bar ma ci spangs// de bzhin h+phagamo/
lasogs thams cad rab tu gsalapa rnam bcu sna tshogs yuman lhag ma 'o// lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang 'acasang bum pa drung bcas rgyal ba yaningag pa'i//khro bo'i dbang po byang chub
sems dpa' nges par ro ma rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku danyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod//starab mchog sheng rtal gnas lhan sku mar rab grags pa// ku ni brgyad po rnams dang rab
gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku// de bzhin slar yang rgyal bu'i sku na dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur tu phyi rol dug dang nang na yang// mngal
nas skyes pa lta ba nyidad bzhin khon dkyil 'khor lan ngas bar rab tu 'gyur// ston pa lha megs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku su dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o// sangs rgyas la
sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yardo rje m sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ khro ba sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur yon tananag gis dkyil 'khor gyi na sAng por yang dag gnas// phyi rol dun tsamuN+Da/
@#la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i hUM// lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku sta mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// gtum mo rnams

zla ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur ma la bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o//sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i skun zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o// gsung gi rje rje dang na chos kyi
sku yong zung du 'gyur to chos nyid bstan pa'i don du 'o// thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur sems can kun gyi den ni byed pa po// sengashes dang ni sprul pa'i sku drag
! zung du 'gyur tasrog chags rnams la thar pa sar ba nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla asogasakasogs dang// rnam gsum srid pa la
ba gnas ye shesa rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rjedz+dzasA hATimany+dza' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lta ba gsang ba spyi bor te// 'di dag gis ni byin brlabs
yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkrukhar bya// stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang de gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjesasu chags pa la// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum
nas sgrub pa ba yAs tasAb+ha baat+mako'atabarjod par bya// bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying khar chos kyi 'khor le'arab tu 'gyur// rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid/
kyis mgo bo rtsibs bsudrug ba lhan cig skyes par rab lugrags// byung chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur ma bdag rnams kyis mgrin par les spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur//
'jigs ma lasogasanerazhigadangs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyisazhi bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyin los kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis
bstan pas// klu dang gtum mo ma ya bdagabo rnams kyisasor mo'i tshigs kyi metshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur// dus kyi dag pas dpal ldanurje rjecan 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs
dab bsaso// thugs kyi rnam pa nyimasayin nyin zhag so so'adibang gis sna tshogs yumana rnam bar dag/ rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rangag nga kha'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor la gnas rnams//
nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab 22ga zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud/ dung dang gaN+Dim Niljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku ya rdo rje/

mtha' yas te// gzugasana 'khor le can nor bang can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gcib rnam par dag pa 'o// lha mo drugan khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub s+sAmA
dba' phyag rgyar bcag// khro ba lan stobs rnams kyis te ngas par slar yang gzhan pa ldan dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// tsAmuts+tshasogs thun brgyadakyis tapad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams
ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis// lha min la sogs che ma'azla bas bad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod drabugs kyi grangs kyisaso/ gsang ba'i ma bdag nyis 'gyur mu tshod rnams kyis ku rnams
dngar ba gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod ma lasogs de dag rang bzhin yon tanadabang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par drag/ sku rnams kyis ni grub pas thabadag ba spu rnams kyis dur
khrang sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po' tshogs// nga nyad rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon charang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yo phyag rgya'o// de rjesanang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs
kar zla ba'i stang du yang dag gnas pa 'o// dpal ldan rje can dang sa tshogs yum na rnams gsum srid gnas 'gyur mang yashes dbye ba las// dpal ldan drag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur/
te chos las ngas bar longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o// lengasaspyod lasan spyalapra'i sa ru 'gyur tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu
gnyid leganges par sazayang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste// de ltar lus kyi rang dungabya bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yang n rnam pa bzhir gnas// sprul par yang ni lengs
spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngagag dbang pos so// los spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sams par 'gyur te yon tanadabang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo// dag pa lan bdabal/
rab 'gyur 'ding na nyin mtshan dus su thigale grol ba gsum chi mthur// daphyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya sta 'gyur mod den du'o/ g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar
'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskrum bu gang yin pa// de ni g.yon brkyang skabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang ma dang nyema' rgya ba las// sa gdang ni zlum pa nod dang
mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad+madang na dzi'i gdan// nam mkha'asogs la rab tusgrub mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga// gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bstan
[g, ]/pa'i lag 'gro tsaN+Di ka sogs lhag pa'i lu dang ldan// ha yig ya shes snying po lan dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i yu bas ma ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la//
[Ôºö ]sogs sragacing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams// thams cad basregs nas mgo bar zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs 'dzag pa gang de re rje can// shes rab chos 'byung/
ngag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas tedres par thage la yis// sa rdzogasargyan dang ldanuzhing ma long drag la gnas pa lta bu'i ya shes 'khor la rang byung ba// 'dod pa drang ni gzugs
dang gzugs med srong pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas phyus byas te// phyi nas ya shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha'i drag ngus gcig ni dgug par bya// zla ba nyam asogs
kasogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnasasku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa// so sor sdud pa lasogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma lani sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te// dga' ba' sogs
rnams kyis rje rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum// shes rab padar sums kyi thig le dag la lha skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs
dang chu gter rje rje rnamos dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bstan pa ste/ so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni luba'i sgrub pa ra 'gyur// dga' pal sogs rnams kyis/
07 rdordzab sum dang chu skyes mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur// shes rab sbyaral gang tsho'ajo med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur// dang po stong nyid byang
chub nges pa la slar yang de nas zla ba theg le dag ni ya drag 'an// de nas gzugs dag khaspyad cing rab mchog re ya rigs rnams dag gros yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te// 'di ni spyi yi
bstan ba chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring bo yang// 'di la thabs na rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid// so sor sdud pa
rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtanam baspyod pa nyid do// srog rtsol dgakyaparal gri can slar yang rnam pa bcusu 'dzin pa phyag na ran chen no// gdol pa mo la rjes
su dran pa pad 'dzin par 'gyur dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can// rar dbye ba lnga rnams kyis slar yang gang las a sogasaka sogs rnams kyis bya ba 'o// so sor sdud pa lus
la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams na rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o// bsam gtanadagakyang shes rab rtogadang dbyong pa dga' dang g.yo mdabad ba rtse gcig sems pa 'o// srog gi rtsol ba
dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgrol zhing dbu mar slog nazhugs pa dag tu 'gyur// thig ler srogan rab tu zhugs shing ganyis ka'i bgrod ba bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtum
mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' yang rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ya
shas gzugs la teng nge 'dzin// 'ang ngagadamanab la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sa tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub skabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum n rnam
wa gsum bgrong pa'i dbang gis las drung kun rtog mchog rnams so// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam pa ra bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mngon par shes pa
ldani thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dgapa 'o// srogag rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod// bdud dang nyon
mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug bar gyurd 'dzan ba'i stabs kyisaso// rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ya shesagazugs las so/
de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyan zhag 'ga' zhig dgags ye shes lus 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na//
nAng goms pas btsan thabs chu skyas su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bka gnas bsgrub par bya// bsnyan b.lanadang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor le can gyi khro bo'i lta bas so//
bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi 'i lam du son pa las kyang nye ba'i sgrub ba yan lag drug
ba ma tams gracig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'di'i sgrub pa chen po la// srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo ya bar du 'dod pa ste/ de lasostang du 'dod
pa ma yin 'chiba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung bo nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu// gtsug tor skyon phug nas 'grona mchog ga 'di ba'i go 'phang dag la nges bar sbyar bar bya// phung po med kyang rnal 'byor
pani bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten dun grags pa min// dbus su srogani rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste// padar zhugs pa'i
rang ga rdo rjespro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa'o// bad ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas ba rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'ad// phyag rgya'i dngos
grub don sladra khyab bdag gan dpalaldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang bya'o// gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur tu phyi rol rtse mo dgan nyis 'gyur rgyu// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor ler
'gyur zhing nyes 'gyur gzhan ma dgand ya nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan// de yi yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan mu'agyur te lhan gyis les spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor// de yi snying
@#// bor rtsa mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras bur gsang ba'ab 'i khongs su gnas pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor grog gcod pa dag bya bad nasrog nyams par
gsus te// sman gabazhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur ba de ni brdzun du spu ba nyid// gang zhig nyams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mna'adzin ba dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis rku bar
'tsha gsus// thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral men las gzhan gyi bud mang bstanang 'o// srog gi rtsol ba'am yasar bong can nazhu ba ngag kyang btung ba changan 'thung ba 'o/
mthe bo'i tshigasanas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rangasams 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so// gtsug tor nas na sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha'amu'o//
rnal 'byor ba rnams spyod bag de nyin zhagaso so'ajus su'aded pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba'o// bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dpal mchog pad tshe dang zas la rab tu mi 'jugadab/
'dar dang smyo dang rab tuphongs par 'gyur dang yod ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag du brgyal ba drag/ rdo rje can gyi dung la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcus srog chags lus la 'jigarten du/ yabatu
gsal zhingangs pa de rnams yid srubasaM gnas skabasasu zhig rgyal ba 'deng ba de ni sa// nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkaba'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI sa chang ma yin// gi gu la sogs
[s ]mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor gos sha gzhan s 'ga' dag kyang min// rang 'gags la gnas pa'i lha rnamag dug gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bstan pa ste// stongangar
sams narab tu zhugs bas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin/ noran gtong ba sbyin pa yodadang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'brob mad pa tshul khrims te/ bzod pa sgra
la sogs pa mi 'jug bas rlung gi gzhis ka'i bgrod bu 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid// bsam gtana shes rab dag kyang lhan rgyas bde la gnas pa'i sams dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad// 8
las sems can den dang rdzu 'phrul srid mthar byed mas thob skyo gzhan pa bzhi rnams// gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas ni shulnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa// bsgomA

na phyag rgya la sog sa grub pa rnams su nges bar nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dgagis yang dag 'gyur// reg pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa drag rtsazhel gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams kyi
dkyil 'khor la gnas lha chen lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dkar po yisan zhu dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang// sar po sa red+ma

dang rmongs ba dag stanagapo'i snganedang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang na bskradapa 'o/ts+tshA/ sgomadang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rjen// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor
la gnas sridab gsum po mtha' dag las kyi bye bas bsgrub par bya// phyogs ni lhag ba las byung lu gdan ge sar dang mtshungs bro g.yas dwang cig shes dag gis ni//

phung bo'idud la glang chen lhags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhigange gnas 'dzin// lha min dbang po'i khrag gi byed ba rab mchog phyag mash+tsalan skye 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyug/
dron mos bdungani zhabasakyis bskyal ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyagazhi gzhan gyis don du bsgom par bya// de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste/
zhim las ni zla bas rang ga ba bcuganyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gsaso// de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur tu sna tshogs yuman de bzhin nyud// shes
rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bdu mnyam 'bras ltar zla ba ma'i rab tu rgyu bsas// gtsug la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dogi mun pa dag gi mthar// shes
rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sapar bdamanyamastor tartsi ni zla ba lam 'gog pa las// sa lasogs pa rnams n kun nas 'bags byad dri chad nor bu dang mtshus stong pa gcig pus// thog
ma mad cing mtha' mad dbus kyang mod la yul mid yulan bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ khro bo'i dbang po sde'i shugasan gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i thug dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis
pa ma sarasAn ngang dbusku ngamar sar rgyal ba'i bdag po'acod pan mchab rnon po gtsegs pas// sprul gyi rgyun dang rab mchog stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang na gtso bo'i bzhin
du mtshon cha'i phyag/ su der mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi klong pa kha ngog lnga rnams drag gis 'phreng ba ngos par bcas/ drimad 'od zer 'phro bsna tshogs chu skyas nyi ra la stang du dkyil
'khor sna tshogs mdog lano// zhabs gnyis dug gas 'byung pa'i mgon po lcog pa'i stabs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas// 'byung bo rnams dang lhan
gdangs na lha rnams skrag par byed cing ya shes sems dpa' gacig gyur ga/ sgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas 'byung bo'i tshogs ra ba sgrub par bya klu rnams
skyes 'dab brgyad la sa rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni 'aa'i stang du bstsal byas nas// zhabasajug gisan gdengs can bdag be zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi rdzugu pa/ rtsa yo
thams cad manan nasasan gyi ragasanalte ba drag nas nges bar kun tu s byed pa// de ltar khro bo' dbang po bsgoms bas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ zhes pa 'asog
ma yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lu mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru// dkyil 'khora'angani rang gargyal ba'i debang gis lasakyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur// rings ngang zhi ba dag dang
dbang dang gzhan nor 'brog dang chags pa dngan bskud pa dug la yang// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams la gyur duslar yang bzlas dang sbyin srag rang gi sa bon
gyis// zhi ba lani bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lcan zhu ba'i gzugs// drug po la yang bsam gtan drug po dang ni/ni nag dang mtshus lha rnamos drag bo nyid kyi gzugs//
dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku sta lha nichags pa'i gzugs// rengs pa la bsam gtan rmos pa dang bcas mchog gi gas ra dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams
rangs pa'i gzugs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rags dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub bar 'gyur// dbya dang bslad ba dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro ba
las skyes rnamakyis 'grupar 'gyur// dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha man rigs la phur bus gdab pa 'ang lha min mo rnams kyis// yum dag gsani las rnams
thams cad gnyis ka'i rdo rje'i rigs lags ng pa dang nagaso la yang// dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang na srid gsum skyes ma 'bad ba las nabasgrub par bya// de nas sa gzhi'i
gnas dag tu na gang zhig na ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub por bu// pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bun yong pa min par dus kun tu n 'jig rten grags// de phyir bde mnyam
'bras star gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las 'grub pa man// gtso bo' thugs kar pad+ma'i debus sur beng can dang zhes ma ye stang du rdo rje ni// rtswayig yang shas las skyes
'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtsi lnga 'od zer dang bcus dkong bar bya// de yi dbus su dzayog lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas// rnam gsum

sred pa la gnas yo shes 'khor 'bro bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bu sa// thams cad zla bzhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rje rdza'i khanas yum gyi ba dar spro bar bya/ dan nyimar rab tu zhugs pa/
ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa// de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi yashes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gsas// de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am
ni lu yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu myur ba nyid du 'gyur// dzats+tsahU~M khaM hemaram pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang 'dirje zhags pa dril bu sa// oM ahor bzhin du gsungs zla ba rim
rdo rjed bzhin nyid du 'gyur mad do/ ArAsU la de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung mo chudang sa rnams so// hahU~M haphro nyim dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin
gsus// zla ba nya ma'i dbus su A li kA li pageanuyis len bdag nyid chu sa te// de las tshogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma se zung gi phyag ga pad+ma can// glang chen
dkarapo la zhon phyag na musas dkar du 'jigs pa dang ges na dkar po dang// dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhalan bsgomasanas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bsu//
bar bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzunas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du na yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gtso bo'i bka'ani rab tu thob nas spyanas la sogs rab dgyes rnams kyis bdung rtsa'i bum
pa yis// bsgrub bya rin bkru bar byed cing rab mchoga rnam pa bcu yinus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed// gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsalaskagamo la sogs bcu
yis chem par byed/ 'byung por grags pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa yod byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed// klu mo rnams kyis 'od g byed ciba'achimadan chung bcu gnyis
rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag 'byed// gtum ma rnams kyis srung bar byadad mtha' dgra sa gzhirtag la zhi rgyas don slad du'o// de ltar bslab bya yin mchog gri bde ba khyad pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis
khasgom par bya// zla ba nye ma'i dbus su hAs ut+pal kha ma bya ba'i mda' nyid dang ni klu'i gzhu// dalas rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyaganaganyisakas gzhu dang mda' na rna ba'i bar du

bkang// padadapan ra bong 'dzin pa g.yonabarkyang rta la zhonab bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya so ni ging kha lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas shing// mgrazhe
ngar gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor ngan khrid par byed pa ste// gtum mo rtsar sakyis gos dang bral ba byas nga ku ma rnams kyis kyang ngas bar dkri bar byas/ wA ma rnams
kyis skye bar byed cing khro skyas rnams kyis gtum shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun// 'byung po rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing sbag mo la sogasa rnams kyis kyang n san ma rnon po 'debs//

rdo rje ma rnams kyis na blo gros nyams las sa dang chu dang srig za rlung rnams dag gis bcings// rus ma rnams kyis ges bral rgyugs pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yi zhabs la lhung bar byas// de ltar
dbang du byas nas slar yang khub bang/ ngog gis tshim par byas tongar ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin zhugs pa lcags kyu ngag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las gi rnam pa mang par 'gyur/

nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshus yuyig drang po lasaskyesraral gi bsgom byas nas// de las byung ba bung bakhro mngeg can phyag gi pad+maral gri nganga'i sprigs mdzub zhags pa'i phug/ rngama'i
stang du g.yen pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhalan bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya 'gas pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te// ya

yig las skyes rgya mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar 'gred pa de la gtso bo gsung gis bsgrub bya ni// yon pa rtsa mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyeng du rang bzhin gyis nibaskul bar du// de ltar lha ya
bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag nasmos ci dges// bya ba la yang rdza mos dman zhing rtse dramang byas pa dgan g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya// zhizla'i
dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i zhal gcig pa sa mchog gi gsar dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'kher lecan//
lus sbal la na lha mir gdan gyis gnas shing shi tu dul 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya 'khor los 'jigs par byas nasas la rab tu bsgrol te lcags sgrog gis rkang pa bcing/
dkyil 'khor du na kun tu khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag por bka' yiso 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas/ da ya stang du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gsar gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs las//
phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug lan rdo rje'i rang bzhin bur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya// rmongs pa la yang sprul rnams kyis na kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya//

nyim zla ba'i dbus su dri mang glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug bro gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i rab tu gtumo mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thong pa can// yi dgra
yi steng du g.yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyam du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya'i sgro rnams dag las myur du bzung nang nga yis dkyil 'khod duni gos kyis dman pa yang// kun tu

khring nge ngapal ldadur khrong ngag tu rgyal ba'i bangag po bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang/ dartse spanga rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kur lasu khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du me khams kun zos//

de ltar ma lus pa na rab mchogs yi ga'u la bsgom par byas gsang padag la 'o// bsaMs gtan 'di yaso brgyabyan ngag kyang ga shin rje'i grong khyer 'gron mnga'/nas u0fb1sa pasmros ci dgos// mi drang rgyas
pa 'a ang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yis yon las na bsam gtanadakar por 'gyur// dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmarapo lus ni srag par byed pa mo yi sa bon bdag zheng ngo// dbye ba dang ni bskang
pa la yang 'jigs dus spen ngang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid de// rengs nga dang na phur bus grangang pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa ya sa pen rang bzhin no// stong pa'i sa ban

lasan gor po'i mngog ngang ljang khur 'gyur pagasang dang gso ba dag la 'o// sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la sa rlung gi zad par char pa ni// nyams pa'i ngan te ma ya zad par ngag kyang
yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don de ma ngag kyang/ nyams pa'i den du chu yi thang par du 'gyur stong pa'i zang par mkha' la 'gro dang stong man pa// glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni mi yis bon nyid las/
gdong la nga yi bsam ga tu gyur// ku ya ngabang po gzhom pa lan mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bas ngang sang gangag la rkang brgyada'ajig dus sprirangang mtshungs pa
rlung gis bor bdag nyid can// rta yi dgra la bas zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro ba skyes// khyab bdag gi midapal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas/
gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya// phyi nas rnam dbye pa rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sngags dang gzugs bar n ma grub par

ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur bo nyidam yin// daphyir rgyal po rang sems hrim rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugrab sgrub par bya// dba' bo g.yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa 'am

yid bzhin chom rkun byas pa ngag/ brgya dang 'byung po'amtshan mo mi yi bdag po resregs na bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya// dri dang spos dang maram dang ni rnam mang kha zas ma tog dmar po rnams kyis
rab mchod nas// mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi pel ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgodapa rab byas te// cha ba lung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i bar gang zhig mtshan mar bcasal dang//
'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su'i phyogs khral dun bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma// phyi rol re khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams
byas nas// de yi g.yas min ngun yi dgas lag pas ral gridagyila 'khoralasan g.yas su rkang ba 'o// sngar brjod m mo'i skyon las rgyal ba bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba
rab byas gs// sngags bas thabakyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas ba'i ba rnams drag gas sbyin srug nyare na rab byed pa// de yi sngags ni o wiya?hUM phaT kyi mtha' sta bcu yas bsgyur ba'i brgyal gi/

sbyin sreg bya// rdor stsal krung bcas nas 'chi med ra bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo phyed// sbyin sreg rdzo gsar re 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mtshab rjen po mig gsum pa//
gong zhig sgra sgrogs sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gams shing sgrub pa po nu'ajigs par byed pa nga// sgrub kyi mtha' ru gnas nas kal ka hargod par bde cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gang byeng// de
mtheng nas mi 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams dacig gis na gshin rje'i grong khyaba'agro ba 'gyur//tshe srog gnas susprugs pas dngos grub rgyun lu min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par ma bus// g.yo
ba mad pa'i masa mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrub pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po rang skangs bar 'gyur// dang ra po bzang bo khyod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smos shig ra na bdag des ci zhig bgyi// de

skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gnyan gyi ngan du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya// sngal gri rag pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu re can dang mig la sdang// rkang pa byug dang shing ldam dag

rang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyud po khyod kyis bdag la stsol// ngabu dang bslang pa dang nasring pa gzhom pa nyang ngang res pa ngang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang// bangag ga dngos grub thams cang mdzod ragid
yig slar yang 'dudag thams cad bdag gis bgyi 'o// 'byung po' dbang po bsgrubasanas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po se 'og dgadang bar snang dang// lha yi mchog gi khang pa ngapani

lhun po'i rtsa dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste// dul zhon pa thugan ral gri thogs pasas yi stangag gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed// de phyir sems can na gyi slad du mtshog gsIng rje yis

lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya// ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur tami yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'o// gsung gi rje ming gi yig thams cad de las lhag ba dag kyang sku li dzi rje ste// de las
tshaman lagaso so' sngagos rnam pa mang bor 'gyur dbaklags pas grub pa brgya laman// bsgomab mchad bya bzlas bya rangagi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so// so sor
sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bya ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur tu rab tu grags pa'o/ sun phrag dolas bcu yi cha shasarang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid// phyin s zhi ba la
