lus bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin// gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal las rgyal ba mchog gi sbyong pa thosangashing dbapan blangs nas kyang// slar yang phrag ngeg byedumaden ngayul ba brgyad pa ngesrid

nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te// gang na khab rtsa'i sal mi dga' 'bras bu'i dbang gis ngastsal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed// de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang na blang bar bu
bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal pa spyad mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzodaMpar brtson 'grus rdzogs ba dang// bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs/
dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi// sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor ba Askya ba 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs ba'im de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas ngamal
bganye bar 'gro// sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar a yis na ral gri rnon po dag/ bzung ste kun s 'thab mo ba yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu
zhugs pa na// glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigasaM padayi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gridagazhi ltung gyur ba// de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur bam yi ja ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi 'o//
sngags dang dba' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gangeb can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub bar bya// rang byin rlabs pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas a rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa spyin sreg dag gis/
kyang/ dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yisan rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen ba' sems kyis so// ye shes yin+tabazhin nor bu gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang na rgyal ba'i lam
'a 'a mni dngul chu'i dag nyid yin tem dang rnam par bralananam yang dngul mu'aching ba mdu// ma bcingsanan gsor byed mdang gsar dang bralanas bo rnams la les spyod mud pa nyid// de bzhin byed
a mad sbyor ba bralanartag tu rnal 'byor ba rnams ngag gsems ni'aching mi 'gyur// bcings pa med na lus 'bags mdade ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min// skyed mos tshal lam

ri bo dgan spyi bo padags bral khar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// drag po rnams nudrag po'i dur khrod du sa lha mchog gnas su rangs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang// dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi

sa la bdeb phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la// gnas gzhon dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyin skyo ba 'bum phragag kyang 'gru'ama'agyur// khyim dang grong du bgrang 'phrang dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo 'dus/
su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas nii// ngal zhing rmongs dachags pa dang bralasar yang 'dan sngags kyi dngos grub madra pa rjod par byed// gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang
dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid// rkang pa sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang na sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen/
07 po rnams dang gdan rnams dang// sbyin srag sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon lan rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba mad par yang// bung mdasbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag
bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grubastar bar byed// de phyir de na nyin zhagasoso'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yi thar ba'i slad du bsgom par bya// rang gsams na brgyal drang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag
bo rang bzhin med par 'gyur// sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed pa de ngagasrog chags rnams kyi thar ba'i lamam yin// dngos dang dngos med kyis phusams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams
ngag la bde mnyam star bzhin// gang zhig mkha' ya shes rab la 'khyud ldan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang bzhin ngan thar par skor// oM AhUM rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag
tshucha nasdus nas rtogs par bya// rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas khasgom par byas nas na// stong de nas n thog la ngag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming mang rtse
mosas dgol// phyi rol dunazur gsum byas nas de la dbus su nyenamor byed dra dang mtshungs zlum po de// de yi dbus su 'di yaM ya shes bakhor le srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas
bsgoms byas nas/ mthe bong dang na ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tsham par byed pa la sogs bya// yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir na gter ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming
gas te// 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang sur yang sngags pas tre bo'i rgyal po la ni gter ma 'o// pho nyamo rnams drag la zas kyi phud nas stong rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis
spyan 'byung bo rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklagage/ mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha le gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod/
'tshi gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyisan gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la// lha yi dmigs pa gang yin madren sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba rgyu//
mdzen sum dgan de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skaram bzhin du du ma khros spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mngon sum mnan rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang// de ni
ri mo sogs la blta bya yis su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don// gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la na de nyid min pas bsgom bar bya// nam
mkhra' lan de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa// le ya phyed dang le gtsug bla ma'i nges pa'i dabang gas ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur kyi bar// donas phyag
rgya'i sbyor bas nyen zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad lasan nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs// byis pa rnams

ni sminapar byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sa tshogs gtsobos smras// de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhagasos dus su rnal 'byor ba yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya'i dngos grub ngonosud
rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gazhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor le 'o// dpal dang po' sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las sgrub klubs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
gtso'i'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyodakyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes// slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lkoma'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang//
sangs rgyas rnamos dang rnal 'byor a rnams dag gi rigs drug A li kA li ngag la gnas pa nyid// zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs

gsus/ dka ba rnams dang rdo rje 'phrang bas yi dkyil 'khor tshug pa trad ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod// sha khrag ru dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshIn rje nob sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa sta//

mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni zhimar bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams// rab lta re khAs dang chu dang sngagaza rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so// dus kyi rtswa yis gtso
bo'i chu sa g.yo ba ma li dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis// nyima'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so ya 'brang pas de bzhin nyid// dur khrod brgyad
'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni saram rnams kyi son mo yis// ba spya rnams kyis rje rjes lce dkyil 'khor gyi nemany+dza' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la
da gnas// de ltar ngas bar sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyin rnam par gsungs// gsung gi rje asogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyinganamatha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis//

tshe stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtsobo'i rnam pa nyid// de bzhin ngu na ye shes rdo rjesrid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas tshogs yumagya reng bzhinano// grwa ba kalasogs pa/
drug po rim par yos su bkod pa rnams kyi rogs na rimabu yis// rdo rje ral grwa ra chen 'khor lo na skas de bzhin gra gug nyid na rgyal ba rnams kyis// slar yang sngapa re la yang mtha' dag rgyal

ba mchog gangabya ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye// so sor yi ga'i dbye bas dang mudang srug zlarlung dang nam mkha'i drangos po dag lasaso// dang par stong pa'i rab du dbye ba dag kyang nga 2Naman dang lho dang dang bo/

dbyangs// rlung gi dbye ba e yig g+ha dz+ha ra b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba ral sogs// chu yi dbu ba su yi rba khu tshab pha tha wa sas ya dbye ba la la sogs// de ltar mchog gargyal ba'i rigasazhi/

rnam pa lnga yisaM kalasogs pa'i snga rnams rnam par bya// gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rags gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi de rje 'o// asogs phyag rgya'i rigs te nga ya ra wa la/
dang ldan pa'i kasagasasde pa mtha'adag rnams// 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wal ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa 'o// rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur
ka sogs sdo pa brtsigs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so// ka sogs yi ge sum cu daya ra wa lar ldan klu dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phyi la ngo yas bsgyur ba'i re
ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur// skun gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang
bcas pa dgun 'khor lo' mgon po dgu bdag nyid// dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de// ya la sogs pa rnams kyi
sgo skyong mthu' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhagama'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so// khro bo drugadu busogs kyis 'gyur rad rags phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbus sogs ngabu ba yis//

so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i lo marnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud// de bzhin yi ge so sor re yis bsgyur ba'ir yi dkyila 'khor 'an dkyil 'khor dbang pos//pung po 'byung ba dbang
po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs sbyang bar bya// stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal bo'i rigs rnams kyisan lha rnams rgya yis gang ba pas/ dgatsug
@// tor nas ni nu skyes mtha' ru ma mnyam mnyam ba'i rigs la 'khor lnga'i dbus kyi gadran la 'o/ de rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbu bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po' phyag rnams dbyas

kyi dubya ba yis// de nyid rnams kyis phyagargyu'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rjel sogs kyis// sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyudanadapag med yon tan yi gdu ma'i rab tu dbye ba can//
ta/ ya ga so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lhamo dngan lha rnams dag gi 'o// sa bon gcig pu dang 'a bo gcig pa rdul la remanyam pa shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur// phung po rnams
kyis lnga yi bangaganyid sa ya khams sogs rnams kyis bun gyis brlabs pa dag pa yang// bshang lam la sogs dang na mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'din zhi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang// de bzhin
so ni rab tu skyes pa sur yang so rnams ngag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshad ma 'od dpag med// nga rgyal 'jig
dbang phyug rta A shing rtas 'grom mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rje rje ma// drag mo chu gtor tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyas gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas// 'di dag dang la

ldag giyan gyi zhalanas mchog gisnying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o// chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+maral gri den yod grub pa sgrol ma dang// mkha' ya sIng po rig byardo rje

[roj]ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsartsa kadang lugs sgrog ma// bden bral dang narlung zhes bya dang dmangasarigs kyi dang nge bzhin khyo gdong ma dang bya reg bcas// de dag nges par khams pa'e thugs kyisasred pa gsus

gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas sos pa 'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i malas nyi ma'achar ka dang mtshungs na chan 'dzin dang gsadakar mo// sa yisAng po rmugs byed dang nar mchog rdo rjem dang 'galo
gdeng drug ma yi lha// ganges/ dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab la sal khro gnyer can dang brag gdong ma dang byargad bcas// 'di dag dang laldan g.yas kyi zhal nas marog gengaga' la yig gisA
tshogs gtsobosaspros pa 'o// lte bar yang ngagadag pa'is las mchog gi gsar dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phugan 'khor 'atso dang// spyanam dang ni rnam par gsal na rab mchog mi yi bdag par ris
byadadra ye rje ma/ rong war can dang dbang po brgya byin dus kyi gdengab dang bcas rje'u rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtsobo yis ni btang sogs ngag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan
rnams spros pa'o// gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa lasani sdugan mchog gi rdo rje mi laskyong dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug ter dang na tshes kyi dbyings nam mkha' yon tan dbang gis phyag na
rdo rje lasogs gzhan// gsang ba dag pa 'as na mtha'i ngag bdo mnyam skor rnams sgra yarje rdzom la sogs pa yang// stong dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srogachags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu
nga smras pa'o// phyogs 'dab mar snganam la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i byed bsu// nyi ma'i stang du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug

[! ]mnan zhing 'jig paledus kyi spyi dang mtshungs// thod pa rnamos kyis 'phrung ba bcanges shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang lema'i thugaldan haru ka/ phyag rgya sprul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang pabangag
ts+tsa po'apags pa bshusu brlon pa 'dzin// gnag dang dmar dang dri med la becan lus lha mo rnams kyis phyi rol du 'khor lo gsum// rdzong drug ni khrobebs skyes phyag gnyis zla ma rnams
dang de bzhin 'byung po skyas rnams kyis// sgor ni gtum mo re lags shang phugan gri gug byed pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro// dba' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje Dal ru dang dril bu dri

kha TaM ga/ dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'adakyil 'khor ngag la gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas kun te// zhing dang tshan de dang 'dus pa can ngang dur khrong sa na me dang rlung gdabus su yang// nga bzhes/

tshul dang grong khyer lan phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba dang// shes rab rgyud kyin nges par brjod pasrid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nasaspros pa'i// snying por 'khor len

ngagu ba ste dkyil 'khor lasazhi phyang kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la// rje rje ka ba'i 'phrang ba ngag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po// phyi rol du'i ra ba'i rtsig pa dag 'pha yul dang yul
can zla baema'i gdan la gnas// sgo skyong rnams nam la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi pags na kha khyer dag la kun nas so// 'du la sogs pa lanang bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnamang/
drug tu gsungs pas// zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dzib+ha lan phyagan so ba bsnams// ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam lha gnyim 'a bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi
rang bzhin te// shes rab ngang na thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa 'o// sAng por 'khor lo chu gtar zung du 'gyur te ma yi bdag po dkyil 'khor
las na sum gyi cha// phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhen la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad// phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la na phyogs bcur bkod pa zhim la/
granas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te// der ner ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum zhal gsum re
yi phyag na lha yi sku la dbye ba las// rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gsegayon gyi zhal nas spros pa 'o// rnal 'byor rjesas rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir na nyis
'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'khor la drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrodas rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhalanas spros pa 'o// theg na drug dang bug pa'i chu yos g.yo ba'i dkyil
'khor la gnas rnams kyis drakyil 'khor thig btabanas// snying po lasan drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab ma phyed kyi lte bar ldan pa yang// gri gug 'khor la chu skyes

na chen ral gri mchog gi pho rdzo'i 'phrang ba gnyis gnyis tsha rnams kyi// nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni deshalas// gsum gyis kyang n re ba lnga yi re lnga rtsa

mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu 'o// nyi ma rnams kyis legs dang 'gram pa sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i stang du khyababs// phyogs pa phyogs bral dag tu tsho ni brgyud rnams bya sta dkyil

lu 'khor chen po 'dren zlum po de// dbus su chu skyes lha tshogs mdog sta lte ba la na ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan// 'khor lo dang ni 'thung bsngon po sa na ljang khu dug dang sa gzhinag po 'khor lo
sar// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor le dkar drang sa nadakar bo 'di srung bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang// sa naser bo sngon po dag dang 'khor le dkar po man pa dang ni lang khu'imadogatu'agyur//

madrug gis mtshon gyi sa sta skya byed zhal gyi dbang gas sgo ya 'khor lo de bzhinano// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad// 'dab ma lani

thod po bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dapa ma brgyad la lham rnams// phyis na sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad// de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu

bu sam dang g.yo ba 'dakyil 'khor da dung rdo rje'i 'phrang ba'o// ring po nyung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tsakas sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams// rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nye ma'i smyu ba'i/

dbang gis rang bos sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams// stong sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyuba'i dbang gas thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi stong du 'o// sgo dang sgo ya bar du ha k+Shadang ldan nam rgyu
mkha'i mthil na gnas ba'i sde par bcas pa rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po rab ng 'dzin pa'i zhal dang ngugan gri gug thod bcan// g.yas pa brkyang zhingarang rang stod rnams kyisan/

lta min khrag 'thung sku grol gos dang bral bas// rkang pa nad pa dbral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yar kasogs dang rus pa'i rgyan/ mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la byed pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi

kha dog lnga yis 'thung ba 'o// mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag rdo rje mchog dang Da ma ru dang rje rje kha TaM ga dril bu/ mgran par dbal ldan mgo 'phrung mgo bar cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dpyangs dang
nor bu 'o/ dpal ldan mgul rgyan nang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang nas rags dragadang rnargyun tu// rdzogs pa'i theng pa rnams kyis 'byung pa'i m bcan gyimatha' dag lus la gnas dang

thal ba'i rgya// gtsopo'i bu la thodapa rnams kyis 'phreng ba mgranipar gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi 'phreng ba go/ zla phyed rdo rje'icod pan la ste rang gi skad dang phyag gnas stag lpags grung bo'i
[2]@#// pags pa// zla nyi sreg za'i dkyil 'khor la nizhabs kyicu b.ru bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal las// phyag rgya sku yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro/
ma la 'o dgabyed// phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pas Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha TaM ga nyid de// bshang gtsakhrug dang misha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas/khu ba'asnod kyang
phyag/na'o// de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyis ka bde lasnyams par zhugs pa'i 'khor le lo// ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang khu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang
phyogs su// rgyal ba spyod mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams nas bzhin sran gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du na 'khyud pa dag kyang gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gas rig par bya/

bzhin rnams kyis rje rje btsunamo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs ba brtse ba yis// nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams smin pamedan du ste/ gtsang ma'i
gnas la sogs bar bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du 'o// gadri zhug e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'iden du 'o// sar ba/

tshogs phyogasasu 'gyur te mtshig gi lus la srog ga rlungan rab tu rgyu ba'o// khyab bdag ga na sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// sgra la sogs la la gang
zhig rang sams 'gro ste yul med pa yang gzhan de bzhin khon 'o// gang zhig e waM yig la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o// gcig pa rdo rje can na ngab ba gsum
su yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o// dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du 'o// rgyud rnams drag las 'di

ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyis bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa// gsung gi rdo rjesems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// dze rje can gyi
thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyisams kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag la gnas// dri mdanor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdorje 'o// sbyin pa la sogs bdems
'bras skor drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu bo de dag rnams su gsungs// de dga rnams kyithabs na dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sam kyis gang ba'i bum pa de ngag rnams// bdud dang nyon mos
nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rdzo'i tshog sani ston pa la sogs rnams/ phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste sridagasum skyid par byed ba yu shes rnam shes gcig pu 'o// 'khor lo srid

gsum kun nas dung ba zhes pa'o bad ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dgan// pad+ma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral garje rdzudag kyang ya shas sku chen rnam par ma phyed pa'o// ma shas gcod pa gri gug mchog gi
rigs drug rnams pa 'di dug rnams kyis bskyod pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya// gang du nges par rigs kyi la zug

du gyur ba de na rdo lnga'i 'du shes chen po 'o// gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag na rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na ba// gang du gnyid lasogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams
ba nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam bar shes par gsungs// gang du shes ba mon pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de na thub pa'i ye shes nyed// 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba

phya ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byung chub sems dpa' btsunamor bcas pa rnams// sAtshogs gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog g.yul rnams rnam pa drug sku kun nas niaM/

ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tustobs dang na gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis// rengs byed de na bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyisan mnyes pa yang// ma shes
'khor lo dag la 'khor le rer mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa so// de bzhin tre phro'i lha mo rnams na rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma ya rgyud kyi sku la 'o// srid pa gsum gyi gnas su
bdung rnams dag la bsnun ba nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste// bcing ba khro ba mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyisazhiphur bus gdab// 'dod pas de yi brtson
'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so// gtsug tor gyisan rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tugasal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khre pe'i lha mo rnams// yi dgas

zad gros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la 'byung bo las skyes mthar// sems can kun kyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'ad dag drang ge lus la rig bar bya// de bzhin rgyud dang

bar 'gyur// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs na yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// nam mkhar u'adza?'i sprul pa la rnal 'byos pa ya ka mi

yur mtshams su rdo rje bang dug giganyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bang ba gang// nga ya la la ba rab zhubyas zla ma'i nges pa'i ngabang gis 'phel 'gyur 'al ngomatshar mang/ nyon mongs bdung rnams bam

pa srogagi khams// khu ba'i rtan ni zla ba nyam a ni las yin rdul ni srog chags phung po yi// da yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bso danams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bu sa gzhan du// rangag las
kyi phung powAr longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sogs par byed// de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu la na las kyi phung
[E, ]po rnam par 'jig 'gyurasreg byed mana'ang 'azhigags// dkar po'i bsam gtan dag btsem sngagasadang bstod pa sa pa brgya phrag masacan lus ngag las// pad+ma khyab byed snying po'i zi'u 'bru'i
dbang phyug dag bcom thig la bzang po sgom par byed// de dbus lus po sbas pa rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can// lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog ga go 'phang 'di/
'bargyabyani rgyal po mchod 'os pa// bsam gtan 'di ni sreg blugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong// gang zhagaganod pa bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyan ngang
mtshan du de yi sdig 'bal 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan ngu de yi sdig nyams 'gyur// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang
mtshan ngu de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan dud yasdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyen dang mtshan du
de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de mi
sdig pa nyams// grang zhag dkar po 'di bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa khri la// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshob la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar
'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du'atshob ldeg par gyur pa de rnams kyan bsod nam sa 'brel// de bzhin ba dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod ngas log par g.yem pa dang/ 'dod
chags zhesdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro bo nga rgyal 'dod ba rnams kyis 'gyur// gang zhig spyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhigasbyin/
pa las ldogagyur pa nyin dang mtshan du de yisdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur// de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur lardo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smonaM
lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid a shes rdo rje rnams// dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang na mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' med 'byed/
po gnas mon 'di'i legang zhigastong nyid sa ba rnams kyi tshig sems can rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phal// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha
klu rnams longs ma spyod par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid bsgom par gsus// mtshan mdu b.lasogasasbyor bsaslar yang nyin mo nam
mkha' 'bar ba lasogasabs// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'adakyil du son par mthong// bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tusems brtan byas pas
phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong// srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung ngag nyam zla ba bralanas mun bar rgyabar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni theg le 'a
'dzin par byed// rjes su dran pas rang gis gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mang 'phrog par byed// ting 'dzin gyis khu ba rje nas brtsams mgo bor dri mdu bad bas rang gang
'gyur// nam mkhar bltas pas gtamug rnam bar 'jig par 'gyur dus tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas// nangagi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur tasrog ga rlung dag
bkag pas so// yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te bu ba dramad bde ba yis// sa rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par gyur tu gzhom du med pa tshas nga legasung lasas//
srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs bar n dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa// gsang ba ldeb sAkha mgrin pa mgo de rdo dzo rnams su rim bzhanas zung re// khu ba gyenadu
song zhing khrugakyang 'og tu 'grel tshangs dbyangs gzhom du mad pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid// khya lasogs pa'i sha yi mig dang
rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha lasogs pa'il yaspyan// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gas gzhan gyisams rtogs shes pas nags rgyas sman rtagasum pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

dri ma bral ba rnam ngag bzhin pa shes rlabasngan du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shesasbran// rgyu mthun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang sa de 'dzin
pasamadzes par rdo rje 'dzin// lus kyis bon khu ba phabs lakhor lo 'dzin pa lta ba'i 'khor lo'i bdab gang// mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying la sgra bcas bdu ba mgon po 'khor ba
'jig/ gang gis mgrin par da rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin// gang gis mgo bar zla ba 'an pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i
sa @#// bu gar 'gyur med mchogag bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba// gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// nga ni dang ga ]
mar gang gis rig pa mgo bar rdo rjedang bcas drug pa rdo rjesams// snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur mang rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu ngan

dang nyi ma mgrin par yang// sgra gcan ma dang rnam smiM nasnying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang le ba mjug ris to// gsang ba'i 'khor ler mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can n stod pa mun pa khri khams
gang zhig mig lasogs pa yul can drug po la mo rnams lasas snying sogs gang// gzugs phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ra brtags pa de rnams kyi// dag pa'i dbang

tsha/ bo la sogs yulacan drug po gang zhig ga nod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa// de rnams khu ba mi 'pha lasogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnams so// gang zhig khro bo gshin rjegashed ne zla/
ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro ba par mthar byed do// sgra gcan dang bas srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khri ba bgegA

mthar byed pa sto// 'jug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'diren nga rgyal 'joms brdo rje sems/

wa/ srog rlung bkag pa sa thugabazhi pa yid gyasardor byin zazhe sdanga'adzems la byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyugasems dang 'chen por 'gyur//
la brgyad pa sa bzhagatiyug 'dzoms pas tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems// lte bar srog rlung bkag pas drim gsum bral rdo rje sams dpa' de nases rgyas nyid// snying khar
bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dang 'a rang rgyal danas nigs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyame de na dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral ba rlung gi dbang po
'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' son pa'i sras// lce ba'i 'khor ler mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro de 'dirang po'i rtsa bzhi dang// sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan r la 'o
yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bda mchog 'bo gsum// lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lagamathil sor tshig dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gartsa rnams 'dir mnyis 'gyur bde mchog chon
po' rnal 'byor ma rnams la// gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo'i brgyad// mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drugacu rtsa bzhi le
ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i rma yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsangabar dkar po'i cha// 'khorale'artsa rnams kyang na mchog tu ma 'gyur bdab dus kyi 'khor lolhag pa'i lhas//
dusan drug cusalhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phragagasums tshigs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gunam mkha' lag brgyal ba de yang dang po'i

sangs rgya sa gsus/ khruba'i cha shas sum cunan mkha'anam mkha'agadengs can zla ba'irtsa na zla bzang bo// rtsa dang ba spu gang zhag ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'amang can te// rdo rje tshu dang
bshang ba khrug rnams lus kyi stong ba nyidakyis lce yis bldag par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshams kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zas pas des n drag po laM// mngon shes lnga yi zhal
chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams bros pas des nas nigag sta// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum khral dus kyi 'khor la spyan gsum pa// dpal ldan 'dus par
sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung// der na 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lA ru rtag tu bdud kyi ris la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sha dang rus pa
khu ba khraga rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi na gnas// srog chags so so'asas rgyas lha yul bar snang sa stang rang rang gnas su gtsobo'i gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur

la yul dang yul can sgrub byang rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin// rang byin rlabs pas srog rlung ra bong can du bzhin pa 'daren mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tugyur ba dbal
ma ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang// bdud rnams yang dag bzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas la yAs paspyad pa'i rim pa gsungs// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dag ba bcu yi las dang sbyin dang
tshul khrims sogs las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yod tsanaman la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo// bdudakyi tshig 'di dgan rang ga yid la byed cingang 'a'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin
gyis// bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sastang bsod nams tshul khrims rnamangar dman// stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pa/sa tshogs pa'i lha dgachos kyi dbyangs la yang dag
gnas pa de// bstan par bya yalugs kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas bsgrub pa min// bkug cing 'dar ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing 'a ga nga/
bcang ba// bsam gtan 'jus na ngag pa rnam par bralanas bdud rnams gnas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dram gsum dang bral zhingasigasatsan kun gyi don mdzad
pa/ den shin tu dri zhim me tog dra dang spos dang mar me dang na lha bshos dang// gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pabargya yis bstan ba sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas// sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul
sa stang bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa stor// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngagasagazhigan// zla ba gcig lanam mkha'onam mkha' stong
(ba khrab 'gro dus romun bar dbyeramadabazlas// sang dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bralanas srog rlung gdubs rlung dag khyer bzhin las// grub par 'gyur ri bong
'dzin pa lta bur nam mkhar 'gro bas rigapa 'dzin pa de// bsod nams ngon du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyalasrid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong// ye shes donadu dus gsum dngos po/
stong pa mi gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri brel bro byed cing// tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgonas tshangs pa'i bug ru// bsod nams ye shesatshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par
bra lanas rdo rjesamasadapar 'gyur// shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal sridasamasakyisasar ba len pas longs ma spyod// yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chungam soms kyis byin yang gang zhig
len pas longs spyod min// sha dag sems kyis khyen yang gang zhig sha yid m tshagaca gyis len pas las sprad min// de yisabyang chub sems dpa'igral stobs bcu ldan pa de tshodaman gis cas mi

'gyur// khyams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su changag demadu chang 'tshong khyim du 'gro// nyin byed dus su mchogagi thugs rjes don dutapa rnams kyi tsho dus su//dgos kyi dus su bud med la 'jugar
dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro/ chang nya bud med rnams kyi drim gsum bral a bdA tIdaman cigasacis ma yin// gang dag dngos po dumar gyur paser skyapa gcig bu nyidadudam 'chag la// gang gis

mtsham/bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan gaso'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshog tan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur ba de tshosgrub pa po las bsgrub bya min// gal tebasgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang
gzhan gyur pa de tshod la dam bca' nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bca'anam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus mad par grub de bzhin du// sgra rnams ma rtag dam bca' bum pa lta bur bya sa tre shin tu rtsol
bas byung ba'i phyir// nam mkha' las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las smra rnams mi rtag nges par grub// gzugs dang rig bya dri dang ro ya yula rnams bzhin du lnga pasbyayang cig ma yin//
de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pasas stong bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang// rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bde na sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin la// gang gis thog mar don rtogs
gyur pas sa stang bar snang khams su slar yang de tshulagyis// rnabs don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas deci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal bu gcig pa yon tanam
lus rang bzhin spyi zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas// mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs nas slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhagabarjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi
kacor 'gyur min nam// rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus ba'ang min// dngos bo'i byed bo'i rgyun slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan n gnas pas ni//
rtag pa man par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byis pa// byas pa dang nag zhan pa gang dag ches mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos ma mthun
bar de phyir byas pa rnams n yod par 'gyur la cug shos de mad de// gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyura mngon par gsal byed dag ci yi rgyun yin/ mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis
mno ba ragasal bas de la 'bras bu cis ma min// sgra dang don dag gal tagacig par gyuran de tsha don nyams ba na spyi nyams 'gyur// spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur tonam ma kha'atsam dang/
gzhan pa nad dang gcig pa nyid// song ba sgra dang ldan bar gyur de 'jig rten gsum bor rtagatus med 'gyur// gang gisanamakha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang g.yo ba 'a 'gro bdes na mad pa nyid// gal

tanam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshog sakyi rgyudag chos mi mthun las grubagyur na// de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra man duman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur// nam mkha' sasang dag tu gza'adang

rgyuskar dag dang byel song dang na mi rnams dang/ ljongasrinabo da ni ga ga kyi dam tshig can gyi 'degs sgarini//sngags kyi yi ga rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tanadabang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi// don gcig
du ma'i sgra las kha cig tu yang don rnams mang po de nasgragacig gis// dngos mad stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams lasan grub pas na// dpanam mkha'i ma tog dang nes dang/
shing dang me tog de der yang rang grub/ mo gsham bu lonam mkha' tsam las skyes ba nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las sa pa// bun 'gro ba ma lus pa 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon/
las sa dang chudang ma rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams na phyi dang thadang min// gal te lha gcig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tsho tha dang gzugs dpalcon cig tu// sa dang chu dngamo rnams lha li

de nying ga cig ba nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min// srog chags so so'i lus 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshigs kyi la rnams te// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig
rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus// lus can rnams la yon tran bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga dang na mthong min yodaces grags// srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus bosadas nas slar ga lus gzhan bsam
pas 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i wa rnams de yi sngon gyi lus bo zhig pas rab 'dzin 'gyur// srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi 'phreng ba chen po bzhin du'abo tung min gzug
na te/ snga nabor nas niib nga dgal phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nagasum pa'i shugs kyis 'gro// srog chags srog dang lhan cig bem po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa//
srid ba sum cu rtsa gcig rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig bu lon 'gro/ gcig mna rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral banang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid na// nam mkha' las 'das mi gsa'
min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med yin nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min cing srog rlung mdamasams chad la/ srog chags sams dang
lhan cig bde 'gro ma 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel bas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni thams po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nying ngag dang/ phan tshun ltos phyir gang 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams
yongs su gyur pa rab tu 'byung bsan// ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas dmo 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang dgang zhig rtag

pa nyid mi 'gyur ba mad// zer zug pa dang ther zugadaman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gsan srid sgrub la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir rigs pa dpanarigs bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun

ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun les phyir byas pa dgakyang bya ba ma ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// thams cad rnam pasngarig pa tsam ste sa dang chudangam

dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// gzugs dang rig bya sgra dang dang bcas pa'i bad brdul phran phung por gyur pa min// rnam par pos las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang byung ba lasaman zhing ma dang 'dren mas min//

sa bon las myu gu bzhin la sogs par 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu mang yin// rang dang rus pa chub shadang khu khrag tshil bu pags pardul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig srangs nas slar yang

srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// der ni lus lenaslar yang srid pa gzhan dude ya rnamag tsam pa de nyidade// 'dod chags gnyid log gyur na dang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// gal

'gro ba rnam rig tsam du bden don gzhan rnam par rig tsamadu// de'agyu ragal ta'agrob marigatsaan tshig nyis nyin dganyis phyir/gang zhig 'bad yigyi rig glo bur ba stelhan sa grub pa dani ma rig ma'i son rnamu0f8bga rnam par dag pa lhan skye
bams bo yang ni rig pa rnam dag 'gyur// bams bom lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'grobs sad pa 'i tshan rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi rnam rigami snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshas pa dbang phyug la
sogs 'gyur// bye brag par gyur yang n sar skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs// gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te brgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin// thog mar phrarab

rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i chamadagung gi rdul phrananam mkha' la// phra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i srid pa rdul phran phung po mun// rdul phran bral nam mkha' gnas pa las gzhan
'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min// gal te lus bo rdul phran phung bor gyur na de tshesu a lus po 'jig par 'gyur// 'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phranang

rdulakyang/ sdud dang spyod pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas tarlung dang ldan dang mi ldan bs// phra rab rdul rnams chashas drug la slar yang mashasajugan+tasar ang gangagicha shas drug/ de yi cha shas
phra rab chayis nam mkha'i khams 'dig bar cis mi 'grub// dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran bcas chamad tshad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa yin// cha dang bcas na zasam 'bigs man rdo/

lang man la rdul phran phung po chemad man// dngul chubrangs ma rog cingaganyis sa nor bus rdzob lha yi ni po char du gyur la// rnam par shes pa rnam rtogapa [‚Äú]drug ga nyi bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam
'gyur min// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul phran phung bar de yitshad mas grub pa min// rnam par shes pa 'bagachags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rma lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grag/
gang phyir dmus long mgamed yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yind phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yon gyi bag chagasamin// gang zhig sgra rnams

ma lus rnabs thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos pa min// snyan ng bcas pa gang zhig dra yi rdul phran 'dus ba min zhungand mad pas de 'dzin// lce ye nad can re ma myong la de nyid la yang nd med lce
yis myong bar byed// rnam par shes pa mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phranas ba'igrogs kyang 'gog mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshang ma yis// drag

bo dang na tshangs pa'i ng sangags kyang ni shes pa rnam bar rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong naso thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang n 'gags par 'gyur// skya ba mang cang 'gag

pa med la mang po 'ju bsam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung// 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas largyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan rjes lha dang lha min klu dang bdag/

lha bu yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa stong dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin po sha ya dram tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dumal
rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngob nyud// rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'i m rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin/ gang
zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs padrim gsum bral rnam par mi rtogad ma yin// gang gis da rtogs sa mas la dramad du mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid nas ngas rgyas te// gang zhigasbyin pa la sogs
lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub chos sogs chos rnams dang// byams pa sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang// tshul khrims la sogs phung bo gang zhig
yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun ma rtog pa// de rnams byed bo gang zhigastobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dapa'i in// gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang
na khul drug kyang sa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro// phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs lasogs pa'i yul can rang lus s dang dre la sogs padrug/ stongapa snang dang mun pa sa gsum gnas su rnam pa/
ma @#// kumasa rnam par mi rtog pa// dwang bas 'bazhud pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'godrug gnas pa'i srog chags yin// 'bags pa'i yulakyi rgyal po bdagshegs dam tshig can la

sangs rgyas lamaston mdzad pa po// klu grub rje rdzacan kyang srid pa gsum gyi bu nas chas kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing// nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can sha yi dam tshegacan gyi ston pa byang chub ngo

sta ye shes mtha'acan nagapo'i mang can gzhan yang drum ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung// ye shes mngacan rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing// kha TaM ga dang rus pa'o/

rgyan cha chang spyodacabata'u star ba nag bo'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang na kun tu rgyug pa ster ban bza' sngon po can// sha yi ngam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya skor ba
sbya byang chub rdo rje 'o// gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dang ldan bul sogs pa'i ming can gyis bstan 'gyur// ya shes rje rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la lhubar
'gyur// rab tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nusanag po'i khrag 'thung byed// sha ya dam tshig can gyi srod pa 'gal ba de dag sas rgyas pa rnams srong me 'gyur// mchog gi thug
jo can gyi 'jogs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'dogs pa// gag ming gi rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rdzamin zhange samasacan phung bo byams pa min// de rnams bzang po'i thabs nisAtshog
00/ sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pani// log par g.yem pa dug ba rnam bar bral bas skyo ba 'ad nyid lan 'grub par 'gyur// skyes bus mtho sa gnyis rgyas 'jigs byed la sogs thugs

gyi sha mas mchod pa'i mchodaspyin gyis// de thos sas rgyas lam naseng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro ba'i dbang po' srin po'i dbang po gnyis kyis phyagasakyi sha yis
rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dag pa rnam bral de ni bdud kyis bsus par 'gyur// khro bo' dbang po srin po'i dbang po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par
'gyur// mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khragagis bgos pa'i mgo bo yis// sa bar mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa lasar bar 'gro bar
'gyur/ gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phragasum du rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur// bdud kyi sha yi dam tshegracan gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing// sams
can bsu phyir kha cigatuni 'jigs pa min par bdag nying gzugs na ston par byed// lha rnams sha yisadamatshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sbyam byed// sems can rnams n bsrung phyir kha

gcig tu yang bdag nyidagazugs 'jig byed ston par byed// lang ba glag phyir 'jigs par dusakyi mi lha'i 'jig byed dus naselha ra tu byung// bde byed kyis bsang lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis
'thus par gyur// nya dang rus sprul bgargom mi seng ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes// nya dang de bzhin ra degs la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par
[G]khyab 'jug gsumi bzu// sagasum bla mas yadegs mkha' 'gro rnams nas ni phyir ru ka yi gzugs su byas// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos raman yi chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'dzeg gzugs
[‚Äù]su byas// 'jigs pa med pas skyabs song bu rnams ngag yi dam tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings// kirami ra yi shi ya chod du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs tshos byed tsang//

lha dang klu yi dbang po rnams kyis dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byas// lha bshes 'bras chan 'khur bzho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa 'o thug sha khar rnams// khro bo rnams dang srin bo rnams

la phyugs kyi sha ya gtor ma 'bras chan khragadang chang// sangs rgyas rnams lasung po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka'akhrubu la// khrus bsdus sbrang rtsi mar gsar za zhing tsan dan
ma tog dag gis mgonapor bcas pa mchod// grangagasachang sogs mchod pa dadwag lha dang 'jigs byed dam hi ru kal mo'i// srinabo'i dbang po oMtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshag dpal ldan rgyal

bo zla ba sang gosaspyad// mdung can ma dang dropa nyid 'di dag rigs skyes bud mdamin takhyo melnga// gzhan yang thod pacan gyi chang snod nang ga chuya gtsang sbra am+b+ha la sogs yul// sanang+gA'i yul na

wartsam/ ba glang bsha za kha ba chen skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams chang 'thubashing// klu sogs na maha d+husha ma kha bar bar mi re na rta glingasha// de dzad sag dang mi shaza la pokar yuman bong bu rdza mo chu yi sha// thus
phel sogs rnams kyis shami bza' ba yul 'khor chen pokar ra yi yul// nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang 'thung bkagal rigs spyis 'thung// bud med rnams kyi
dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jig par byed tsang gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i// khrus dang gtsang spra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i pa li'i yul la sogs pa rnams// pha dag shan ma dag bu yi chung
mar bag ma len pa nges par go khayul// gu mar spun zlarim mnal ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus// sor mo dang tsam pa 4 ka sogs bar tshamo'i bu mo dang ni tshamo'ang yin// spyan zla

bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po kaN+Data la sogs par ro// ma yi tshamo chung mar lin la ma la yang stakhol mo len pa ru ra'i yul// bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la pa ru ku lan ta ro gin/
rigs ngan yul// rgyas pa dri bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyan dang mtshan gyi dus su muyi char 'bebs byed// gal tayul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rigs byed ngagadag bden pa min//

na yi dam tshigacan gyi sha za'i yul can phrug gu sha ngag song bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis// mtho ris don du mi dang ba klobags/
cing lha gar dkrugs pa'i zhi ba'i btung// zhi ba'i rigabyed ngag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams// ba grung lAgs pachezhi ba'i btung ba b+ha ga mchog
ba dkrugs rtayi bo rtags bcad l// khu ba khragagis rnam par bgos pa sgrung dang maradu bcas pa lce yis ldagapar byed// de la sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed ngag gis gnyis sa rnams

zlakyi grub// nges pa dang ldan zhib sems dang snying rje ldan ba'i ra[R]mtho rasi rnam par nyams// pha la sogs pa 'don du 'tshab byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod// dka' thub rnams n 'tshong

spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gongam goms sogs yod// daN+Didaka'athub rnams kyis mtho samachod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur tade yang gang gi phyir// shes pa snga grol bas de phyirasna tshogs phyugs

mi dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams n nge'abad 'gro// lcal sogs bamachod pa nyid ngo sagal ta sha zos palas nyasalamigyang na// bcu gnyis pa dang skadang nyamu bzhi klu yi tshos dang sum 'pho ba'i dus dgatu// khyad

tsha/ 'jug la sogs mchodalur 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyisaci phyir sha mi bza'// pha lagranas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu caphyir ltar byed mkhas pa rnams// 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig gi
bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs brgyud rnam par spangs// bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho rasan gnas ong dag tu rab tu spyod la lus bsregasanas// gnas dang gnasasu rus pa'i dum du 'jog cing chang bu ngag
00da kyang ltar khyed su zhig gi/ ma yin su zhig pha yind na lus dang bral nasagang zhig skya gnas gzhan zhugs pa// bram ze la sogs mchod bas gal te da ya la mamatshud par rig byed 'bras khrun/ khrom
rtse la sogs gzhu ba yis de tshashi bal yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur// gang gi pha dgudag dang mi drag dbang gsali dgas skyes nas dad pa 'kha zas slong// nges ba'i bu yis rab tu bzhi pa'i chang bu len
par 'gyur latshuyang len par byed// tshas pa la sogs gtso bo nyam lha mchogabadag po nyi ma ngan ci yis bzag/ sems can rnams la sdug bsngal gyur pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs skyod lha rnams ci las zhi bar
'gyug/ zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bos sems can dang bcas gtso bo ca zhig zla ba bza'adon// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu'ajigs 'jogs ci yis lu ma yan rnams skrag
gang zhig mtho si lha rnams ma dang phyugasakyang sha yis khram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba// gang zhig mi dgasas yi khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yulamin// sa la sogs pa lha

yi de nyid nyakhar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshas gzugs sa tshog sanam mkha' tsam yang sang ge dbang phyugakatso bo tshangs pa de nyid de// yi dgas la sogs rlung gi lus bo rang bzhin
yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman// sa dang chu dang ma yi lus can s dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan// rlung girag bya'i lus can s dang chu dang ma rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha
dog gzugs// drin skya gis gzung bya 'dir na lce yis ro ma dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tsheg las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtogage'i tshad ma yis//
dgazugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tsha'abyung ba'i tshogs rnams bskyod pa min// mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha'atsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang// gzhan dag
gzugs can bzhis sa dang chu dang bun za rlung rnams ro ya dribang po gnyis// khramazasogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim na mun pa can du mtshan mo mar ma mngan ya byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su
son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur// srin po dang ni yi dgas la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su spu rnams ma lus kyang// bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nye mashar

naskar ma ma las kyang// bya rog srin bya ce spyang khyim m lus 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston// de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus sgrub pa'i thab brang dag gis smyos bu rnams la yang// byol song rnams

ni gang du rang gi sags la bab pa'i sa phyogs der na gnas 'cha' la// nga ngag shes pa bram ze rnams lasaMng pa gang las lhag gis gzung bya'i rgyu gzhan min// lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung/
'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed// bram zazhinas yingags gyur ngas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don bar byed/ sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so pag rus pa'i dum bu phan
par byed// blo dang ldan pa'i spyod pa can rnams zhe bar nyams par gyur ba'i yi ngagasaspyong pa ltos// mun pa bsal bamin par rgyu ra la mun las khwa tang yi bshang ba las byung ba// mya ngan med

sus khyab 'jug 'grog khyed spyod byed san mas ngo khA tamachod par 'os// ba gung rgyab dang ra yi kha dang gnyigargyas bong bu'i rkang pa bud mang b+ha gar phyag byed cing// khams rnams gteng la gnyis pa mar
dang yang rtsir bcas pa bldagab gang zhig bram ze rnams// sgra mang yi ge mang las nam mkhar 'gyur tanam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las// rlung las me lam las chu yan chu las sa ltasal
'bras bu'i zas rnams// zas dang chu dag zos dang 'khrungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'dadog/ bsod nams sdig ba'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog
chags phung bo rab tu 'byung// tshog shamabu yi thuba mchogalas mchogagyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra// nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul drang bral zhing yon tan mang ba

nam mkha'i rtags// rtagasakyi gnas ni sangang tshudang ma dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos bo de rnams so// gang yang 'di dag kun s thim zhipanam mkha'isastangadag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar ldan// gang zhig

nga yi nus pa khyu gzhas bu nas gsum lam ldan skur mo 'jigs byed ma// ngananam mkha' las 'das namamakha deb phyugs chog gi mchob spyir rtsa bcig 'khyil ba can// nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'a'abreng ba
'a @#// mgonas bshang lam bar du ba thagadang mtshungs la// mchu 'phyang skar ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa sbyang byed za myong rnams kyi za byed ma// gsal dang mi gsal gcig marig
[Di/]las rigasaminagazhan yang gcig tumakha' spyod 'khor lam// rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ragasadang rigs man gyur pa'i thar bstar ba'i dbang gis 'bags// mi gsalabya rogarwa mi gzhung la 'der
sgra nirang gi yon tanas sprul spru yis byas// nam mkha'i ma tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa de ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur// gal taskya dang 'jig pa'i rgyu sgyu ma chen bo byang ngam
tsha daru kamyun// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stags pa dag khyab 'jug gam mi rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min// 'dan shug pa'i tshig las srog chags sroganirdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med// sems
can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las 'di dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur// gang zhig srin po yi ngags mkha' 'gro bdud kyi ris kyang sha yingam tshegacan gyis bsgrubs/
grub pa'i tshig gis skya bo gzhan rnams kyisanang rnams nges par 'babs par byed pas// stag la sogs pa 'gyes la chu lam 'bar glang chen res byed mtshon cha sogasakyis min// sngags
kyis zeb brang sogs rnams kyis sa yi khor yug rtog par rje ba'i bya ba byeng// byang chub sems dang 'a 'jig rten dbang phyugalhaman la ku rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrubs nas// gang gis/
grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa ya stangangu 'drong pa'i dngos grub skya bo rnams la ster// skal ba ngan ngang nad kyis snga ga bsngal 'chab l 'dzegs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed// sa nga ge la
sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhib lasags byed par 'gyur// byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa lo gas laman ngag bdu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs// dbu ma'aduga' bgag
du b+ha gar dkugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje 'as gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min/ bsha yadem tshig
can gyi grub pa yi ngags sa gzhir shangagacig las ni gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis byang chub lha lasagshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'a 'jug/ sha yi dam tshegacan
gyi grub pa'i yi dgos 'jug pas phran tshogs 'as la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyus lhas 'jug panabade gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston// grub pa'i yi dwags 'jug pa
sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo lason byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyang par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la man// grub pa rnams kyis ro rigs rigs bskyod ston
pa 'jigs byed las rigazhan lam yan// dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyingasasu stobs bcu'i stabs ma nga' sas rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// gang zhig drug po dur khrod ngag tu phyugs kyi spyi
bstobs can thod pa can rgyud ston// rgyal ba'i rgyal srid lha khang sa stang sa las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid de// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor la gzhapar bzhag par gyur pas
ga pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal bo srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyigazhan du sangs rgyas bkra'am yin/ rgyal bo bram ze la sogs gsod ngas mtho rasi 'jug ga gnyan
du grub pa'i tshig ma yin// shayi kha zas lengs spyod byed pas slar yang srid ba gzhan du lta man rigs suspyas// sha yi kha zas longs spyod byad pas slar yang sdug gzhan lha sa rigs su 'di skya 'o//

la mgo zlum dang ni yugs mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro// mgo zlum dang ni yug za mngon spyod byed pas sha ra yang sring gzhan 'jigs byad nyid du 'gro/ sems can phan pa byas
blo pas bsod nams nyid la gnod ngos sdig par bde bar gshegs pasagasungs// sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyidalan pas sdig par nam mkha'atsam pos ston// sangs rgyas
rnams dang 'jig khyed skyes pa bud madra gangangasacan rnams kyis bstan ba lha rtan gang// g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jig par byed// de rnams
rigs gzhag gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par s ngang gtsang sbrarab tu 'jug/ gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhingadaka' thubs pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bstan// khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i
sgra gcan mtshan mo so so' dus su nyin gung thang yel dang// srong dang thun gsum ngag dang nyam nga la shar bar gyur nas lan lngar phyagakhyedacing// sa steng pa drag tu/gagashrag mu stags dug
la lu car ba bos gcig tu skyob// ngag ngo 'gayul ngor pa ltar slob pa la byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur largyal bon// rgyal po 'thab mo yin pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi ba los 'jigs byed
lasogasalatshod nas su// sA tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhen gya nor 'phrog ba yas gdung brgyud 'chad par 'gyur// grubu ba byaDa dbang po spyan bra mi phyogs zhabs dang dum du
zhes thod ba can// dgeslong klu grub ces bya yon tan ma lus 'byung lus sa mas can kun la phan 'dogs pa// slob dpon 'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yus grub pa stong phrag bcu dang/
bcas pa rnams/ gzhan yang de ltar rab tu gragasakyang kyi mde lta dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod// dge bcu lam gyis grub par gyur pas 'phags pa'i lu dang la ba'i nubazaNAn dbyang
dang// phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam da btsun pa'i myu gu zhes// phangags la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag pa rgyal po in+d+ra b+ho pAdeng// de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang

mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs// sawang chu dang byin za rlung ngang nam mkha' tsam gangang lnga pa la yang yan lag drug/ de yi dbyangs yiga'ang dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan
labyas yog yon tan lasogs min// nyim gang du tshangs pa 'dres bar 'bar 'jig par 'gyur bdes 'dus phyimar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchodan 'dir nagayulorakAklo dang nimu stags
'jig par 'gyur// nyung ngang 'ong ba lta rnams rang bzhin yon tanamatshus pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min// asogs gning dbas ya gastobs bcu mnga' bas gsus panyim 'thab mo zad

phyir ro// rong dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du ake kani ring po phyags dag tshig las 'gyur// de phyir ma ring yong la e ka ya natsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod// thog ma'i lenas nam mkha'
mkha' dang gzhan yang zla bcinatsan yi ngabang phyug 'byung// de yi bka' yis yi dgas dbang sgyur dus 'al kasogs grogs ldan sgyur mor byin brlabs pa// phunasas stabason pa gnas dang zhing galha gang

rgyu ngug cu rtsa brgyad klak+She ya// mgon po ma d+hu ma khrodang bu mo lan zlaskyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed// dor na bsobargyad lel brgyayis brgyal bsgyur bas ma kha lasogs 'phags ba'i yul// klako rnams kyi/
lha khang mun can nyimar rjortogs pa gangadang yas brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chas dang dge 'dun rnams lasprubs gsum tshogs spyad gu rnams der bzhag nas// bde la bkodape kalA banus lha gnas dga'

a 'a na mchog tunyim 'gro bar bya// nam mkha' mkha' ngang dus dang dbang po 'gags dus su son pa'i lo yi tshang// mar yangs bo rnams ni kora'adzugs ji srid bco brgyad lo la bsgyurab 'abar/ yang nas yang

du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nasade rnams gzhag par bya ba nyid// jisrings ngang chudang ma rlung nam mkha' yon tananam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams// phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lhan mamakhalas

gzhir yi dogs bram ze ba gangasogs/ sa 'og krudang lha min rnams nas yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// ngon kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal bo mi dang bcas pa sa sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams//

sa dang chu dang madrang rlung dang stong pa nyamar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchong// slob pa mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tudra zhag me tog rnams kyis mchod// sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso

sbyong blangs pas nyin drang mtshan ng nges par gdon// klog mkhan bzhi ngang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas/nyin ngang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// sur yang de la bsrung ba bya zhing nyi ma bsu ru zhi dang rgyas pa ngag kyang bya//
zhodang 'bras chan nye mar rta dang glang po'i gtor ma 'bras chana'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan lasogs mgadamar gza' la ma tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la/ 'bras chen ser po bu

ma sogasakyi gar ma lA yi bla ma 'o thug sha khar gyis// pa sangs lazan drar tshur nag bcas pasaspen pa'i nyamabadun bar dbaskyon la/ nyimar slar yang phyogs su glang po rnams kyi gter ma bya zhing 'khur ba

'bras chan gyis// glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhing rgyas pa'i rin sbyin srag im lasogasagazar// 'brudang maragasar 'aadurub mda' yi lag shing brgyadang 'oma'i mchod yon btung// sbyin srag rjes 'dung phor gang ba'i ba'i
mu yes rta dang glang po brus bya///ngag ga la sogs gtor ma grazhachanashadam rnams nyin mtshan dugasusprin par 'gyur// grin lasogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams rtogs bar

phur bus gdag/ slob dpon gyisazhisudabalnga ya chogs rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrungabar bya// gang dang gangagis yul mtha'i bar gyi skya dgu nyin dang mtshan dazhing rgyas 'gyur ba// thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya/

ming dag rang bzhin yon tanadabang las ba da lnga yis bskor// gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang lags ngag khasbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi roladu// gang zhig zur rnams dar dpyas bcings pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams

de las rje rdzo'i 'phrang bar 'gyur// rgyal chan phyogs kyi zul ma lus yon tanarang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogasamatshamasa rnams// nganang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de 'asnod ngang rtsa mala'i phreng

de'agyur// pad+ma'agasar chal 'diran dgas lcags kyu zhags ba dang nang du nyidengo// musus 'dapom ra srung 'khor gang zhig sI bo yang rang bzhin gnyis pa gsum par do// ltar ba d+ma gnyis la gyur da ba'i snying po mumyos

'dab ma rnam gnyis der/ ku rnams zung gi 'badu phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab ma de bzhin lnga dang lcaminadang// gnod spyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs ba 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo mkha' 'gro rnams// srung 'khor/
'dis ni thams cad bsrung ba 'gyuratakhragadangago'i wang lasogs rnams kyis bris// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyisasrung ba sogs ma lusrung 'khor gsungs// bud med bu 'dod pa

[‚Äú‚Äù]las bu dang rgyal po ngag ngangagayul 'gyed pa rnams rgyalabar 'gyur// nang ba nang las grol b.la'agyur pas yi stang du dbul bo rnams sanor rang 'gyur// skyes pa budamed rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur bsen

gyi bsanganamasamathu yis// bsong mamasas mas can rnams la phan btags ngag bcu'i lam gyi mchong las nam mkha' sogasalaman// bram zegang zhogachang 'thung rgyur dang gcer bu pa bam ral pa can nam dbyug

ba can// dge tshul dang mi tshog sadapon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub tha'i sbyong ng nyams// sum cu'i dam tshigacan gyi ma yi dbang bas nga rnams yulanas bgad bar bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang
mi dga'i las byas drug 'i cha shasargyal po yan// yugasamo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pasbyang nas ngan padmyal ba 'bras/ laangal rtsod byed// gang duyul bdud sa de yod mi bdag dpung bcas deraminam

yang grub ma yin// rgyal ngos laskadang rgyal srib ngang nang grangag 'dzomasangang nor rang bsod nams kyis// skal ba bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa stong grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa steng la lus mi

oM rgyal pospyan las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po/ bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa lasan sbyin pa 'phal bar 'gyur// skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchogatu rang

btsun mo'i b+ha garab zhugs zhes pa/ 'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri gsum dang rnam bral rdo rjesams las gzhan du min// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams s stang dmal kha'idmyal bas 'dira'i
ba la sogs kyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyisam lus tsham tshada rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas// chos ba la sogasabasod nams los spyoda mtharan la malas gang dag nas ltung bar 'gyur

san pos khyen brlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byas pa rnams la rang rangamA yisabardzun tshig 'jam pos bdag snying drung du 'khrid par byed// chang nga sbyong ba so'i
bdag gi 'gal ral bu yod pa long zhig bu zhes brjod// rdzogasasangs rgyusakyis bdung la gnas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du 'khrid// nam mkha' tsamazhigastan zhing bdag gi rigs khyim
sha 'dus ba khong zhag bu zhes gsus// sems can rnams kyis 'gums ba'adebang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzod// de rnams de las sangs rgyas nyidan thub pa'i bka' yigasang

sngags thog pa bden pa yin// gang zhig bsal ba dbagamed byams dang dge bcu'i lamadangasbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas// rdzogasasangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan bas sangs rgyas byang chub
khung bstan to// mo gsham du sus mdam lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'as pa rnams// srog namasa'am rtog men te gong du lags nga'i lus la zhugasunas glogacang dgod// srog chags

bya rog 'ain bsod nams sdug ba'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor// srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'akhyis gsung 'tshabe'atshanam lhung khyod// rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang

ldan bas sangs rgyas pa yigang zhig lam bstan pas// rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas ba dang lha klu dri za lha min dang// khri ba srin po na yi dam tshegacan dang stag gzig rnamA
dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// de kun sham b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas deban nyi ma bdag gis bstan// dang la ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs brtsamang bas gang zhig

bdud rnams btul mdzad pa// de kun sham b+ha la dpal ldan ku lnga pa yi spyang mos tshal gyi dus 'khoragyi// don chen gsar gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa'i m shing rtas dris// ngang la

ldan 'jam dbyas rin chen seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mang ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs// dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyirgyu las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyisAng po zhas
bya ba rdzogasaso///lo tsab kya'i dge slong gnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus ti gtan la phab pa'o//
rgya gar skadang/ shwasarba bud+d+has ma log kA ki nAdza lasaM pa ranam ut+tar tan/ bod/dadu/ dang lasangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam bar sbyor ba mkha 'grosgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces
[7 ]bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpaladzerdzasems dpal phyag 'tshal// soms dbusangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// de rjesams dang 'bade ba'i mchog/ gsangab mchog gi dgyes pa na// thoms cad po de nyid lta/
tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tum pa'i lha// sangs rgyas thams cad manyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags mod chags dang bral ba
Ta man dbu mar yang na midamags so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu// 'dan gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ skya ma drug ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid
kyimathu dag gis// rang bzhinagyisanade 'grub pa'o// 'jig rtan gaMsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rudadang bde dang dga' kun gyis// na par spyod pa'i ng 'grub par 'gyur//
rang gi ngob yongs bsgyur// bud med kun gyi skya mas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'ad// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// kyenam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las mngon du brtags pas//
nam mkha'i kun tu spyod 'grub pa// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/[‚Äù]/thams cad ma lus phyag rgyayi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad manyamasbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma/
zhes rab tu grags// nam mkha' 'gro bzhes// sos rgyas khams las rnam par btags// kun tu 'grobar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha'a'agro ma'o// hU~M zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/
sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// spyam blams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog badrebs bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad na// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs/

gzhan gayon/ kun gdas por bdag gyur to// sems dangosamasadaba'i ting 'dzin dang// byang chub spyod pa sa tshogs 'di// de bzhin bdudadang bdud las rgyal// na byang chub yangs rgyas yin// rje rje rdo rje

'dzin nyid dang// de bzhinapad+mo ba 'chang/ nor bunor bu 'dzin nyid dang// de dag gi yang rigs min no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags brag 'dod pa dang grol ba'ang yin// sa gsum sridagasum mchogagasum
dang// 'gatamagasum dang khams gsum dang// rnam pa sna tshogs dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro bdags ma lus kun// thams cad du mu 'ad 'gyur ro// de la sogs bamatha' yas mchog
chos dbyings mnyam dngam mam lag nam mkha'adabs kyi mtha'aglas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje mas dba' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams
cad manyam sbyor ba// mkha'ago ma bde mchogago/ bskal pa bye bgrasazhed par// sa rgyas thams cad thob pa// phyag rgya'i tshig gang dag gis// 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyurab// de ni bdag
gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag dang bde mchog/ bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go/ rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sams/ lha la dachag/
ba byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'bur sku// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'bur nga/ dal la dmigs pa ra byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bangag sbyor
ba me 'gyur dam ba 'grub par 'gyur/ gzugs bar n lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skya bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor wAr 'gyur/
tsha byang chub sems n rdo rje ste// sa sa rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad
dang/ dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid ltar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab du bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang// dpa' bo rnams kyang thamasacad
dang/ rje rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdordzasams dpos de skad gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro
sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ de khon nyeng sang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa yashes kyi phyag rgya brtag paskadang po'o//skadzaden rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'
de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam spor ba// mkha' 'gro la'ang ba'i mchog/ rdo rjesams dba' bdag spyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thamasacungamanyam/

sbyor ba/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// de bas bde bshad kyisanaM// sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo// sangs rgyas thamasacad mnyam sbyor nga// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dang sdom la
dgos/ dka' thub dka' ba da ma dgos// dka' grub bam pam da pa dang// bde ba dang mingaga' bas 'grub// de bas tsa lar 'dod spyod cing// kun za de bzhin thamaMs cad sbyor// spyod pa ji ltar 'dod bar

byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// las pa dag 'dug pa 'am/ 'chag gam ltar gas kyang rung// dgong ngam rab tu skyayapa chung// gangan ji ltar spyod kyang rung// dkyil 'khor du yong ma zhugs pa la sa//

sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'i ng rang// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor ra// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yisan// thams cad sgrub par byed pan// ngan zos ngan sbyong thams cad kyis//

nyes pa dag tuyo mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa rngams cad de// phyagargya'i tshig dag gisan// bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa 'a mchog/ 'di

ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rje rjesams dpa' bdag sbyor ba// chalugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cang sna tshogs phyag rgya'i
bdag/ bsod0mas chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgyu 'bebasgrubs pa tsam gyisan// sas rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ shin tubyin gyis brlabasanani// sa sargyas bums cad 'du/

bka'agyur// sas rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing// rnam pa kun

chu mchod byeng na// nga yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ mthong zhingamachong pa byas par 'gyur/ 'di dngasangs rgyas thams cad la// mthong ba dang ni rig pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag dum zhugs pa'i ng// padanapa/

dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang reg pa dang// thos pa dang na dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing// sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// 'dingang sangs rgyas thamasacang la/ rnal 'byor

thams cang mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing// sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rnam pa thamasacad du// sangs rgyas thams cad das grub bal/
nga yis bdag nying me nga bar 'gyur// 'di'i bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchong pa'i sngon chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams chogs dgags//de bzhinagshegs ba mchod pa mdzad// thams cad bdag
nyid sbyor mtshod dpal// rdo rjesams dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bang ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la nyer spyor bas// dpalan bzhir 'gyu
grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems ngapa' de bzhin gshegs// nga ye 'bar sbyor bas// khams gsum ma lus thams cad de// rnal 'bur kun gyi longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bdeba'/

stan byed cing// rangag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjesasusbyor bas mchod byed cing// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid kun tu myang byang na// shAn dus+sor bas 'grub par

'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyidakyi// ras yan bde ba'angs/ 'jo rdzasams dpa'i dpa la tshe dang// lang tshond med bda mchog 'grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas rngams cad manyam sbyor ba/

mkha' 'grosgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tung de 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rjesams dngas nga skang gsungs so// sangasargyus thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'groskya la bde ba'i mchog las
dpal rdo rjesemaMsangapar kun tu sbyor ba brtag pas gnyis pa'o////'dzan rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rjerdzasams dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cang mnyam sbyor ba

mkhala'ago skya ma bde ba'i mchog/ r-idz+dzasams dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bad// sangs rgyas thamasacad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpar sbyor
ba yi// mthu nyid kyisan thams cad du// phyag bang ba chen po kun// sa so rjesasu rang grub 'gyur// r-idz+dzasams dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyidakyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bang ba ras pa kun//
dze rjesams dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyan thams cad du// bde ba mos pa'i dngos grub kun// sos rdzas su rang grub 'gyur// jo rdzasams ngapa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyisan thamasacang

du nam mkha' dbus kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur// de yi dam tshigade byung ba/ sdug nga 'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang// shin tusbyor dang sbyor tshan ngo// thams cad bdag nyid dam/
tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du nagacigasrongang// lhan cigaspyod pas rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thamasacad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma mchog tu 'bar// bram sacad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya
thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yis// rgyal mos mchod pa thams cad mchog/ rdo rje sams dpa'i sbyor ba dang// thams cad lu mo 'dus pas// ma lus skal ba bzang po kun// bde
pas so rjes 'grub// phyag rgya'ang yis btab ba las// rdo rje sems dang 'chab 'i lha/ nam mkha'i dbyis kyi ma tha' klas pa'i// lha mo bde ba chen mo kun// thams cang rnal 'bya'abadebasamyas// sdig

zla stobs kyisangomathenadu// pan tshun du ma rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed// dbang po kun nas byung ba yi// mchod pa 'i sbas chen thamasacad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyi// thams cad

bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bang pa thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba// rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur gyur/ lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la//
ka ci bde bar n bstan bya ba// bangaga'i che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ bdag la bdag gis rab tumachod// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis// rjesasu sbyor ba mchod byed cing// rtag tumang bar ngel bas//
shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cadra bdaganyid kyi// ras yan bde ba des/ rdo rje sems ngang 'dapal tshe dang// lang tshonang meng bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi/ ren
