pa'o khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// thodapa in na bu rgyunanam// sas rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ kun tu sna tshogs bla mni// kun gyi slob dpon
kun 'bya// rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// rigasangomatshagacig las byas// de bzhin snyatshog sargyun gyis smras// sangs rgyas pad+mo'idabang bskur sa/
slob ma thams cad dbang bsku'o// sas rgyas rin chen ngo rje phyed// rdo rje'i gsal rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyisangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi bu yin// sangs rgyas kin chen pad+mo
rang rdo sngonor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchogani mchogag/ rang gi dbang bskubasdus pa'o// blugs pa ni byas pas// bsdus pa'i m yang na bris pa'i ng// sna tshogs rab
tshulegs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab rtabartag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ nga byung rnams kyitshatshanama'irgyu/ nam mkha'i dbyis kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ lhumo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog
gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang// thodapa da khA yaMg/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhino/ brtsorgya gram dbagamatsho/ sasargyas zhi sgrub pa// lhamo tshogs
rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor 'gro phyag rgya dang// jo rje tI kU la phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag

bsam shing dang lcag ma dang// paro rta mgrin 'phang mthong ba// rta mgrin ljang khu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang// zla ba nyim de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs rgyas gzug
kyi saya// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bgrang// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i rogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi wang kun// ku mu da dang ma ru dza// ma tog bdug pa mar me dang// sna tshogs dri
rnams de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mcho// chos dbyis mnyam mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyis kyi mtha' klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i rtogs// nam mkha'i
kun gyi skabs na dpal/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i bang phyug rab rgyu ba bas// thams cad bdag nyid grub bar 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang// de bzhin du ni 'kha
gsil dang// dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshog saM gzhan no// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang/ lang dang ni rdza dag dang// rdo rje dang rinanasnod// mtshan na'i phyag

lta rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhinasas rgyas gzugs brnyan dang/ me long dang ni rlung yab dang// rdo rjes ba'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang// rdo rje 'bar ba 'gro ga/ thod pa ma
[0]por de bzhin no// dmas chen dang snying rjed/ [q] chen ngani de bzhin te// rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chadang chu dang de bzhin te// lcagamanang gis bskyod pa dang// sa dang de bzhim

ngangani// ngo khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thams cad zla ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal 'byor dngos grub ba sgrub pa'o// pad+mosnatshogs mang po dang// ljang khu de bzhin
dkar po dang// mthong bsam po la brgan dug/ pa mtshan mchog rnamapa ban// pango sang bo bung chad rgyu// debazhi chos kyi'akhosang// gsal shing dpal bskyod rdo rjengag/ pad+mo'adzama'i
gas ga' no// ga'u dang mda' dang ral gri dang// de bzhin ni 'bar ba'ig// bang bsubs te dang rgyalamtshan dag// mchod pa'i mtsham bsdus pa'o/ de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang// rdo rje rgya gram
de bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// saargyas thams cal sogs pa// ngos po brtan g.yomolus kun// gang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'iny+tsa/ nam
mkha'i ngabyings kyi mthal klas pa'o// de skabcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// de rjesams dba'adabalagyisagasus// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa tsa sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchogalas//
kyi 'a 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o//kachenus gzhan dag bshad pani// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa
thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bskya// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gyingapa'i thabs// g.yas pa ba danagasum
dubya/ su zhu banusa'i stagapa'i tig/ bganyid rdorjes dpa' dpag/ 'dzum dang bcas pa mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya 'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje ngo 'dzin

lce rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khes pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// zhi bla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal
nas las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi sgra mo bsgyu// bsamapa g.yos bas phyag byas pa'i// sas rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//
smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// lu lu bcas bgadan// tshas pa nya dbong drag por bcas// khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur// tha'amo par u0fb1kha'abus bzhin// rang gisbyor ldan snying khar/

bcing/ mthekhong mthe'u chu'adab ma bzhin/ rgyas pa btung pa'i phyag kyang bya/ lus pa'i yan lag thams cad ni// sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying kha kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thalamo sbyar taphyaga'o//

tsha[% ]dpal ldan rdo rje gling ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas nas// khams gsum pa yang phyag khyeran// bu bsnyams gzhan lta ci zhig smos// phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// gar gyi rgyun rnams

ji snyad dang// de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu// rang gi don rnams grub pa 'byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed cing// bskor ba'i gar namA
snatshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzubamomathe'u nungamadzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzubamo khu tshur bcang// g.yasapa ba don gsum pa
bya thug rgyu 'di yis btab na// sas rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang// dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug rmi lam po 'grub par 'gyur// sas rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa//
dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu'o// bsnyams 'dzin chen por bcas pa yis// sbyor ba de nyid bta gnas asu// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bskya nas// spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya//
thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gdu byas de nas phab nas su// skal bzang hU~M zhes bya ba'i grus// mchod pa thams cad dabul bar bya// sas rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa la sbyor ba las skul/
babazang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yonaganyis dgagaM mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ni/ rdo rje thalamo sbyar nas su// de bzhinagayon du bsgyur bar bya// de ni
sbyor bas bteg nas su// spyi be'i mtshams su gzhag par bya// skal bzang o zhes bya ba'i grus// mchod pa thams cade dal bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba// sasargyas kyi ni mchod pa'o//
bya@#// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzubamo mthe'u chung mdzes bskyal te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du grol// mnopa'i gtog ma kun gyi tshul/ dug khrod du lugs gab byed pas//

phyag rgya'adi yis gang byed cing// skal babrang ngo sprodrag pos dgod// mchodapa thams cad bul bar bya// dpalardo rje he ga'i thod pa'i sgra go sto mchod pa'i gdom thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon
gnyis rag gis/ mdzub mo the'u chung mdzes brgyab te/ g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// bal paro gal gyi bang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon
gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ rdorje rinan thal sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul 'babya/ re ba thams cad yosasu rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i/

phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskong gi de bzhin rtug pa dang// me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung bgo/ gang ba'akhon stong pa'i ng rung// yang na ci 'byor pa yis
kyang dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad grub par 'gyur// phyagargya 'di rnams wacisasani// sas rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dus grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang/
kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos dbyingasamanyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyis kyi mtha' klas gi/ rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag de yis ma byas shing// phyol bar yang
rim gyur pa'i// mthasachen dam pa gang yang medu// sas rgyas thamasacad mnyam sbyo ga// sbyor ba'i daphyugade chen dang// sa grubalas dang bde ba dag/ 'di yis mi se grub gang yamed// mchod
pa'i byams grub pa rnams// ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal/ bcom ldan rdo rjesams dpas gsus// sas rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyo ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyum bde ba'i mchog las//
mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpa' skal ba bzang po dam tshigakIrtog pa sta brgyad pa'o//zhas gzhan yang bshad pani// rdo rjesams dpa' dbolagyi lhagi kun[G]sna
tshogs mchog rnams kyi// phyagargya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi sa// rdo rjesems dpa' thade ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag
bzhugs// bdeb kun la zhen pa dang// das grub thoms nung rnam dag phyir// rdo rje'ims dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nyaltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyi// chags pa chen po
bcom ldan 'jus// pal rdo rjesams dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmapo sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// 'as gsum dga' rin chen gzhan// sas rgyas rin chen lta bu mang// sas rgyas kun gyi mi'i rgyan cha//

dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi'aphrogs pa// lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste/ mthu dang ngo bo di dag dang// thabazhin gyis 'grub bo// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang// sangs rgyas gtsug
gnor bu can// kun nas nyon mosa'ajig rten dbang// mi mjed 'a sogs de 'grub bo// rdo rje sems dpa' dapalaspyob// lhamo kun dpa' dus pa yis// kun tu snatshogs skal bzang/
bo mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'grub// sasargyas rje rje bto dzi/ rdo rje nyim khams gsum pa// rgyus babarmos pas thamasanas/ lasa rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa'i//

bdod pa bzhin du 'gro'ong lding// lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdoN+Disams dpa' rab tu'agrub/ mchog chu dga' larab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rjes mas dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes byab mchog

lagi phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugasagar byed cing// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dbang rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rjes mas dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo//

zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// ngas grub thams cad dag pa dang// pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// bar yi dbusa'i dma' la kan// phyag mchogo lam sngon po dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang/ bde
bar ba'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing sar ba'i bar dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs 'jog mchog/ bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+mosna tshogs la gsal// thamasar dug bab tu gnas//
na sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang dgos// sas rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// mi mjel sogs bzhapa bzhin//bya bar zhi bzlog pa dang// 'brog pa ragakyang lhag bar
mdzang// khadag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog pa 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// dpalaldan 'dod pakun l dbang// rdo rje sems dpa'

rab 'grub// mchog cu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mar bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed sa//
bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du'agro 'ong ldig/ bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sams dpa'
rab tu 'grub// mchog tungagal rab sbyor// skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rjesams dpa' mtshig bde ba'i mchog la pazhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o sal la kha yi tshul dag tu// blo baTaM ga bzung ste//

bga' 'khyud pa'i phyag rgyani/ khad bcas rdo rje rgya gram mchog/ thugargya 'di yis btab ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje sems dang ba rab tu 'khrug

mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog la bzhes byuba'i phyag rgya'o/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ma 'or 'grug/ bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgyu yis// rdo rje sems
rapa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byob// 'do pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding/ dpal ldan tsho dang gan 'grub pa// rdo rje sams dpa' bab tu 'grub// mchog
khyu dga' ba la rab tusbyor la skalababazang po dpal rje tsho bde ba'i chog rel pa zhes bya ba'i phugargya'o// de la sogs pa ma la sa mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
nam mkha'i dbyis kyimatha' klas pa'i// rang byungaphyagargya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rjesams dpa' la gnas te/ grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams
(cad bdag nyid 'bab ra sgrub 'gyur// sas rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro rgya ma che ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun pa'i// dbalardzogs
rgya chen g ga gis// mdabazhi yongs su babs ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyalaba'agyur/ tshangs pa chen po'ago dpal rdo rdzomada' zhes bya'i phyag rgyu'o// rkang pa'i dag ci phab pa dang/ gshibs
tamachos pa'i stabs dag gis// 'khor de'i phyag rgyas bstod nas nii// khams gsum ga las mchos par 'gyur// dpal rdo rjemathu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o khya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang/ khrogs/
pa dag gi khyad pa du// sna tshogs phyag rgyus gar byed cig/ khams gsum dganyibasdur bya// dbalardordzog gyi dbang phyug ces bya'i phyag rgyago/ lcagamagang yang babru nas/ bdag 'khyud/

gyi phyag rgya yis// bungamang thams cad rtsed nas ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag 'grub// dpalatshordzo'idod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyagargya'o myang ba btus pa ltar byas pas// drag bodabang po nying

bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum dag skams par byed// dpal rdo rje gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yichung ba'i rdzob ba yis// drag po dbang po nyidabang bcas// zhi bla gshin rje
tshangs bcas pa'i/ khams gsum la ni sdud pa byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// migatshugasazhen pa lta ba yis// drag po dbang po nyidabang bcas// nyi zla ga'i tshas nas
'jig rten gsum yang bra bar byed// dbalardo ni zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyago/ thams cad bdag nyid myas ba yis// drag po dbang po nyi dbangabacas// nyi gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// thal bzla

gyur pa 'ang 'tsho ba byed// dbal rdo tsho kun gyi bdaganying khams gsum slar 'tsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas/ tshas dang nye dbang drag bor
bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbangan byed/ bab rogs gling bu'i rab byed ces bya'i phyag rgya'o/ gi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing// ji ltababs pa'i gar byed pas// las rnams grub pa'i rab 'byams
dang sa grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dang lardo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes byakha'i phyagargya'o/ saM to'u tshul ston rnala'abyor pa// ji ltar babs ba'i gar byed pas// rims dang

gdon dang dug len pa'i// sdug bsngal thamasacad myur dusal// dang rdorjecang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs
bya@#/ pa'i gar byed pa/ gnas gsum rag lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpal rdo a myos par byed pasala'i phyag rgyu'o/ phyagargya gar gyi mchod
mis/ mchod pa thamasacad byas nani/ rang byung gal gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byang/ 'bru mon gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i
gar rnams sna tshog sakyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhiba' 'gyur// drag po dbang po nyid bang bcas/ nyi ts+tshag shin rje tshas bcas pa'i/ rgyas btabarmos byas zos pa la// skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho/
bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dngamimanyam pa'i/ nam mkha'i dbyis kyi mtha' klas pa/ khang khyung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// mam ba'i kun gyiskabasan dpa la//
rdorjesems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pa// thams cad bdaganying babs par 'gyur// sas rgyas thamasanamanyam sbyor pa// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// rab tugrub
pa'i gyu rnams kyis// blamed pa yi das grub 'gog/ nas phyag rgya ma shes ni// dpal ldan rdo rjechos glu/ las rnams thams cad 'ab grub cing// srid pa zhig tu sgrub pa ni/ rdo rjes sa dang 'bade chen

skal pa drang dpal khyod la yang bdag la bsgrubs la lto gos pa mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna

[p]tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub ba bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/de bzhin gshegs ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzatsahU~Mbato kyi bde mchog bde bas zung 'a rnam pa stsal/
hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ sas rgyas thams cad mnyam spyob// mkha' 'gro sgrub bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas

thams cad du/ 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'groma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyagargya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rjes mas dbal
de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyig/ sangs rgyas khyab rgya dbang du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// thatsom gsar gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med lasogs chags chen phyir//
dkar zhing snatshogs gsal ba'i mdos/ sakyi rgyal srid 'ab bsgrags pas// nyen chos las lhag pa med// de bas thag chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje lan chon can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung
gnyis/ kha lon pa'i khu tshul bcas pa yi// sor mo kun la reg bzhi/ rtsa ba'i phyag rgya linapar grags/ 'anyisas rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab bal phyin gsal yin// byang rku ba somasazhen
skya ba dang/ chos kyi kho la bskor ba ste/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab ni// shes las pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ nam mkha'i dbyis kyi mtha' klas ga ba tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub
sams chen bskyed pa dang// chos kyi khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs rgyas nyid du rig pa'i spya/ chog tu rtag ba'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing// rnam pa kun tu mchod
byed pa// de yi sas rgyas rtag pa'i mchog mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tuyang// chos kyi 'khor la legs par bsko// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas
pa'i kan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcasan// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo// rdo rje khu tshur
bcas nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pani// sasargyus kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dga'// dpa' bo blod nga
tsa dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// pad+mo'i bud med bu tshul ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang// byang tUb spyod ga 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen
'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas nol kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus ba med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcas nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni//
sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su/ lag pa g.yon pas bkan ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grubang// ma lus lus pa med par
'grub/ rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang// lag pa g.yon pas bkag na ni// thams cad gug pa rab grubapa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'khrug/ dbalagrub can gyi khu tshur lang// lag pa g.yon
pas bkaban ni// snang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang po sangs rgyas kun byed pa// gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu brang po'o// bzhi
pa mi zad snod yin no// sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzang gzugs ma yin// sI nan mo ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no// gzus ma thams cad kyi thug

rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni/ 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad 'ab sgrub pa// slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa// de bzhin sna tshogs

rgyas pa dag/ sha rdza 'i byas kyi glu glas nas// ngo bo tAyi glu blang ngo// 'jig rten khamasamang rdul phran gras snying khyab pa 'phros ba yis/ rgyal ba'i rin rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi gras snyed pa//
sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi gras snyad ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran gres snyad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul mdzod ho// dpal
rnam pa'i snanga mdzad sbyor ba a lal la ho// di'ing nyid du grub par mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blas pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur ba
gdon mi za// de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang// rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas ba'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes
ba'o rnal 'byor denyidabcom ldan 'das// rdo rjesams pa de bzhin gshegs// dmatshigal sdang rnam sbyang ye// dur khrod dpal gyi phyagargyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan
ts+tsha bar mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byob bang mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khros byung khro// shal ba 'jig pa mchog yin// sems dpa' sngon po
'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po snang// gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa/ lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste// 'di nirang bzhin nyidadug pa// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos

chen po dang blugs pa na// shachen po dang sbrang rtsi cha// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog shin tu khro gdug gtum pa yi// sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir//

'di dpal ldan de ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang// sas rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje'i

blo ro rdzob bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka khabs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul bas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma'i khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmos bcas

de bzos nas// thal bar gyur pa'i ng 'tsho ba byed// dpal rdo rje b+ha bu kardo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sa bal kha yi tshul dag tu// kha TaM ga la rgyab rten byas// lag pa/
g.yon na thod ba thogs/ g.yas pa bdagasum par byas// nam mkha'i phyagargyas rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med lasogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad maba' las

'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis los btab nas// bde ba'i lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nagamakha' lasani kun lhags te// bdag gi smyon pa de spyod do// drug bo dbang po nyi dbang bcas/ nyi blamakha' 'gro mi babrad tshog

mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas// lus ba med par de bra 'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor// skal ba bzang bo dpal rdo rje mkha' 'groma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i
sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bar ba'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krun phyad banus la// rkang pa'i ng gobabasdamasan// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas/ nyi zla gshin rje tshus bcas pa/ rgyas btabarmos byas

bslang nas su// ga' dga' byed cing de ba'o// de nyid kyi sbyor ba yis// de nas bde bar ba bsdoms pas// legs par bsdams te phyir btagasanas// ba tsubakram sta btung ba'angs// sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni//

de nas brgya phrag bskyod pa yis// skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyis// bud med kun la de spyod do// bde ba legabazags cad mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
bya@#/ 'o/ de nas gzhan yang rab bshad g/ sas rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ dpal ldan ta ka babs pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i/

mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas// shi ba lding ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnag/ zhi dang drag po chos byed dang// gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i

mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// ma tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang// sras dngam gdong sprub payis// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba
mis// sbyor ba'i gnyer babad ba byin/ mngon par gtor zhing sa rgol rdzog// dal bus rgyun du dbugs 'byibs// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs// 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin de// gab byed rab tu mos pa/

dang ba dang gsang ba'i las rnams dang// tshangs pa chen ngo'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las 'gal// de bzhin gzhan las 'dren pa dang// rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang// dur khrod dag gi

gar byed dang// de bzhirlung gi dkyil 'khor dang/ yag tu 'jigs pa'i sred nga 'i ba// las kyi phyag rgyu rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debasam yi rgyu// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmong

byed ma'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'degasabyed ma'o// lnga pa gab byed pa yirgya/ drug pa gsod ma'i yin par bshad/ bdun pa khra ba mo yi rgyu// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin/ de nas phyag rgya 'a dikun gyi//

[s ]thugargya'i lan rnams bla na med// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'jog pa/ khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong// gang drag byed cing byes na mi/ rgyas btabarmos byas zos pa dang// thal

bar gyur pa'i ng 'tsho ba'i byed// de nas phyag rgyu ni nga 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje spor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad 'basgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur pa'i rgyal thog
la rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmos mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas ba ta ba rmos byas mnabs su
gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba 'gas// hU~M la 'a do snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ nyon mongs kun las rgyalabar mdzod// ma lus pa
dag bsnams su gsol// nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blas ba yis/ de rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro skyam bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par

'gyur// dpalahe rU ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcomasngon 'dus/ ro rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ 'dod chags thams cong rnam dag phyir// bad+mo'i phyag rgyu dpal du gnas//
mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas re na rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshog
bla@#// rgyun gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde brnyan bzhin dam pa bgyug/ gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing ga byas pas// pad+mo'i
mtshan mchog nga ror bcas// phyag ni rgya rnams 'kholo bskor/ sas rgyas rdo rje pa'i dzin// rdo rje nyi ga khams gsum pa/ paNo skya las sna sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas M byang chub sgrub pa mdzad//

( 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o// skal pa bzang po dbal pa gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phyi ma'i gnas// rgyal po'i skyil la

krung bcas na// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyams pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+madag kho ci bdeb bzung// thang gi snying khar 'dres

zla pa'i tshul// pad+ma 'dab ma ba 'byed pa'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+moston bo ci bder bzung// rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phrug rgya bcing bya// bsnyams pa'i lag/
ba g.yon pa yis// badro dkar po ci bder bzung// 'khor lo phyag rgya bcisanas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bag/ bsnyams pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo mthing ba ci bder bzung// g.yas
pas rab tu gar byed pa// dal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// bsnyams pa'i lag pa g.yon pa lis/ pad+mo so'abo ci bder bzung// g.yas pa rang tug byed pa sa// chu srin tshul du bslang bar bya// bsnyams

0ba'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// bad+mo la brgan mchog 'byung ste// rang gi snying kha 'dren tshul gyis// rdo 'i phyag rgya'i bcing bar bya// rnam par gakhrigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin
! rgya chen ma yis 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan// pad+mo gnas pa'i dbal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbar 'gro ba gsug dpal btso'i rgyal ba'icig pa'i lha mo rnams so/da
nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di// bad+morgyal po dpal gyi glu/ las rnams thams cad bab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugasa mchog sna tshogs 'dzin//
sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol/ ]zhal la la ho/ kyagar dbang thal dga' dga'
ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sas rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshes pa 'jug se' dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags a la la ho// pango sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad ga ba'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa/
brjod m tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da dung rnam par sbyong// pado 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngagar mkhan gar mdzod cig/
glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdonami za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// rnal
'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ deb ma reg rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// dpal ldan nyim phyug rgyar gnas// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad
phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad nga// bud med la sogs yin te mchog/ rin che nagasanadam las 'bebs// yon tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi pas phan pa mi 'gyur to// shes bab
thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por 'gyur// drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag nge nyid kyis sgrub pa byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang// tshul dang gcibarjid chen pos
ston rdo rje ga'u dang mda' mchog dang/ shin tu legs pa 'gongs pa ste/ mdangs gsal 'dzug dang bcasaM pa'i spyan// g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du brdegs// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas//
nyi zla gshin rje tshas bcas pa'i// 'jigarten gsum po ma lus pa// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad// dpa la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dus lo gnyis bci
rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas// bdag ni stan la 'dug nas nii// bgegs rnas thams cad gzhig pa bya// dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo// dbang bskur ba dang gtan dag dang// rgyal mtshan mchog

ldan mchod pa che// ji lta'i tshul dag ston ba dag/ rang gi don rnams 'grub ba'o// de nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di// rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad par du ni bshad
par bya// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gzhis ldan pa// 'jal dum g.yul 'gyed rnamamangakhyad par sasargyas kyis 'dul ga/ rnam pa snatshogs 'jal dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgya mtshan
can rdo rjenyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyum bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin snatshegs char 'bebs pa/ bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la ho/ mi zad gter gyi dbang

bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog khud med rinachen dag pa dam pa'i don

du thams cad 'gro/ glu 'di dgan blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyong// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ rnal
'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rjesems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal// rta yi phyag rgya ba skyu gnas // thams cad dag pachos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo
'thon du// rab rtagadon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags nun la g.yon par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug pas ston// zhi ba rnams zhi ba'agyur// drag
shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bshibal phyag bzhi ga/ zhas bzhi palarmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyug/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis//
dpalaldan pa rnosnatshogs zhi/rdo rdzobacas shing slong bsgrug/ g.yas pa ba dan gsum ba@#// phyag rgya 'di yis btaganani// shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang// de ma thag tu kun bslang nas/

ldang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang bo dpal rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyugargya'o// g.yas dang galon dasbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa li tshul byas nas// khro bo'i

skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tubashig/ dpal rdo rje khro be gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya pa'is pa 'di'i/ rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// khyad pa du ni

bshad par bya// myos byed stong pas lhag por bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag pa'i thab cu'ajigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston//
dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod// thams cad rnam bar dag bas ngo 'thonastobs kyis gnonabs gnon/ hi te dang// dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu zhig/ gab

kyi rtsal gyis gnonapa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyuganon// spyol chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa lam gsum thub dros// bkyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu chezhen/ mnyam sbyor bu Ta laDa

tsha snying las dpa' bo dros shig rab dros shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshas banon// sbyor chen tshas las grol ma dros shig sma 'a// rab kyi rtsa la gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo
'thon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' dros a 'al to// gdug cing khro la 'ab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrubazhugs a la la'ato/ oM su b+ha ti suM b+ha hU~M phug paT/

mdza' bo ma la bya 'am mi bya mos rtog de dag med kyang ba// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyum yin bas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer// rgol ba la yang bya 'amom bya yongs su rtog bshad kyang/ de 'dra'isgril bsgyu ma yin

pas de la dbakazhes su zhig zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam por sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdonami za bar 'grub par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya

zhes pa'o// mdzub mos mthe bong gnas ni/ rang gi mthe bosamadzub kho mnan// dbal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// rdorje spyan niganyis dag
cu/ khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya// dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no// 'di'i sasargyas thams cad dang// de bzhin dpa' bcomos cad dang// jo 'dzin ba thams cad dang// mi de nyid 'aka grub par 'gyug/

dpal grub smyon zhi grub pa ste// sems tsan thams cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dgo grub rab 'byams rnams/ ma lus rasagrub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thalatshomanyam sgyur te// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug

mtha kho'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag/ khong stongahi'agyur dam pa'o// spyilo'i mtshams su'akha bzhag nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus la// lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//
0 bya da da chems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyago/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzubamo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin m// 'grub
ba bdudal sogs pa phra// de bzhin nga ni rmos par byed// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrug gtul rnams 'byin par byed pa dang// de btin nor kun 'phrog bar byed
lcangal bso po'i dpal mnan te// dba' mo dag kyang phyogs nas ni// mngag gzhug ma ni byed pa dang// gnod sbyin m dang dge ba spyod// gnod sbyin ngag gi sde da bon du// 'disan myur du 'grub nga ra

'gyur// dpal rdo rdzoganod sbyin gyi phyagargya'o// rdo rjethalamo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par ba tu sgrub// mthe bongamathe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// paro dri med rab tu rgyas// 'dis ni sdig rnams/
'byang bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang nas rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dang 'a nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan dpal mo'i phyagargya'o/rdo rje thal mo mnyam smra'/ mdzub
momanyam pas phyir bkug ste// mthe bong rdo rje g.yog pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btabanani// nam mkha'i thams cad rab 'grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha'
las des rnams thams cad spyod// rdoN+Di thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag gnyam pa brkyang// mdzub mo rtsi mnyam bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa ste// phyag 'di yis
dbatabanani// sangs rgyas byang chub bab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha lis skal bzang smos ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes 'o/ lus dang ngagasas rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i

phyagargya' ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lharanibadag nyid bya// 'dis nyi sangs rgyas thams cad dpal// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di
nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sas rgyas kun bdag dngos grubani// chos dbyisamanyam dang mi nyam pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sasargyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu
ma bde mchog 'dis// mi 'grub 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i// ngamar rgya chen gang yang med// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rdorjesems dpa' dala sbyor ba'i// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs
su ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs ra ru bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro'ong lding// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa'i
rab tu 'grub// saargyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po 'dapal rdo rjesems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu ma sangani dmigs su med/

bung song kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab nani// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding// dpal ldan sgyum kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje ne a dang 'a rag tu 'grub//
sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// med bag yin med pa'i ng min// dbu ma yang ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub la ba 'grub pa'o// thams

can m mkha'imanan nyid do// namamasal yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyum lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang rig par 'gyur// dmigs su yod parong
ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pabazhin du 'gro 'ong lding// bud med la sogs yin mchog/ mkhas las dngos rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med pa

bdagaspyor bas/ nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'grosgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin rtag par 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// chags pa'i nyes pas mi ges nga// rnal 'byoldan pa zang

rtswa de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes ra sa yomi gos// nyin tugadug cing drag rol// zhi bas phan pa mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa/

yis sdigameng stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// drag la sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang// byed ba rnam pa sna tshogs la// rje rjes/

dpa' dpal gyi rgyu// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'o// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis/ 'dod pa bzhin du'agro bong lding// chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs

skal ba bzang po dpal dmatshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// byu ba dang ni bzlog pa dang// khyad par du ni 'brog pa dang// yan lag kun tu byed ba yis// den nor rnams kun kyang thogs// rtogs byed 'byung la sogs pa yis//
khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar par byed cing gsod par byed// shi la'ang mod la sos par byed// sbyor ba las spyod thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po zhig lus pas// rgyas btab rmos byas bslang
nas su// zaga' byas nas ni bra bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum panim lus pa/ rgyas btabarmos byas zos pa dag/ thal bar gyur pa'i ng 'tsho bar byed// spyor ba thams cad kyi thug

shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor pa// mdzes bab ltaba'aga'akhyed pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa//

rgyas btab rmongs byas bris pa dang// thal bar gyur pa'i ng 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu che// mdzes pa'i bshin ni rnam sgyur ba// rim gror bsus shing stag pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa/

sangs rgyus pardo rje tshe'adzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum du// rgyas btab rmos byas blaso nas nii/ zlos nas slar yang 'a bye da/ sasargyas byang chub manyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' thabalta zhing 'dzum//
shin tu srid ba yang dag sgrug/ gsang ba lta la gnas na ni// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// nyi zla gan dzitshas bcas pa'i// srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum ngag gi sgrub par byed//
stag la sogs nga le nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing// rim gros bcasanga'i ltag pa'i mchog/ stag pa'i lta bas gar byed cing// mdzes pa'i tshul dang 'bras

rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nyidabang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshas banus pa'i// 'jig rtenaM gsum dag sgrub par byed// mar ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro la 'gyur/
bar bcas par dzum// gsa' khar lta'i ngalegs par gnas// drag po dbang po dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rjechas bcas pa// rgyal bo sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum ngag ni sgrub pa la byed

tshe 'dong chags myos pas g.yem spyob// mdzes pa'i yi ni rnam par bsgyur// 'di ni bsten kyi phyag rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba'ajigs 'jig/

! lta g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bo'i byed// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ thab tu dga' babalta zhing jus// g.yon pa'i bshen gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag kyang

thar par byed// spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mthob// rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal// so gcigs pas ni mchu yananan// 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed// ba'idagyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyi badra ga
mchog/ mdzes pa'im bdu sos mnan te// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di// sangs rgyas thams cad ngagyes par byed// 'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyob// sog pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag

bsam rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i mtshanu g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha

gyis ni bro myong bzhi/ ma mnu so yis mnan pa yis// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang grwa bas byed// bde ba kun gyi 'i myong zhing/ kha mchu nas bas mdzes byas pa/ ta'adzum pa 'i phyag rgya

mchog 'di ni// la bar 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o// bde ba myong pa rab sbyor ba// zang zing lta ba rnam bsgyur pas// sgyus btab rmos byas gros pa yi// khams gsum/

dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes pa la lta ba'i gzu byas pas// rgyas btab rmos byas bslang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub pa byed// sangs rgyus gas nga ba'i mnyam

sbyor pa// lta ba rab zhi bde bas gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud mang thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas// lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur/ da u0f9f ba'i phyag rgya ra chog
'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang rabs bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum// lta ba gsal la bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// stong la sogs

pa'i ro dang ldan// stag bcasalta ba'i gar byed pa// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di'i// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyagargyu shes pa'o// namasdu sany+dzabud+d+ha b+huzhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na/
las dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par gsan 'grub// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// chos rubyis mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ mamakha'i rakyis kyi mthas klas pa// lan

cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i yi// mo pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'ag/ gang dag byas par ma gyur cing// grol ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i// dam pa rgya chen de dgamod// o 'u klu spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha' u0f7ctsan sarba an

0shang la sogs// gru rnams thams na rjes su blang// o~M gyi rgyu yi phyag rgyani// tshangs pa'i byas kyis ci dga' blas// ma lus lus ba med pa yi// sems can thams cad thag par byed/ derje drag po gad

ma cho mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing/ 'phrug gi sgra ltor zab pa yi// ru bun bu'i sgra byung na// phyag rgya 'di yisarnal 'byor pa// khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing// thar bar byed cing gsod/

par byed// shig med la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu bshad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// kazhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// thams cad ngag pa'i rab bsgrubs pa'o// hi zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgyu// khams gsum rnam par rgyal

bar byed// kaka la rtse dang cera'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu gdas snyan dang// ka hangasha yi glu yi rgya/ 'joms ba thams cad grub pa'o// klu phyag rgya bshes nga'o/ gling bu dag ni rgyud gcig dang// de bzhin
rgyud mas rgyud stug dang// sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams/ las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin duga' byed bas so/ ma brdus par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la mchog tu

ni brdzus na dpal ni ba'i 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigadang// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rnam par se'al sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM ba/ 'uTA matU/ sa su

de yi bkan tsamagyis skrag nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun kyang bdu gyuran// gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig skyes// g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang// thal mo dal bus
brdabs pas 'grub// g.yas pa'i thal yin par gsus// gnyis ka kun tu sdud pa yin// thal mo'i sprul ba rab sbyor bas// las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang// thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang// glu dang/

rgya'i gabyas bas// thams cad bdaganyid rgyur sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sogs dba' stag pa la// dpa' l dpa bo de bzhin gshegs// rdorje 'dzin pa snyir/ thod pa 'jig rten

dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa lag/ shAkya thub pa mi sbrul// ngomatshar lani ab gi/ rab tu zhi la sas rgyas rtag/ sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i na/ dngos po ka 'a gyi
rang bzhin gyi// nye bar gnas shing byin gyis zlog/ lta bas mi mas pa yi gzugs// thams cad bdaganyid ston par mdzad// legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi// mchog tugyurang 'a' tu sol// thamA
cad bdaganyid grub pa'i mchog/ de ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sas rgyas kun tu gyur ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor dam pa stor bar gyur// phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis// rang gi mchod pa rab tu sgyu

rdo rje sems dbar dpal gyi lhagi/ sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan rnams dang// sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas// yid la bsam pa kun rdzogs phyir/ rnamachod pa dam par sbyang
bar bya// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang bo// kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur// kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis// rgol ba dag dang ga' byas te// de nas rgol bar ci rigs par// sangs rgyas thams
bya@#// nad 'byung ba 'gyur// nas slab ni rgol ba yang// rdo rje'adzin pa chen por bsgyur// rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du/ brjogs 'byung mchog tu bsgyur// de nas slar du rgol ba yang//

du/ rdo rdzonyi ma mchog tubasgyur// de nas phyir yang grol ni// rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar// de nas slazhisgol ba yang// bdag nyid 'byung bar rab tu la grub// de nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di// sdom pa thams cad
ba ston pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu// khyad par ni bshad pa'i bya// la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang// la la rab tu 'jigs pa'i
nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od ces mchog pas 'jigs// la las mdas bzang gzi ri bde dang zhi bar ldan par rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang// la la 'gro ba thams cad mnyisaM par 'jog pa'i gzugs
smraldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams la// a la la thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod// bu dam te a/ ka la ha/
rnamapa mang bo 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gab mkhan mchog gis gang mdzad ga/ dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzod a la la'aho/ rnam mang bde mchog rab tugar mdzad pa yis

tshang/ thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod// 'di dag grub ni blangs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ 'grub par 'gyur pa gdon mi bra// de ltar rang tshugs
byas te// de las gang zhig pham gyur pa// tshogs la de yis tshog sakyi zas// yon dang bcas par dbulabar bya// mchod pa'i ga 'di dag gis// sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bsod nams thams
cung 'phel bar 'gyug/ de bzhin rtag par bsrus par 'gyur// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang// mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams dang// bdud dang sems can dmyal ba'i rnams// 'di
mis zab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dus grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs// dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang// sangs rgyas dam bkrams cad dang// phyag rgya'i mchog rnams grub par 'gyur/ gar gyi phyag rgya/

zhes pa'o// rab chu dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab phra ba'i rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar spyor ba'i bde bas rgyus pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// thog tu bde mchog

rnam pa snatshog sa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i las spyod dang// rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas re bzhin gshegs pazhugs do rta mchog ho// rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i
mchog la rol cigaho// bde bas slob rnam par rol cigahUM snadzamar/ a'agal to/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu masna tshogs kyis// slob ma'ag tu gzung du gsol kye ma'o
bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol// dam pa'i rab tu zhugs par mdzod/ bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur// a la la ho/ e ma'o rig shugs shi gzhugs shigamakha'agro
bde mchog yos bskyor kun tu zhugs// 'di dag klu ni byas pa yis// sas rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/

rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa dang// rdo rje'in chen bla med pa// rdo rje chos gsung ba dang// rdo rje las ni byed bar 'gyur// hUM rdo rje las kyimada' gzhu la phyag 'tshal la// dbal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig

la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha TaM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu lag tu 'khrol ba la phyag ratshul lo// la las rab tudrag ci skya bor drag la drag pa'i bud med skultar rab tu snang//

tsho'agro'am thal las 'dul phyir las phab tu rno ba'i la kho le phyag na bsnams pa'i sku/ la lar zab tu sa shing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad/ la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i
chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i dam tshig dag la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgrung
ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la la dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/ la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du ni// lar rta mnog spyor bas

'dod pa sgrub// rdo rjeklu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang// mthing kha sar po kun bsdus pa// mo tog phyag rgya mchog 'di'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyagasamathing kha

ljang khu'i mdog/ tshon sna bzhi yis bcos pa dang// dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub// khams las byung ba thams cad dang// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shig

dri zhim pa// sngal bshin tumanyam par sgrub// tsan dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang// ga bur na ga sha la ki/ bdug pa bu rim dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gan dan dri dang gu gul dang// sam+b+ha ga bur//

lha rnam pa'i sprul pa ni// brda yi dam par rab tu bshad// zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro yi// khams gsum 'di ni rnam par brtags// namamakhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag/ ma ba 'gro zhes ni nga grag/
kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgyun// thams cad nam mkhar 'gro ba ste// sas rgyas tham sa cad manyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma shes rab tu grags// sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni// ra la 'a 'is ming du btag/
mkha' 'gro ma yang a ral// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas thamasacad mnyam sbyor ba// sgyu ma kun rgyaga' byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro mas dam
tshig mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// jo rje ral zhes bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad la nyas sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med
pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dga' pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// deni skal ba bzang por bshad// gang zhig rdo rjesams dpa'i mon// skal ba bzang po zhes brjod na// shin tu srid
pa kun 'grub cing// de ni dbang phyug chen po 'grub// ki'adod pa yin par bshad// dga' ba ke 'aki la yin// byams pa chu srin yin par bshad// 'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje dril
bu'i phyag rgya dag/ jamatshig gsum gyi dum pa yin// mo dang b+ha laMkun bshad ng// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyu yin// dras te bcug nas brtsis pa dang/ shugs nas dbang du gyur pa ni// dzahU~MthaM
ho bshadapa ste// sas rgyas kun gyi brda yin no// e hi yi hizhes bshadang// tshur spyon phan bzhud ces bsgrags pa'o// tistazhes gsungs pa ni// lo ngos la drongs shig drongs shig ra 'o//
kha kha khA hi bro zhig ra 'o// a pa zhes pa 'byung rig pa'o// da la du ru byin zhes pa'o// ruta ma ta stsol cig pa'o// tshulu yulu zhugs shig pa'o// a ra ba rar bskul cig pa'o// e ma'o bde mchog
ngo mtshar ni// a la la ho zhes bshad ng 'o// bde mchog rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin// e ma'o bde barmos byed ma'o// snang ba zhes pa za ba mo'o// hUMshishini mi'aphel ma'o// shin tu brtan dang rab tu
ban// kun tu brtan dang ches brtan pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang// 'jig rten dbang dang mkha' las skyes// shes rgyur dga' gyur grub pa la 'gyur// zhugs la dbang du gyur ba

mdzod// oM aM a sa kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin// thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang// de bzhin bde bar mkhyen bani// oM sarba bid ces lngashad pa ste// sasargyas brda yi phyag rgya/

yin o 'u ru spu ru dz+wa la tib sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sam+b+ha at+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA// 'khor ba'i dngos grub mkhyen pa dang// don dam nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rang byung bcom ldan 'das// rnam snang mdzad chen gtso

be ni// sangs rgyas M brda yi phyag rgya yin// skal ba bzang po zhes bshad pa'o// ko Da la gag go ba ba/ koT ba/ ko Ta bshu/ ka cu pe ka/ ko la ga// ko lo ba/ kol bany+tsa/ gal sta thA/ phyags rdo rje/

rang don gyi// mtshan 'di rnams ni gang brjod pa// de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// bran ba'i dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rgyal srid dang ni los spyod dang// gter gyi rnams kyang lhag pa ster// dgos ra thangs

cad byed par gyur// de bzhin dgu yang med par byed// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang// lce dang lus kyang de bzhin te// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang// rang reg yang bdag gi ngos// rdo rje mtshon be ri dang/

zla dgra bo rag cuphab grags pa// de yis phyag na rdo rje gyur/ lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya// nyon mongs thams cad gang thad dang// dgra rnams kyang ni gang brad pa// phyag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i phyir// de ni yak+Sha yin par

tsa/ bshad/ daru dpa la ni rdo rje che// thal ba 'jig pa'i mchog yin te// sas rgyas kun gyi khro bo'i// brda yis rab tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje 'bar ba'ab tu'ajigs// kha drog ni rgyal mtshan che// thod pa ga bam

phor pad+ma'i snod// khrag chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che// dkar mo chu byed rab rmongs dang// 'o las dang ni sbos byed dang// gtum mo dang ni sma ma dang/ lha mo bdun ni brda yin no// sus shig gyur du rnam rgyal dpal//

thal ba bzhin du rab tulcogs// d+hi d+hi hUM kun bshad pa// sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyu yin// rtsol sgrig dgongs shig de pakin du// rol tu chug cig gsod du chug/ ma la phan phan skyes bshad pa// sang

rgyas kun gyi brda yin ta/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug dam pa'i rig pani// sas rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis// skal ba bzang po yin par bshad// rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten dbang

phyug ces bshad de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bang dag gis// de yang skal ba bzang zhes bad// dug dang grub dang de bzhin blo// rdzu 'phrul 'phal dang 'byor pa dang// rnam par ltadang sgrol ma dang// rgyal chen

dang khro gnyer ma// pardzong gnas zhes bya ba dang// rdo rje pad+mo'i dbang phyug ma// pad+mo lha mo rigs chen te// saargyas brda yi phyag rgyas bshad// nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs

mdzad pa// skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags// rdo rje nyi ma nor po ri// twaM/ ba bo/ TaN/ taT Ta kun tagrags pa// sas rgyas kun gyi brda yin te// dbang bskur ba dang gtor dag dang// rgyal mtshan rtse mo/
mchod chen po// sna tshogs pad+mo thams cad na// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa// byang chub kun gyi sems chen bo// sna tshogs rdo rje ba'amed// thams cad dag par mos payin 'dzin
rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa// rta mchog pad+mo dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang zhes brda yis bstan// brda yi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// dkyil 'kher sbyor bas nges pa ni// grogs po mkhas par nas
pa yis// das grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// brdayi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rjes su chags par bya'o zhes// ma lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing// das grub kun la rjes chags nga// mi 'gyur
ma pa 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// las kyi das grub rab 'byams dag/ ma lus par ni myur du grub// rjes su rgyud par bya 'o zhis// ma lugs
shes pa bzhin byed pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// rjes su chud par bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// mkha' 'gro sgyur bde ba'i mchog/ ma
lus lus pa med pa 'grub// rjes su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// sgrib sbyang thalasand dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rjes su yi rang bya'o zhes
ma lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// bud mad lasogs rin chen mchog/ mchod pa'i las kun myur du 'grub// rjes su gzhom par bya'o zhes// ma lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas// rtul phod las
[‚Äù]da rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rjesams dpar dpal gyong ba// dbyibs dang gzugs ni ci 'dra ldan// thams cad bdag nyid rgya sbyor/
ba// ma 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// na kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// prasan yi dngos gruba mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sas rgyas thams cad
mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro skya ma 'di mchogagis// yang dag bden pa tshul bzhin du// mthong ba rang gi thos par byed// sa chu ma rlung nam mkha' dang// khams rnams kun ni thams cad las// thams
cad mthong zhing thos par byed// rnam pa3shes pa kun 'grub cing// kun tu thams cad kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang// rnam par shes pa'i las kun la// thams cad mthong zhing shes par

byed// parob chags pas rjes chags nagashing// sna tshogs pad+mor kha 'byed pas// sras nani sna tshogs pa// mthong ba dang ni thos par byed// me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ spos dang mchod pa thams cad la//

rnam pa cang shes pa kun grubapa/ thams cad gtong zhing thos par byed// ngeg dngam reg rdo rje che// ral grim lang mda' gzhu dang// shing dang chu dang 'bab chu brag/ gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim dag las/

bya dang de bzhinam bya dang// stor ba dang ni ma stong dang// phyogs pa dan ma phyogs dang// de bzhin rnyed dang ma red dang// gson pa dang shi ba dang// de bzhin rgyal dang ma pa dang// don yod dang ni don ming dang//
de bzhin grubadang mi grub dang// bde dang mi bang chog bzhin// lha yul dag gi don rnams dang// sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bsams pa/
mthong zhing myos par byed/ rnam pa zhes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rjesems dpa' dang la sbyor pa// pilta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang// ma mo gnasakyi

ts+tshA thal pa mchog tham cad dpral ba'i srung ba ni// thig le so sa gsum du bya// phyogs mtshams nam mkharas bcisan// srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpalapho rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i srungaba'o// rje

sems dang 'a dang la sbyor ba// ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gzugs chu'i 'gram// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang// khrus bya ba dang 'bogs pa yis//

phyogs mtshams rnamamakhacas bcings na// sra ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dang la dang la sbyor ba// drilta'i gzugs dang duphyibs ldan pas/ 3

mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni// nyus kar bskyod nas blang ba'i bya// lo ma nyus mar zas su thabrab// mgo bskus de bzhin 'bras buyis// phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcis ma// srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o//

po dang la don yod grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dang 'dab la sbyor ba// ma mchu sa yis legs mnan nas// dpal ldan g.yon du 'gying dang bcas// gsal bar phyogs su le lo'i tshul// bla 'og tu ni/
byin brlabs na// gnas gsum dag ni rgyusa'adebs so// gzhug dka' bdaganyingan pa'i rnams// saargyas kun gyi ngo bos 'grub// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug khyin gyis brlabs pa dbal skal ba

bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// jo rjesams rab dbal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu ts+tshatshogs skal bzang bo/ bde bar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'dis btab ma thag tu ni// sangs
rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs gyur// shin tuphyin gyi brlabs las// sangs rgyas kun dang phrad pa la// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam bgagyur// sangs rgyas
kun dang mnyam pas na// sas rgyas thams cad rab tu gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// dal skal ba bzang bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i srung ba'o// de rjesams dpa' dpal sbyor ba// sas
rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas// phyogs su legs pa 'khor lo'i tshul// bladang 'og tubyin brlabs nas// 'di yis bsrung ba byas n ni// khams gsum dag ni lus pa// gnyug dka' bdaganyidand ba
rnams// sas rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs gyur// thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dang 'dapal sbyor ba// danu dpal gyis rnam sprulabs// thams cad

kun t+takun gyi bdag/ thams cad srung ba mi 'gyur te// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang/ mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang// bdud dang ngos khrid thams cad ni// mod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dpal
rdo rje de ka nga ba nga rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyar ba// ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing// sna tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas// sgrib pa red/

par bgrub par 'gyur// sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol// rtag pa thapas cang theb par 'gyur// dag pa thams cad rnam dag na// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes

rdo rje'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i srung ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa la sbyor ba// 'bar ba lta ba'i tshul shugs na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i// rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nani// bskal pa ya

ni me ltar 'bar// 'di las ngan 'gro rna[‚Äù]gsu'u dang// khams gsum dag kyang thal bar rlog/ rdo rje chen po 'am rab tu 'jigs pa 'bar ba mi bzod pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//

rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'a sbyor ba// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gyi rtsa ba yis// ngordzo'i khu tshur gnyis brtsis nas// go ru bgo ba'i thabs su bya// spyi ba dang ni dpral bar gnyis// glo gnyis dang ni grub rtaganyis//
rdo rje 'brangab bcing ba dang// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dar brtsis thabs su brtsis nas// 'gyingadang bcas par mtha' nas ngagrolaM// dar sbyar ba yi thabs byas nas// thal mo brdabs pas

bstan par bya// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dang la dang 'dra// mi chod pa dang mi byed pa'i// rdordzo'i sku ni rab tu 'grub// rims nad dug dang dbyig dugand// mkhaka' gros gtso dang

gdena rnams dang// yan 'gasarungs bye ba kun// 'di yis bsrungs ba yongs mi tshugs// dpa' rdo rdzogo cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// srung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o// rtogasanas dang la yi

tshul ston cing// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang// zhi ba'i lta bas bltas na ni// yis dang dug rnams thams cad sel// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcos nas/ mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur bcing// mdzub mo
bsnyams ba'i rtse mos mnan// nad rnams thams cad zlog par byed// yongs su bsgyur tabatag nas nii// dpral ba'i bde bar gzhag par bya// ma lus lus ba med pa yi// sdug bsngal thams cad
sel bar byung// dpal rdo rje smin mtshams lus kyi nad gso ba'o// rdo rjebasdams pa byos pa las// mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zug rngu kun 'dus grol bar 'gyur//
bun lcog rgalaskrunangagadang// dmu rdzinal sogs kun las thar// 'di nyid grub par gyur nas ni// nad rnams kun gyi gnod pa med// thug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcis

ti/ 'di yis mig gnyis phyis na ni// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba mchog 'dre yis// leng ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyu/ bdaganyid sbyor bas ldan byas la// rdo rje khu tshur dam po yis// drang ba'i tshul du spyad pa nas/
kha phyogs drang zhingabatung bar bya// mas dang dugadang gdon rnams kun// rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyis bzung// bdag gi lhab ni spyi ldan pas// 'thus na thams cad med par 'gyur// klad pa'i sman no//
ta thA ga sa gan+d+hA cu siho// 'dini mang rab zlas pa'i mchog/ zug rdu mad cing myur du ga// bru rje thams cad 'byin pa po// galas pa yin lag pa yis// sems dpa'i gtsug
tor bcis na ni// byis pa nad med 'tsho ba 'gyur// thams cad srusashig bde ba 'thob// gzhon nu gso ba'o// g.yas pa yini' ga pa yis// klu yi gdengs ka lta bur bya// 'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bob/
bcas na// dug gi las rnams bsgrub par bya// 'bar dang 'bul dang brtsis pa dang// phra ba'i dug rnams med par byed// gdug pas zin dang lu ta dang// shi ba sos par byang nga 'i sarog/ gdengs ka'i
phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa ni bu tshur bcangs pa yi// chung kho la ni reg byas na// gdon rnams kun las thar par 'gyur// dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga'o// ba dan
gsum po gnyis bcings na// gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing/ ma bumo mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rdzo'i phyagargya yos pacil// yongs su bsgyur te gte gnas su/ smin ma'i mtshams su
bzhag pa ni// mkha' 'gro'i las rnams ma lus pas// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// phyag rgyu 'di yis btaban ni// gnas gsum rdo snyigs nga// rgyas btab rmos byas thos pa dang/

thal bas gyur pa'i ng bano ba'abyed// dpal rdo rje de ru ka'i khro gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste ma choshes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// rta rnams thams cad non na ni// rta rnams nad med
[z]sos pa dang// nyam spyi thazhing mgyogs par 'gyur// dpal rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas// glang po kun la zhen na ni// glang po thams cad nad med sos// nyam skya/

ldan myos par 'gyur// ba'adzrasatut+ta ma si ho// 'di ni rna bar babs pa'i mchog/ bya rnams nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur// mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur// bya gso ba yi phyag rgya 'o// rdo rjes mas dpa' dpal
sbyor bas// 'byor pa kun la rjes chags na// shing rnams nad med mi bskams shing// rtag tum tog 'bras bur ldan// shing rnams bskyod nga'i gtsug lag las// spyod pa'i cho ga gang bshad pa//
phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad ni// yid la bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// shing bskyed pa'i phyag rgyu shes pa'o// 'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang// de bzhin lag pa sa 'phangs pa dang//
'phangs nas slar du bzung pa dang// stobs 'byed pa lnga yin te// rang byung rnams kyi dgrama'i dpyad// phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas // rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis bshad// dam pa de dag bshad pa 'a/
bya dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang/ kun tu sbyor dang 'dren mar myur// 'gengs dpa' phen dang gsal ba'i// rkang pa gshibs pas sa mnan cipa// dang nga 'gyod nga sa sa gnon to// dkyil
'khor dag kyang mnan par bya// brkyang bskum gyis kya gas gsum mnan// dbyibs kyi phyagargya'o// mi lhod pa dang sran gzugs dang// gnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang// rgya cher 'gangs
shing rnam par dag/ lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ 'di yis lus la gnod pa dang// rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang// mkha' 'gros gtso dang gdon rnams kyis// nams
kyang tshugs par yong mi 'gyur// rgya cher 'gos pa'i phyag rgya'o// rang gi snying khar 'dran tshul du// bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas// g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing// mda' 'phangs nan 'grub par
'gyur// dpa la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i// lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang la// skyon med pa yi g.yas pa dgug/ gzhu rgyud dal bus dras nas nii// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya//
thams cad dgug pa'i phyagargya'o// rna drung bar du zlum pos ni// ji ltar rig pa legs bkang la// yi med dmaMtsam rang gi khar// gzung 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur// 'dzin nga 'i phyag rgya'o// ji ltar
rigs pas drangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du bzung nas kyang// de nicung zad dbyebar bya// 'gas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// lagangs nga ni phyag rgya'o// chang pas 'bo ni bsgrib par bya//
'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// lta ba chad pa la gtad nas// myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub// mda' gzhus rgyal bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// gru bzhi nga 'a rno ba dang// de bzhin kun nas bskor
bar bya// g.yas phyogs nas ni mda' bskor nas// snyad de de bzhin bstod ba dang// rkang pas mnan cing rmig pas mnan// 'bigs pa bcu yi rgyu mchog gis/ khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag

00/ bde bar thub nas dpar spyod// dang la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o// rab tu 'phas dang mnyam par 'phas// de bzhin glog ltar ba phas pa dang// glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te// phyag rgya thabs rnam

sgyug pa 'o// thabs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// nyam ngalag dang bad phyogs dang/ thad ka de bzhin gyen du 'debs// 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya// nges par ba zlo
pa thams cud kyi phyag rgya'o// thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs// kun 'debasagyen du 'debs pa'i gar// 'di dag 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag kyang 'phrog par byed// 'phrog pa

thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun// mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya'i mchog/ mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// dgra chu thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes

nga'o// srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni// lta pha bong 'gas par gzhag par bya// de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni// mdzub mo legs par dgug pa ni// rdo rje khu tshur dang lagyi rgya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la

gnas// las kyi dngos grub ngag 'byams rnams// ma lus nga ra na myur du 'grub// dang 'a rdo rje khutshur gyi phyagargya'o// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcas la// bdag gir the bo'i nang du gzhug/ zhi ba'i las rnam
rab grub pas// ma lus lus pa mad pa 'grub// de bzhin gshegos pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ro// rdo rje khu tshuga' gas bcas la// mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab btud nas// mkha' 'gro'i las
rnams thams cad ni// ma lus lus pa med pa la 'grub// dpal rdo rje ru ku'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcas pa las// the bong dag la gung mo gzhag/ dpal pad+ma'ikhu//

tshur thubapa ste// thams cad dag pa'i las lasdur// dpal pad+do'i khu tshur 'o// khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzo gas pa// cang don las rnams grub pa'i// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub//

#// rgya gar skad du/ bri tsuts+tshA mahA ro pa Na nA rA dzA ya/ bod skad du/ dpal gtum po khro bo chen po'irgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum po khro bo chen po
la phyag 'atsal le// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpa' deba'in gshegaso pa thamasacad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi snying po rdo rje dbyis

kyidabang phyug ma'i byug rnams la bzhugs so// dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje rnala'abyor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyang ngo// 'dilta ste/ mi g.yo kha dkar po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang/ mi gshe ba ser/

po'i rje rnal 'byor pa dang/ mi g.yo bdamarapo'i de rje rnal 'byor pa dang/ mi g.yo ba ljang khu'i rodzirnal 'byor pa dang/ gtilug rdo rje ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang/ phra ma rdo ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dang//

'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rde rjernal 'byor ma dang/ phrag dog rde rjema'i rdo rje rna'a'abyor ma dang/ de lta bu la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma bye ba khri brgya stong rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje sems dpa' mi g.yo ba nag po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar gsungs la// dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba'i// dga' bab ya de gcig mchog/ rnam par rtog pa kunu sngas
pa'i spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nga// rmos pa gang gis nga ningashes// lus dang ngag rnams kun la gnas// nga ni de rnams phan don phyir// rnam pa lnga yas yang dag gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'as

mardo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhe sdang rdo rjen 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di nye bar gsungs so// stong dang snying rje dbyer med par// lha yi 'dod pas bde bar gnas// bdag ni kun rtog
rnam par dra la// spros pa med cing gso bamed// bud med gang gis nga mi shes// bud med kun gyi lus gnas// bdag ni de rnams phan na phyir// rnam pa lnga yis yang dag gnas// de nas
bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo banag po la/ bcom ldan 'das ma zhe sdang rdo rjems dam du 'khyudanasatsum pa mdzad de gsol ba btab pa dang/ lha mo lha ma dga' m+me nam// gsang
ban tu'ang rnyed dka' ba// snying po las snying mchog gi gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyis legs gsungs pa// rgyud kyi rgyal po dbang phyuga mchog/ dga' margyudachen mnyan par gyis// dpal
be gcig pu zhes bya bas// sems can das grub myur du 'grub// dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la// rgyud 'di rab tubastan mi bya// dkyi'a 'khor gzhan du zhugs pa la'ang//
rgyud nibastanapar mi bya'o// gang zhig gtum po khe bo yi// dkyil 'khor zab zhugs mnyam gzhag cing// dad dang brtson 'grus mchog ldan la// gtum po'irgyud 'di bstan par bya//
bla ma la gus snying rje can// sngags kyi theg pa mchog tu gcel// gtumango 'o dbang phyug la rtag gus// de la rgyud 'di bstan pa bya// rnal 'byor pa gang la la zhig/ 'dod bskamasas rgyas
su byed pas// gtum po'i dkyel gter ston byed cing// bla med rgyud ni ston byed na// de ni nad chen gyis gzir nas// bshang gce'i dri mas gos pa 'byed// zla ba drug gi nang du ni// de ni 'chi ba'i

tsha sdug bsngal 'gyur// de phyir gshin rje'i pho nyas bzung// dus kyi zhags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gang tshe sdig can dmyal bar 'khrid// saargyas kyis kyang srung mi nus// la ni'i bum du de sdug bsngal//
ta gal te myong gyur las zad kyang// gal te mi ru skyes na yang// rdo rje'i gnam lcags kyis de 'go/ sngags yig btul zhugs can gyis na// de phyir dkyil 'khob legs bris nas// de nyid sngon du yong/

brtags pa'i// slob ma bzang po rang gzhug bya// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// rgyud ni de phyir bstan par bya// gang yang ma thos rgyud nad pa// de yang 'og tu 'gro 'gyur zhing// gal sangs rgyas

dunga mtshungs kyang// de yi gdong du rnam smin 'gyur// slob ma dad pa dman pa dang// the tsom bros pa nyan byed na// mgo bo rdo rje'i thog ltung ba// chab 'bab dus su de tsam med// mchog gi g+hal mnga' lha
mo la bdag gis 'di ni bdenang ' bshad// dang 'bo gcig nyid rgyud 'din// gtum po khro boshin tugasang// zhes pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa nyid du gsungs pa'i dpal rdo tso gal po chen po'irgyud las/ rgyud
la 'jug pa'i rim pa phye ba zhes bya ba ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'e sdang rdo rdzoms/ gtum po rnon po khro bo la dam du 'khyud nas gsal pa// dkyil 'khor gyi
byal// gangagi tshad kyis bri bar bya// de bzhin de dbus bri bya ba// gang yin gtso bos bdag la gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor tshad du gang gyur pa//

khru gdang ni'udo dang// khru gsum dang ni khru pa'i pa// khru lnga'i tshad las lhag mi bya// gang du de yi rdul tshon nyid// kha dog sna tshogs kyis byas pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi
tsa @#// yis rnam par brgyan// sgon brgyad mnyid ni// de yi tshad du ba tu brtag/ sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud dang// de yi phud kyis 'gram dang ni/ log dang de bzhin stegs bu dang//

dra ba dra phyed snam bu rnams// rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rjel tu// de yi phud kyis rdul tshon sa// rdo rjesin phrang pa nyidadang ni// ka ba brgyad ldan brtag par bya// sgo gsum grub nyid kyis ni// sgo la babs
mchog tu bya// mchog tu sna tshogs rdo rdzobru// rdo po'i ra ba khor yug ldan// dpag bsam shing sogs dang ldan pa// khro po gtum po 'i dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor 'khor 'di'i rnam pa la//
'phar mgacigapanyid du bya// de yishasogs phyogs brgyad la// sna tshogs par yang dag khri// dbus ma dang dgudadabus su// thal kri sngon po rdo rjes mtshan// rdo rje gri gug thod bcas 'og/ shas du
'kholasamtshan pa yi// b.lagri bdog dkar po bri// lha bu kha dogs sa ngo yi// rin chen dudabacas yang dag srid// nub tu bdeg dmar po yi// pad+ma dmar pos mtshan pa dang// byang du la kri
rkyang pa yi// kha dog ljang khu yang dag bri// 'khor 'o dkar pos mtshan pa yi// gri gug ma yi mdzams su bri// nachen ser pos rab mtshan pa/ bengan bral du ni bri bar bya// pad+ma dmar pos

'am mtshan pa// rlung du de bzhin bri bar bya// dab ldan kha dog ljang khu yi// ut+pal sngon pos mtshan pabri// zla banyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i// mtshan ma thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdul rton rakyila 'khor
ba00 sgrub thabs 'di// padagagis 'jig rten donaphyir bshad// yang nadakyila'akhodra byab// drags tshul du bri babya// sngon bzhin dkyil 'khel bris byas nas// dbus su mi g.yel mthing nag bri// zhi
steng rdo rje mas 'khyud pa// shar du mi g.yo dkar po bri// mi g.yo seb de de bzhin lho// nub tu mi g.yo dmar po khro/ byang du mi g.yo snang kha ba// ma mtshams gti mug rdo rje dkar// bden bral phra
ma rdo rjeser// chud du 'ad chags rdo rje ma// lha mo dmar mo yang dag bri// dbang ldan phrag dog rdo rje ma// ljang bri ras bris dkyil 'khor la// de nas dkyil 'khor la sngags kyis lhag pa gnas
